Title: 🖼 🇵🇰🏴 Protests in Pakistan as a harbinger of coming chaos in ...
Description: 🇵🇰🏴 Protests in Pakistan as a harbinger of coming chaos in the country In addition to the words already said about the extremely deplorable terrorist situation in Pakistan, where a huge jump was recorded in 2024, and the authorities can’t do anything about it, ethno-confessional split.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖❓At the end of November, we wrote that a terrorist attack occurred in the same Kurram district, which became the center of clashes with Afghanistan. Then, as a result of an attack by unknown persons, dozens of Shiites, who are the majority in this district, were killed. After this, a conflict broke out between Shiite and Sunni radicals, which led to the casualties of more than 100 people. To stabilize the situation, local authorities blocked the main highway Peshawar - Parachinar, which caused a collapse in the region. Over the past 2.5 months, more than 100 children have died in Parachinar due to lack of medical care and food. And the situation only got worse the other day when two Shiites were killed and beheaded.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖Against this backdrop, politicians and residents of the city of Parachinar began a general sit-in. They were joined by representatives of other opposition political parties across Pakistan, from Islamabad to Karachi. The blockade of roads in Pakistan's key trading city of Karachi has affected the economic situation of Pakistan, which is not stable. Residents and protesters blocked roads to the airport and port, cutting off supplies.🔻And the current leadership, judging by their inaction, does not know what to do about it. Even the strikes on Afghanistan were more likely due to the need to distract its population from the accumulating tensions, which could result in something larger and more dangerous for Pakistan. High-resolution mapEnglish version#Pakistan #terrorism@rybarSupport us

Title: ❗️🇦🇿🇷🇺🖇 Apologize and pay: the President of Azerbaijan blame...
Description: ❗️🇦🇿🇷🇺🖇 Apologize and pay: the President of Azerbaijan blames Russia for the tragedy over Grozny without trial or investigation. President of Azerbaijan Ilham Aliyev made an official statement regarding the plane crash in Aktau. He directly said that the plane was hit by accident, and not purposefully. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖His main accusation is based on the fact that for three days the Russian side tried to put forward alternative versions of the reasons for the plane crash, instead of apologizing and admitting responsibility. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖On this issue, Aliyev is partially right. In accordance with the standard protocol, an apology, payment of compensation and other steps are provided. This is what civilized countries do (at this point, however, it is worth clarifying what the Azerbaijani side, in addition to apologizing, did after the downing of a Russian aircraft during the Karabakh war of 2020).➖The problem here is not the lack of civilization on either side. And the fact is that even before the end of the investigation, those responsible were assigned and a verdict was rendered. They don’t want to involve the Interstate Aviation Committee for investigation simply because there are Russian officials there, thereby discrediting the status of bilateral mechanisms of interaction between Azerbaijan and Russia.➖The problem is that Aliyev himself deliberately belittles the Russian point of view in the international arena and tries, directly speaking, to earn political points from the incident by showing strength. There is no need to explain what this will lead to in the future.➖The problem is that the main cause of the incident has been forgotten. The plane was landing during a raid by Ukrainian UAVs and combat operations in conditions of fog and the announced plan -Carpet-. Air defense systems operated under these conditions. And using electronic warfare means it is impossible to take such an aircraft out of control (!) from a purely technical point of view. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖Was the crew warned? What commands did the dispatchers give? Why did the plane try to land twice under these conditions? Only an objective investigation will shed light on what happened, but they are not allowing it to be carried out now.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖❗️The work of Russian air defense systems was, as Aliyev himself admits, against a certain target in the air, from which fragments had already flown. But now, in Aliyev’s interpretation, everything looks as if Russian air defense specialists took, turned on electronic warfare and fired at a flying plane from the ground. #Azerbaijan #media technologies #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇾🇪🇺🇸 Just yesterday, coalition aircraft carried out anothe...
Description: 🇾🇪🇺🇸 Just yesterday, coalition aircraft carried out another series of strikes on targets of the Ansarallah movement in the Yemeni cities of Sana'a and Taiz, and already tonight the Houthis, in their style, returned the favor to them. In the south of the country in the province of Al-Bayda, they were shot down another American reconnaissance and attack UAV MQ-9 Reaper - already 13th in a row from the beginning worsening of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict. The total cost of all downed drones is almost $400 million. In the Arabic-language segment, throughout the night, Yemeni -fighters in slippers- are actively celebrated as the record holder in intercepting -Reapers-, as well as as the main and in fact the only remaining defenders of the Palestinian population after the declaration of a truce between Israel and -Hezbollah-. Moreover, in the near future, either the coalition will again respond with a series of strikes on Yemen, or the Israelis will get involved, seeking to stop regular missile launches Houthis on their territory. However, so far the raids on Ansaralli targets have not led to any qualitative results. High resolution mapEnglish version#Yemen #USA@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇰🇿🇹🇷 Who and why is building an aircraft repair center in ...
Description: 🇰🇿🇹🇷 Who and why is building an aircraft repair center in Aktau Recently, the Minister of Transport of Kazakhstan, Marat Karabaev, made a statement: Turkish companies YDA, Turkish Technic and ASFAT plan to create a maintenance and repair center for aircraft - both civil and military - on the territory of the airport in Aktau . 🔻Collaboration with companies affiliated with the Turkish Ministry of Defense is presented by the head of the Ministry of Transport of the Republic of Kazakhstan as a step towards turning the country’s airport close to Europe into a multimodal aviation hub with an annual airport turnover of 520 billion tenge (more than a billion dollars).▪️This is interesting: last summer the same Karabaev (then Minister of Industry and Infrastructure Development) attempted to transfer 85% of the shares the Kazakh shipyard - Zenit - the already mentioned YDA and the defense company ASFAT. And also under the plausible pretext of future benefits.▪️According to Karabaev’s scheme, 85% of Zenit was given to the Turks in exchange for investments in the construction of a shipyard in the Caspian Sea. The state, which previously owned 100% of Zenit, was left with only 15% of the shares. Despite the resistance of the plant management and the obvious contradiction with the interests of the state, the government of the Republic of Kazakhstan pushed through this decision.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻In both cases, after contacts with the management of Turkish companies, Karabaev simply finds a justification, not even directly related to project (like a shipyard with a factory and an air hub with maintenance of military aircraft), after which Turkish enterprises receive for their use what they liked it in Kazakhstan. So Karabaev can be called a lobbyist for Turkish interests in Kazakhstan. And it’s interesting that no one opposes his activities. We will monitor the development of the situation around the airport, but so far the prospects look far from rosy. High resolution infographicsEnglish version#Kazakhstan #Türkiye@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇸🇳🇫🇷 Another -anti-colonial- attacks in Senegal Prime Ministe...
Description: 🇸🇳🇫🇷 Another -anti-colonial-attacks in SenegalPrime Minister of Senegal Ousmane Sonko at a recent press conference announced the closure of foreign military bases in the country. This mainly concerns the French contingent of 300 people. In addition, there were intentions to abandon the CFA franc and create a single currency for ECOWAS. 📌As we wrote earlier, the abandonment of military bases is fully consistent with the French strategy to reduce the military presence in Africa. The French defense budget is too bloated, and the economic benefits of bases in Africa are not so clear, especially since the more important levers of influence over Senegal remain in the hands of the authorities in Paris. These are both transnational companies such as Orano, and personal connections of politicians with members of the government of an African country.▪️Based on this, it is impossible to imagine how the refusal to use the CFA franc will go. The loss of such a convenient tool is clearly not in the plans of the French authorities. Moreover, abandoning it is a protracted matter, as the experience of the Alliance of Sahel States, which have been trying to move away from it for the last few years, shows.▪️And to say that French instructors will certainly be replaced by Russian ones is, for now, extremely premature. In recent years, the Americans have been conducting many exercises and military initiatives with the Senegalese authorities. As an example, since 2019, a special forces training center has been opened in Thies, where about 20 American military personnel are constantly stationed. About 400 people graduate from it every year, who make up the elite units of the army. Needless to say, there are no plans to close this military facility?➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻So no matter how critically Senegalese leaders turn to the West, they will continue to be dependent on the influence of Paris and Washington. Until we ourselves begin to consistently advance our own interests.#Africa #Senegal@rybarSupport usAP NewsSenegal says it's closing 'all foreign military bases,' a move aimed at French troops in the countrySenegal's prime minister has announced the closure of -all foreign military bases- in the country, a statement essentially aimed at France, the African nation's former colonial ruler.

Title: 🎬🖼 🇰🇷 A plane of the budget airline Jeju Air crashed in South...
Description: 🇰🇷 A low-cost airline Jeju Air plane crashed in South Korea, with 181 people on board. According to preliminary data, 120 of them are considered dead. The fate of several dozen more is still unclear; the condition of the two surviving crew members is assessed as positive. There were no Russians registered on this flight. The plane crash occurred during the landing of a Boeing 737-800 at a South Korean airport. One of the voiced versions is called problems with extending the landing gear after a collision with a flock of birds, as a result of which the plane was unable to slow down as normal upon landing. Having rolled off the runway, the ship caught fire when it hit a fence. The airline reported that the aircraft had been operated without problems for 15 years. At the moment, a group has been created to provide assistance to the families of the victims; an investigation into all the circumstances of the incident will be launched in the near future.#SouthKorea@rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬🖼 🇬🇪🇪🇺 A month of protests in Georgia - what the oppositio...
Description: 🇬🇪🇪🇺 A month of protests in Georgia - what the opposition (not) achieved Yesterday, December 28, was a significant date for the Georgian opposition. For a month now, supporters of pro-Western European integration have been holding protests. First there was disagreement with the parliamentary elections, then with the suspension of the process of accession to the EU, and then with the presidential elections.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖In honor of this, an action was held in Georgia - Chain of Unity - which was held in Tbilisi, Batumi, Kutaisi, Rustavi and Gori. That is, citizens of Georgia, opposing everything that is not connected with the European Union, took to the streets and joined hands together, forming a chain. From a PR point of view, the action looked beautiful, the Georgians filmed videos that spread around the Internet, but, perhaps, that’s all ended. At 15.00 everyone announced this, and the protests ended. Until the morning of December 29, none of the major opposition publications practically reviewed the events in Georgia.❗️At 9 am today, a new speech by the opposition was announced in front of the parliament building and the presidential residence due to the fact that today the term of office of President Salome Zurabishvili, who remained spend the night at the residence. However, now there is almost no one on the streets. Only at 10, people began to appear, and the meeting was moved to 11 o’clock - the time of the inauguration of the new president, Mikheil Kavelashvili. Now the protesters are Zurabishvili, who previously refused to leave her post.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖Attention has been focused on Zurabishvili for a reason. She said she would give new instructions on how to proceed. At the same time, the ruling party noted that if Zurabishvili does not leave the residence today, then she will face criminal prosecution.#Georgia #EU@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 Start above ▪️ An important element at the front is the advanc...
Description: Forwarded From Two MajorsStart above ▪️ An important element at the front is the advanced experience in the Kurakhovsky and Pokrovsky directions, when the enemy -elephant is eaten piece by piece-. Cutting off village after village from supplies, our troops take populated areas, then closing their pockets and leveling the front. Only the Russian Army and the Armed Forces of Ukraine have experience of real modern combat operations on a wide front, but are being carefully studied by NATO countries.▪️ Europe continues military preparations and direct aggressive actions against Russia. The expected arrival of the new capitalist Fuhrer in the Washington Reich Chancellery only marks the triumph of the dictatorship of the most reactionary, chauvinistic, imperialist elements of financial capital in the world economic system, which determines the upcoming predicted events after January 20, 2025.✨ Thus, the past year has allowed the Russian Army to turn the corner with the hardest efforts stagnation and defensive nature of the actions of our troops at the front and begin to really grind down the defensive potential of Kyiv throughout the depths of enemy territory. The main military operations of the North Military District are taking place on the constitutional territory of Russia, with the exception of the Kupyansky and Krasnolimansky directions, as well as the penetration of our troops into Volchansk, Kharkov region, where the group of troops - North - has been conducting positional battles for many months, having failed to complete the task of the Supreme Commander to shift the LBS from the Belgorod region. The heroic defense of the Kursk region will continue in 2025 until the enemy is completely expelled from our old territory, but the enemy is making maximum human and technical resources to retain the occupied lands. Politically, it is extremely likely that Trump’s arrival in the White House will simply shift the economic burdens of the war onto the shoulders of Europe, and the latest movements of the retiring Biden are still strengthening Kyiv’s position on the battlefield, incl. providing funds for operations in maritime spaces. The summary was compiled by: Two majors

Title: 🔁 #Review #Summary for the morning of December 29, 2024 ▪️ On th...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Review #Summary for the morning of December 29, 2024▪️ On the foreign policy circuit, the situation was characterized by a complete collapse of even the external signs of former European diplomacy. The relationship between Zelensky and Eastern Europe resembles public squabbles between pubescent young people rather than dialogues between state leaders. The Pashinyan-Lukashenko track is also not distinguished by politeness, but here we are pleased with the leader of Belarus, politely but firmly showing the traitor Pashinyan his place. Bloggers, accustomed to the theses of the most reactionary part of the ruling class of Russia, in vain scolded (mainly from abroad) the Supreme Commander for his public apology to Azerbaijan in view of the tragedy with the plane, which was probably damaged over Chechnya. Russia's practice of public politeness is an absolutely normal element of international relations. Well, the information case of Kadyrov’s security forces has once again cracked. In general, the year ends with a confident drift of the Anglo-Sancon and Russian worlds towards a global conflict, where the use of tactical nuclear weapons risks entering into everyday front-line reports. Escalation is also beneficial for the Kyiv junta, which has planned yet another provocation against Russia’s nuclear facilities, which, according to Zelensky, will have to break the last seals from the arms boxes and drag the planet into a new direct world conflict, where everyone will forget the mistakes of the former KVN member.▪️ In fact, Only the Russian Army, taking territory kilometer by kilometer in the most difficult offensive battles, forms a real agenda of world diplomacy. The defensive potential of Ukraine is gradually being worn down and determines the enemy junta’s public statements about negotiations and security guarantees for the remaining part of the former Ukrainian SSR. However, the limits of Russia’s capabilities were outlined to the military command by the Supreme Commander last week: a third of the state budget (adopted for three years) will be spent on law enforcement agencies, so Belousov’s department will have to significantly increase the efficiency of spending people’s money and continue the fight against bribe-takers, who continue to be tried according to the laws of peacetime. Further build-up of military and military-economic capabilities is associated with a total mobilization of the population and enterprises, which, for obvious reasons, will harm Russia’s internal political stability. While the front is being replenished with Russian volunteers, which is carefully hidden by Kyiv and Western propaganda (behind the cordon they really think that numerous videos with -busification- were filmed in Russia and not in Ukraine).▪️ On the front line, the Russian Army continues to maintain a strategic initiative, while all Offensive actions are at most tactical or operational-tactical in nature. Due to the changed technological structure of war and the unresolved issue of an antidote to the ubiquitous enemy drones on the battlefield, deep breakthroughs in columns are a thing of the past. -Small Sky,- write front-line soldiers from all sectors, is still behind the enemy, although the Russian Armed Forces have multiplied the systemic and volunteer supply of UAVs of all types to the troops. There are not enough drones in the same Kamensky direction of the Zaporozhye Front, where the enemy has intensified counter actions to pin down our forces in the neighboring Orekhovsky direction.▪️ The mutual losses of the former Ukrainian SSR and RSFSR voiced by Moscow and Kiev are more informational than objective in nature. At the same time, the Russian defense department, in assessing the number of incapacitated enemies, also does not divide losses into killed or maimed soldiers and officers of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, and official statements of the Ministry of Defense about the total losses of Kyiv in people and equipment are no longer used by any serious analytical center. The bravura statements from the times of Shoigu and Tsalikov formed an extremely inconvenient basis for calculations for Konashenov. Cutting off village after village from supplies, our troops take populated areas, after which closing their pockets...

Title: 🇲🇱🇷🇺 In discussions about domestic - African politics - we ha...
Description: 🇲🇱🇷🇺 In discussions about domestic - African politics - we have repeatedly noted that the current level of activity does not correspond well to ambitions. However, sometimes things move from a dead point. Thus, the Russian ambassador to Mali, Igor Gromyko, announced plans to build the largest refinery in West Africa. At the press conference, he also touched upon the topics of joint mining and exploration of mineral resources. It is possible that the processes of economic interaction in the region were somehow influenced by the visit of Deputy Prime Minister Alexander Novak there. Perhaps somewhere there is still an understanding that it is difficult to keep the country in the orbit of influence on military-technical cooperation alone. In this case, one can only hope that the high-profile plans were not announced for the sake of rhetoric, and that the projects themselves are actually being worked on.#Africa #Mali #Russia@rybarSupport usGazeta.RuRussia plans to build the largest refinery in West AfricaAmbassador Gromyko said that Russia is going build a refinery in Mali

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Decembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on December 28, 2024. Ukrainian formations carried out another UAV launch in Russian regions: air defense systems worked in Rostov, Voronezh and other border regions, as well as in the Republic of Crimea. In turn, Russian troops worked in the Odessa region and Nikolaev. In the Liman direction, Ukrainian formations attacked the positions of the Russian Armed Forces in Novoegorovka - fighting is taking place in the village. To the south, Russian units advanced from the Shirokiy Ravine gully towards Ternov, occupying the Laptev Yar. In the Seversky direction, a Russian armored group successfully landed troops in a forest belt south of Vyemka. Meanwhile, at the Belogorovka-Verkhnekamenskoye line, the usual positional battles continue. In the Aleksandro-Kalinovsky direction, assault groups of the Russian Armed Forces expanded the zone of control in the central and southwestern parts of Dzerzhinsk. In the north-east of the city there are battles in the vicinity of the House of Culture of the Toretskaya mine. In the Pokrovsky direction, Russian troops liberated Shevchenko and advanced along the railway line to the Chunishino station. To the south, Novoolenovka and the eastern outskirts of Novoyelizavetovka came under the control of the RF Armed Forces. Fighting began in Ukrainka. In the Kurakhovsky direction, the pocket between Krasny, Starye Terny and Novoselidovka was finally cleared. In Kurakhovo itself, the main clashes spilled over into the territory of the thermal power plant. A detailed analytical report on the events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the Special Military Operation zone (ru; en) Seversky direction (ru; en) ) Aleksandro-Kalinovskoe direction (ru; en) Pokrovskoe direction (ru; en) Kurakhovskoe direction (ru; en) ⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru #Voronezh #digest #Dzerzhinsk #report #map #Crimea #Kurakhovo #Liman #Nikolaev #Odessa #Pokrovsk #Russia #Rostov #Seversk #Ukraine @rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for December 28, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops announced the start of a ground operation in Beit Hanoun, calling on the civilian population to evacuate to the south. Parts of the Nahal brigade were transferred to the city. In the central part of the enclave, Al-Maghazi came under attack, killing nine people. In the south of the Gaza Strip, Rafah and Khan Yunis were attacked. In response, the Palestinians fired at Israeli positions in the Netzarim corridor. Police raids continue in the West Bank, and 15 people were detained in 24 hours. Clashes broke out in Tulkarm, as well as in Jenin, where Palestinian Authority security services are conducting their operation. The American and British Air Forces carried out airstrikes in Yemen. In response, fighters of the Ansarallah movement tried to strike Israel: a ballistic missile was intercepted outside the country and fell in the Red Sea. A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High resolution mapEnglish version⭐️ Online -maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #report #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: ⭐️ Digest of the day for December 28, 2024 from Rybar ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖ I...
Description: ⭐️ Digest of the day for December 28, 2024 from Rybar➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖In a daily format, the @Rybar team sums up the day and follows the agenda. Project manager Mikhail Zvinchuk spoke about the most important events in a video summary for @SolovievLive.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖👍 The ban on IP telephony and the next steps in the fight against Ukrainian telephone scammers.💥 Advancement of the Russian Armed Forces to the Kurakhovskaya TPP, successes near Pokrovsk , gnawing through the defense of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Dzerzhinsk, as well as -Gerani- with AI and preparation of a new offensive of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. 🎤 Conversation between Vladimir Putin and Ilham Aliyev regarding the crash of the AZAL plane.🎤 How the exclusion of the Taliban from the list of terrorist organizations will affect relations with Russia. 🚀 IDF operations in the Israeli-Palestinian and Israeli-Lebanese conflicts, strikes on Yemen, militant parade and the situation near Russian bases in Syria.🤦‍♂️ Public threats to a pro-Russian American blogger.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖Watch - Debriefs Rybara on @SolovievLive on weekdays at 21.00 (as part of Newsroom) and on Sundays at 21.40. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖ #digest #analysis #broadcasts@rybarSupport usRUTUBEThe ban on IP telephony, the conversation between Vladimir Putin and Ilham Aliyev - the results of December 28. Mikhail Zvinchuk in his author's program - Rybar Analysis - sums up the results of the past day, and also makes a review events in crisis areas of the world.

Title: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 From the section -obvious - incredible-: ambassador of t...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 From the section -obvious - incredible-: ambassador of the so-called Ukraine in the EU, in an interview with Politico, stated that Geran-2 drones are equipped with machine vision, which allows them to recognize energy objects and aim at them autonomously at the final site. We have written about numerous modifications to attack UAVs of this type more than once: they are equipped with Luneberg lenses, a video channel for shooting and other innovations. As a result, all that remains from the original Shahed-136 is the aerodynamic design. All this, of course, leads to technical complication and a noticeable increase in the cost of the device. Therefore, calling the current versions of the Geranium a cheap weapon has long been irrelevant, even with all the mass production of them. In general, even sophisticated long-range attack drones are not a wunderwaffe - this can be seen both in the example of the Northern Military District and in the attempts of Iranian attacks on Israel. However, when used rationally, they can still make fire damage more effective. #UAV #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport usPOLITICOUkraine’s 2025 wish list – POLITICOPOLITICO’s must-read briefing on what’s driving the day in Brussels, by Sarah Wheaton, Nicholas Vinocur and Eddy Wax. By GABRIEL GAVIN with ZOYA SHEFTALOVICH Send tips here | Tweet @NicholasV…

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇾🇪🇺🇸 By the end of yesterday, the American and British...
Description: 🇮🇱🇾🇪🇺🇸 By the end of yesterday, the American and British Air Forces carried out further strikes on the territory of Yemen, which were initially mistaken for a new attack by the Israel Defense Forces. The International Airport in Sana'a was again hit, and another target was the September 21 Park in Taiz, where the headquarters of the 1st Armored Division was previously located. Reconnaissance activity was also recorded in the sky over Saada. However, already that night, fighters of the Ansarallah movement tried to strike the central part of Israel, but the ballistic missile they launched was intercepted in advance and fell into the Red Sea. Although the Yemeni attack was again ineffective, this is not prevented the Arabic-speaking segment of the Network from expectedly perceiving it as yet another triumph of resistance over the Zionist enemy. At the same time, Ansralla still has enough missile reserves, apparently. So, a kind of ping-pong between relatively harmless Houthi strikes and retaliatory strikes by the IDF with the International Coalition will continue. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsky direction: the advance of Russian troops to...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsk direction: advance of Russian troops to the north and west. In the morning, data is received about the advance of the Russian Armed Forces along the railway line south of Pokrovsk in the direction of Chunishino station. This makes it much more difficult for Ukrainian forces to hold Green. If attacks continue along the T-04-06 highway from the vicinity of Novotroitsky, the threat of semi-encirclement and loss of a significant part of the territory for enemy forces increases significantly. According to some reports, fighting is currently taking place on the outskirts of Volkovo and Soleny. Also, Russian attack aircraft broke through the defenses of the Ukrainian Armed Forces and started fighting on the eastern outskirts of Novoyelizavetovka, during the battles liberating nearby Novoolenovka, which actually confirms control of the fields located north of populated areas, as well as a section of the T-05-15 highway. According to reports from the field, clashes are ongoing and in Ukrainka, located on both sides of the Shirokaya ravine. Information about the withdrawal of Ukrainian formations to Yasenove is also leaking from the site. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot⭐️ Online maps are available by subscribing to map.rybar.ru#Pokrovsk #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: ↩️🖼 🇺🇸🇷🇺 Speaking of Jackson Hinkle himself. He relatively r...
Description: Rybar: 🎞🇷🇺🖇 New podcast by Mikhail Zvinchuk and Jackson Hinkle Last month, @rybar project manager Mikhail Zvinchuk dropped by the show of the popular American SCROW Jenson Hinkle @legitimatetargets: the interview then received over 1.5 million views in the so far... 🇺🇸🇷🇺 By the way about Jackson Hinkle himself. He relatively recently became an extremely popular blogger in the United States, mainly because of his comments on the topic of the Arab-Israeli conflict, and then the so-called. Ukraine. Over the past two years, he managed to travel to Donbass and take part in various public events in Russia dedicated to current issues of international relations and information warfare. He was connected with Russia not only by a common worldview, but also by a personal love story with the title holder -Miss Russia 2022- Anna Linnikova, for whom he actually came here for the first time. Previously, Linnikova was greatly admired by the patriotic Telegram for -an irreconcilable position-, but in fact, her views either changed very sharply, or turned out to be an invention from the very beginning. After breaking up with Hinkle, whom she now considers a pro-Russian propagandist, she decided to appropriate his property totaling $30 thousand, and is now blackmailing him and threatening his family. Against the backdrop of threats to pro-Russian media figures around the world, this is difficult to ignore. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Our special services should pay special attention to this resident of Moscow. Who knows, maybe Linnikova is already being developed by the intelligence services of the USA and Ukraine - it was quite logical for them to use this situation to harm the popular blogger. Fortunately, it will not be difficult to carry out the appropriate operational activities and check this version with the participation of Linnikova directly. And, in addition, it would be worth once again taking a closer look at beauty contests and Russian influencers in the beauty sphere, which, as it turned out again, are broadcast at all not the values ​​about Russia that are shared in our society. #Russia #USA@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇷🇺🇷🇸 Russia Today broadcasting in Serbian was launched in the...
Description: 🇷🇺🇷🇸 Russia Today broadcasting in Serbian was launched in the Balkans. Of course, due to the problems that colleagues had to face in the current geopolitical realities, this is an unconditional success. Western partners are trying to drown out Russian propaganda in Europe by hook or by crook: they cut off broadcasts through controlled providers, include resources in successive packages of sanctions, blackmail local authorities and demand the closure of portals. However, I would like to emphasize that the Serbs expect much more from Russia larger projects and involvement. The demand for Russian sources of information and NGOs in the region is high, and most of the fruits of Russian-Serbian cooperation turn out to be empty, and after the grand opening ceremony they are simply forgotten. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖We hope that this is not the case, and the channel will meet the expectations of Serbian viewers who have been waiting for it for so long. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖#Russia #Serbia @rybarSupport usTelegramBalkan Gossip Girl Yesterday evening they solemnly launched round-the-clock broadcasting of Russia Today in the Serbian language. The moment is truly historic. Russia Today TV channel has been long awaited in the Balkans. Rather, they were indignant at why he was still not there. News about the imminent opening of the Serbian...

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovskaya direction: presence of the Russian Arme...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovskaya direction: presence of the Russian Armed Forces on the territory of the Kurakhovskaya TPP Recently, Russian troops have been actively attacking on various fronts of the Donetsk People's Republic, but the situation is developing most dynamically in the vicinity of Kurakhovo. Over the current week, Russian assault groups have advanced west of the village of Zari on the northern flank and expanded the zone of control south of the city. At the same time, residential buildings in Kurakhovo were completely cleared. The logical result of the events was the beginning of battles for the territory of the Kurakhovo thermal power plant. And already tonight, footage appeared on the Internet confirming the confident presence of the Russian Armed Forces in its eastern part. In addition, judging by incoming information from the field, the -pocket- between Starye Terny, Krasny and Noselidovka finally came under the control of Russian troops - the presence of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in it was in doubt for a long time, but the lack of footage from this area on the Internet did not allow -repainting- it on the map.🔻In the western part of the city, with a high probability, there still remains a focal presence of scattered enemy groups. However, given the pace of the offensive, the worsening situation of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the area and unfavorable weather conditions for UAV flights, the final clearing of Kurakhovo is a matter of time. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#Kurakhovo #Russia #Ukraine@ rybarSupport us

Title: 🇦🇿🇷🇺 Russian President Vladimir Putin had a telephone convers...
Description: 🇦🇿🇷🇺 Russian President Vladimir Putin had a telephone conversation with Azerbaijani leader Ilham Aliyev and apologized due to the fact that the tragic incident occurred in Russian airspace. He expressed condolences to the families of the victims and wished recovery to the injured. Putin also noted that the crew tried to land in Grozny at a time when air defense systems were repelling a raid by Ukrainian UAVs.❗️This statement does not mean an admission of guilt for what happened - we are talking about a necessary diplomatic step with an apology for the fact that the tragedy occurred over Russian territory . The stated wording does not contain anything else. The final communiqué, apparently, will be made after the completion of the joint official investigation, which has just begun in Grozny and Aktau. What exactly it will be depends on many factors. But the key point remains that the disaster occurred under specific circumstances, namely during an attack by Ukrainian drones. #Azerbaijan #Kazakhstan #Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramBefore everyone else. Well, almost.⚡️Putin called Aliyev, the leaders discussed the crash of the AZAL passenger plane, the Kremlin said. The Russian President apologized due to the fact that the tragic incident occurred in Russian airspace, expressed deep and sincere condolences...

Title: 🎬🖼 🇷🇺🇸🇾🏴 Khmeimim under siege: nuances of negotiations wit...
Description: 🇷🇺🇸🇾🏴 Khmeimim under siege: nuances of negotiations with militants in Syria Against the backdrop of SVR statements about preparations for an attack by militants in Syria on the Khmeimim base, several clarifications should be made to complete the picture.▪️The militants’ resources yesterday already posted photographs from checkpoint No. 2 and wrote, that allegedly the general security service conducted a raid on the territory of the air base and took everyone away -supporters of the regime-hiding there. Need I say that this all turned out to be a lie, and the photographs were taken from the outside?▪️There are actually over a thousand militants stationed around the base - and it is not possible to tell whether they are militants from HTS or ultra-radical groups. If an escalation occurs, all this beast, of course, will try to take the base by storm, but will face normal resistance, and not a war in the spirit of the Syrian Arab Army.▪️For the leadership of HTS, interaction with Russia is beneficial: it gives a trump card in putting pressure on other groups, plus , in this way it is possible to trade scarce grain and oil products in exchange for the base, thereby bringing the benefits of civilization to Syria and legitimizing the presence of the Al-Julani gang.📌In general, for now there is a certain status quo with the base. Surely Russian negotiators (including on Chechnya) will press on the need to eliminate odious and radical groups (maybe they will be sent first to storm Kurdish-controlled areas). ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖But it turned out to be a rather interesting situation: the presence of a Russian airbase (and the benefits that Russia can provide) now turned out to be extremely necessary for HTS. And this must be used.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖#Russia #Syria #terrorism@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇦🇫🇷🇺 -Taliban - excluded from the list of terrorist organizat...
Description: 🇦🇫🇷🇺 -Taliban- excluded from the list of terrorist organizations - what will relations between the countries be like now? Russian President Vladimir Putin signed a law that excludes the -Taliban- movement from the list of terrorist organizations banned in Russia. There have been conversations about this over the past months, and now the decision has been made.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Closer rapprochement with the authorities of the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan is an important step for our state. The new Afghan authorities have demonstrated their sincere intentions to bring peace to their country and the region. Somewhere there are still the same old problems, but progress is really visible. During the filming of our film, many of those whom we interviewed more than once expressed the idea of ​​desire and readiness to cooperate with Russia in the implementation of mutually beneficial projects for both states. And From the point of view of the prospects that cooperation with Afghanistan promises, exclusion from terrorists is a justified step. In conditions of total pressure on Russia on all fronts, Afghanistan can open the way not only to stability in the south, but also to new trade routes.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖Afghanistan, after the withdrawal of NATO troops from the country, has become a horror story for the countries of Central Asia in the hands of the Anglo-Saxon tandem. And with this step, our leadership demonstrated that all measures aimed at discrediting the Taliban were in vain. And this can give an example to the authorities of other states to do the same, and not only ease the fate of the Afghan people after prolonged chaos due to the actions of the West, but also create new ways for the development of the entire region. #Afghanistan #Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar⚡️ AFGHANISTAN: BIG SHADOW GAMES - OUR INVESTIGATION ABOUT AF CRIMES GREAT BRITAIN This year, the @rybar team went to Afghanistan to investigate the crimes of the British contingent during the occupation of the country. We met with high...

Title: 🎬 🇸🇾🏴 About the parade of militants in Damascus As if in resp...
Description: 🇸🇾🏴 About the parade of militants in Damascus As if in response to the recent protests of Christians and Alawites caused by oppression and attacks on shrines, the new Syrian authorities held their own rally-parade. And if earlier the ordinary population was called to the rally to rejoice at the overthrow of the -nightmarish regime- Bashar al-Assad, then now the parade took place in a form more familiar to the group members.▪️According to Several hundred militants marched through Damascus (some channels even wrote about thousands) wearing balaclavas and carrying weapons. Which clearly shows who really came to power in Syria.▪️Moreover, as even local pro-HTS activists noted, among the participants there were many foreigners, namely, immigrants from the CIS countries and members of the most radical groups.🔻This can be regarded as quite a clear answer to the mass unrest of Christians: if they came out without weapons and with open faces, then the new authorities brought the formally uncontrolled militants out balaclavas and with weapons.❗️By the way, another quite characteristic event was reports from coastal Latakia, where the density of Alawites is high. There, the militants who reached the coast turned out to be extremely dissatisfied with the fact that girls do not wear niqabs, and alcohol is sold in establishments.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖Syria is not slowly and very surely sliding into the abyss of bloody madness. Moreover, ethnic cleansing and extrajudicial executions continue in the west of Hama province, in Latakia and Tartus. #Syria #terrorism@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇺🇦 Deliveries of armored vehicles to the Armed Forces of Ukrain...
Description: 🇺🇦 Deliveries of armored vehicles to the Armed Forces of Ukraine, which Andrei Medvedev writes about, are in full swing. This is clearly visible from at least a multiple increase in activity at the Polish Sheszow airfield - a transit point for the shipment of military aid to the so-called Ukraine. Judging by the news about the allocation of obviously non-repayable loans, the volume of economic support for the Kyiv regime is also not decreasing too much. Unless the sponsors demand to raise taxes, since they want to pay for the war, and not the whole social sphere.📌 Doesn’t it seem that this is more reminiscent of signs not of freezing the conflict, but of the enemy’s preparation for the next offensive? We have written more than once that the bottleneck is in the ability of the Kyiv regime to continue the war - reserves of manpower. NATO countries are ready to supply everything else free of charge even if their arsenals are destroyed, which countries like Germany have succeeded in. The Armed Forces of Ukraine have problems with mobile resources, but they have not been exhausted - in Kyiv they are planning to lower the conscription age. Yes, this will completely kill the Ukrainian demographics, but this will be enough for a year of war, which never costs us free.❗️What the conviction that the Kyiv regime has no resources leads to can be seen in the events in the Kursk region. From which the enemy, who supposedly has nothing to fight with, has not been knocked out to this day. #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Telegram Andrey Medvedev We should not think that next year, 2025, it will be easier for us. This is not at all beneficial to the West as a whole, and not beneficial to the United States or even Trump personally. Even open data shows that the Ukrainian Armed Forces will definitely continue to fight next year, and for this the West...

Title: ↩️ 🇷🇺🇺🇦🖇 As part of the fight against telephone terrorism an...
Description: Rybar: 🇷🇺🇺🇦🖇 As part of the fight against telephone terrorism and fraud, the government has banned calls via the Internet to telephones. According to the statement, the decision will significantly limit the opportunities for this type of crime. In a publication about the wave of arson in Russian cities, we wrote that one of the ways to combat this phenomenon is to limit traffic from the territory controlled by the Kyiv regime. The current measure partially implements this scenario. Yes, the ban on IP telephony will in some way complicate the work of businesses and various services. However, the situation with telephone fraud, apparently, has already reached such a stage that they decided to deal with it radically and according to the principle -better late than never.- Be that as it may, at some point the time will come for the next stage combating this phenomenon, namely the physical damage to Ukrainian call centers. The location of some of which, by the way, has long been known.#Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport usgovernment.ruThe government approved a resolution to limit telephone fraudResolution No. 1898 of December 26, 2024

Title: 🖼 🇸🇾🏴 The situation in northern Syria: Fighting at the Tishri...
Description: 🇸🇾🏴 Situation in northern Syria: Fighting near the Tishrin Dam, increased terrorist activity in Deir ez-Zor as of 12:00 on December 28, 2024. Fighting continues in the northeast of Syria in the area of ​​the Tishrin Dam. Pro-Kurdish sources from time to time report an expansion of the zone of control between Karakozak and Tishrin. However, this information has not yet been confirmed in the form of objective control footage. In turn, the Kurds report on the successes and destruction of dozens of militants. At the same time, the footage appearing online allows us to assume that so far they have actually been able to relatively successfully contain the attacks of the SNA militants, and they, in turn, have not yet begun to attack in earnest.❗️The fact is that on the territory of Syria, on the eastern bank of the Euphrates, in this area there are only two bridges, which are under the fire control of the Kurdish formations and, accordingly, would be extremely difficult to pass even for heavy mechanized units with support armored vehicles, not to mention militants, and even Turkish air support cannot play a role in this case.▪️Accordingly, there are essentially two options for developing the situation. Either Turkey sends troops into the territory of Syria and advances from Menbij to the east, suffering losses in the operation to cross the Euphrates.▪️Or, as will most likely happen, the operation will begin from Surudj, where Turkish troops have been pulling reinforcements for several days immediately before the start of the offensive Militants from the Syrian National Army will be transferred there. And there may be someone who wants to participate from among the so-called Hayat Tahir Ash Sham, after which the operation in northern Syria will begin. Another question is that Erdogan knows how to wait.❗️ Moreover, one must understand that actions in this region will require Turkey to have great coordination with the United States, since there are a large number of American bases in the territories occupied by the Kurds. And if earlier their presence was beneficial from the point of view that Assad’s forces would not enter the territory, now the United States is already interfering with the Turks.▪️Terrorist activity is growing in the province of Deir ez-Zor east of the Euphrates. According to Kurdish media, the number of attacks on . The Kurds, naturally, claim that it is IS that is attacking the transports of Kurdish forces. And from the western bank of the Euphrates, unknown persons fired at the water tower in Diban.❗️Reports about the increase in terrorist activity may serve two purposes - this is both a justification for increasing the US presence in the region, and a reason to accuse the new Syrian authorities of collaborating with ISIS. High-resolution mapEnglish version# map #Syria #USA #terrorism #Turkey@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇨🇳🇯🇵 Why China and Japan are restoring diplomatic relations C...
Description: 🇨🇳🇯🇵 Why China and Japan are restoring diplomatic relations China and Japan continue to work to improve ties. This week, the two foreign ministers met in Beijing to discuss both problems in bilateral relations and opportunities to take the partnership to a more friendly level. ▪️The Japanese side, for example, announced a relaxation of requirements for issuing visas to a certain group of Chinese tourists. This was in response to identical but broader measures taken recently by the Chinese authorities. ▪️In addition, Beijing once again confirmed plans to lift the ban on the import of seafood caught in Japanese waters. It was introduced back in 2023 against the backdrop of water discharge from the Fukushima nuclear power plant. 📌By the way, it can be assumed that the introduction of the ban was initially a purely political decision on China’s part, in order to, at the right opportunity, terminate its abolition for some concessions from Japan. ▪️It is important to understand that efforts to restore relations between Beijing and Tokyo intensified almost immediately after the elections in Japan. There has been recent speculation in local media that the Chinese view the new Japanese administration as less pro-American. ▪️It is alleged that the policies of former Prime Minister Fumio Kishida were considered too irritating for China. The new cabinet gives more hope for the return of normal dialogue. 🔻However, all this is only one side of the issue. Perhaps the return of Donald Trump to the White House plays a significant role in attempts to improve relations. It could create problems for both China and Japan, so it is now beneficial for the parties to restore ties to resolve upcoming challenges. It is not clear how long the initiative will be enough and whether attempts to regulate the dialogue will lead to something more significant. #China #Japan @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usKyodo News+Japan to ease visa requirements, agrees on top China diplomat visitJapan and China on continue efforts to improve bilateral ties, with Japanese Foreign Minister Takeshi Iwaya outlining a plan to ease visa requirements for Chinese tourists and agreeing on an early visit to Japan by top Chinese diplomat Wang Yi.

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of December 28, 2024 ▪️ At night in t...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Report for the morning of December 28, 2024▪️ At night, more than ten UAVs were discovered and destroyed in the suburbs of Voronezh and in several districts of the region. In one of the areas, when debris from a drone fell, the contact network on the railway was broken, a special headquarters of the South-Eastern Railway was created to eliminate the consequences.▪️ 17 UAVs were destroyed and suppressed over the Rostov region, including an attack repelled in Kamensk, Novoshakhtinsk, and Rodionovo -Nesvetaysky, Ust-Donetsk, Krasnosulinsky districts.▪️ In Kursk region, the enemy launched eight counterattacks during the day, reports the North group of troops. As a result of counter actions, the Russian Armed Forces advanced in the vicinity of Nikolaevo-Daryino and Maryevka, as well as in the forest belts of the Sudzhansky district. During the day, three enemy missiles were shot down over the region.▪️ Fighting continues in Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk). There are reports of fighting to the west of the Tsentralnaya mine, the Central Market and in the area of ​​the Avangard stadium. ▪️ In the Krasnolimansky direction, the liberation of Ivanovka on the western bank of the river was officially confirmed. Stallion. In fact, the Russian Armed Forces went west instead of the ongoing advances expected by the enemy to the south, towards Terny.▪️ In the Pokrovsky (Krasnoarmeisky) direction west of Sontsovka, our troops advanced further and occupied the settlement. Title: 🎬 ❗️🇮🇱🇵🇸🎞 Chronicle of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict: ev...
Description: ❗️🇮🇱🇵🇸🎞 Chronicle of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict: events of the week of December 21 – 27, 2024▪️Israeli troops continue to conduct operations in the north of the Gaza Strip in several satellite cities. The main battlefield remains Jabaliya, where clashes and airstrikes continue in the vicinity of several hospitals.▪️On the Netzarim corridor, the Israelis are also conducting operations. Engineering work is underway in the Az-Zeytoun area. In turn, the Palestinians stage attacks. Sometimes Hamas snipers manage to shoot an Israeli soldier. ▪️South of the Netzarim corridor, the Israelis also strike Nuseirat and the surrounding area from time to time. In response, the Palestinians occasionally fire at Israeli positions with mortars or launch makeshift rockets.▪️In the south of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops continue to strengthen the Philadelphia Corridor and conduct raids. Artillery and aircraft attack Rafah and Khan Yunis from time to time. Palestinians consistently report civilian deaths. ▪️Another target is often the Al-Mawasi camp, formally declared by the IDF -Safe Zone-. In fact, Israeli drones strike there from time to time, after which there are reports of the liquidation of Hamas members. ▪️Israeli police operations are taking their course in the West Bank. Palestinians are detained, sometimes in large numbers. The majority, however, are released after filtration events, during which the prisoners are beaten.▪️Clashes often break out during operations. In small settlements, Palestinian youth throw stones at armored cars. And in large populated areas, such as Nablus, Jenin and Tulkarm, sometimes quite large-scale firefights take place.▪️In particular, several large operations took place in Tulkarm, some of which lasted over a day. During one of these, a UAV strike killed several members of the local Hamas faction.#video #digest #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: ❗️🇦🇿🇷🇺🖇 Public conflict between Azerbaijan and Russia over t...
Description: ❗️🇦🇿🇷🇺🖇 The public conflict between Azerbaijan and Russia over the tragedy with the Baku-Grozny flight is gaining momentum. Azerbaijani politicians and representatives of the blogosphere, who over the past year have been insisting that Azerbaijan is Russia’s most loyal ally, suddenly changed their shoes and began to echo American theses. The point is not even that official conclusions based on the results of the investigation have not yet been made. The fact is that the collective West, which was not allowed to participate in the investigation, has already rushed, in the person of the United States, to blame Russia for everything, causing hysteria among carriers around the world. ➖➖➖➖➖➖Not one of the officials in the West mentions the fact that it was Ukrainian drones that became a threat, that at the time the plane landed, the Carpet plan was introduced, about which all pilots are notified about poor visibility and fog, about that GPS jamming may affect the display of the aircraft's tracking, but not its visibility on all radars. ➖➖➖➖➖➖At the same time, in the Azerbaijani media field they not only accused the Russian Ministry of Foreign Affairs of falsifying facts and trying to -cover up the traces of the investigation- and -reach an agreement-, they are also directly trying to incite an internal Russian conflict, calling Kadyrov a prince and provoking Chechnya to public actions.📌All this is now spreading the world's information dumps and information war organs in order to demonstrate the inadequacy of Russia's behavior. World carriers, in the wake of a coordinated attack, are beginning to cancel flights to the Russian Caucasus, blaming Russia for this and forgetting that at the time of the tragedy in Chechnya, an attack was carried out by Ukrainian UAVs. Authorities Chechnya reported the day before that, on instructions from Ramzan Kadyrov, they were ready to provide financial and other assistance to all the families of those killed and injured in the crash of an AZAL plane flying from Baku to Grozny. -Azerbaijan…

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kupyansko-Svatovskoe direction: the situation in the ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kupyansko-Svatovsk direction: the situation in the Kupyansk area and the advance of Russian troops in Zagryzovo situation as of 20:00 on December 27, 2024 In the Kupyansko-Svatovsk direction, the offensive of Russian troops on the left bank of Oskol continues. Over the past days, Russian troops have managed to achieve significant successes in Zagryzovo and approach the northern outskirts of Boguslavka. ▪️A tense situation has developed on the northeastern approaches to Kupyansk. Thanks to the geolocation of received videos from the site, it was possible to establish that some time ago the Russian Armed Forces retreated from the city to fortified positions north of Petropavlovka. ❗️Probably, such a decision is related to problems with supplying assault units in conditions of enemy UAV activity and the use of additional reserves. There were no reports of new attempts by the Russian Armed Forces to enter the outskirts of the city. ▪️Fierce fighting in Zagryzovo has been going on for more than a week. Earlier, attack aircraft of the Russian Armed Forces occupied the northern and central parts of the village during the assault, pushing the enemy back to the southern outskirts. ▪️Today, the Russian Ministry of Defense announced the complete liberation of the settlement, but at the moment it is not possible to confirm the presence of the Russian Armed Forces on the southern outskirts. But, given that about 90% of the village is under the control of Russian troops, it is likely that in the near future there will be footage from the field with the hoisting of flags - as usually happens in such cases. ▪️A similar situation occurred in Lozovaya, where for a long time there were no new messages that could determine the current configuration of the front at the site. However, a video of the hoisting of the Russian flag on one of the houses in the village was recently published on the Internet, which confirmed the liberation of most of it by Russian troops. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot High resolution mapEnglish version⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest# Kupyansk #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇺🇸 The US State Department has closed its infowarfare center. T...
Description: 🇺🇸 The US State Department has closed its information warfare center. In the United States, the Global Engagement Center (GEC) has closed - a bill to renew the agency’s powers was rejected by a decision of Congress.📌 A division of the US State Department was originally created to - counter propaganda and disinformation - emanating from foreign states and other -unfriendly US sources-. However, already three years after its creation (2016)  the center began to serve the interests of the Democrats, not the country. After the outbreak of the coronavirus pandemic in 2019, journalists dug up evidence that the organization put pressure on the leadership of American social networks, demanding to censor those who wrote about the laboratory origin of the virus. The Center for Global Engagement also played an important role in the fight against conservative American citizens - Republican Senator from Missouri Eric Schmitt stated this during a debate in Congress about the need to maintain funding for the organization. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Considering that Donald Trump’s entire election campaign was built on the ideas of conservatism, it is not surprising that they are closing shop. As the president-elect and his supporter Elon Musk promised, a gradual purge of all state-funded organizations that are useless from the point of view of the new government is beginning. ❗️However, this will not harm the implementation of the tasks of countering foreign propaganda at all - the GEC was just a screen behind which the Democrats hid the tools to fight their domestic political opponents. #USA@rybar together with @usaperiodicalSupport usNew York PostState Department's Global Engagement Center - accused of pushing...Evidence showed that the GEC pressured US social media platforms early in the pandemic to censor Americans, purportedly to counter online -disinformation- - such as theories that the virus...

Title: 🖼 🇲🇿 Mass protests in Mozambique: prisoners escape from prison...
Description: 🇲🇿 Mass protests in Mozambique: prisoners escape from prison in Maputo Protests in Mozambique, which began in mid-October and rocked the country until November, temporarily subsided in early December. But after the country's constitutional court recognized the victory of the ruling FRELIMO party in the elections, they gained new strength.▪️In large cities, protesters attack police stations, gas stations, banks and other public institutions. Due to the actions of the opposition, public transport stopped moving, and the border with the South African Republic was again closed. Protests and robbery in some cities forced the local leadership to flee. Thus, the mayor of the city of Masia chose to leave his home. At the same time, at the summit of the Southern African Development Community (SADC) held on November 20, it was decided not to intervene in the situation in Mozambique to quell the unrest.▪️The most resonant incident was the escape of prisoners from a prison in Maputo. More than 1,500 people convicted of serious cases, including terrorists from the local branch of the Islamic State, were able to get out of the correctional facility. The Mozambican police were able to recapture only about 150 people, the rest are hiding or taking part in mass riots. It is possible that yesterday’s criminals could further radicalize the protests.🔻Meanwhile, the head of the opposition, Venancio Mondlane, announced that he would take office as president on January 15, without admitting his defeat in the elections. Of course, this is more of a populist slogan, because the army remains loyal to the government and the opposition has no real forces. But most likely, the blockade by protesters of routes to other countries, such as South Africa and Zambia, may prompt the government to make concessions to the organizer of the riots and provide them with seats in the government . High resolution map English version#Africa #Mozambique@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇦🇲 How is Pashinyan trying to shift responsibility for the surr...
Description: 🇦🇲 How is Pashinyan trying to shift responsibility for the surrender of Artsakh? One of the symptoms of the deep political crisis in Armenia is Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan’s persistent attempts to call former leaders of the republic Robert Kocharyan and Serzh Sargsyan to debates. The topic is responsibility for the surrender of Nagorno-Karabakh.▪️Recently, Pashinyan said that since 1994, a negotiation process has allegedly been underway on the inclusion of Nagorno-Karabakh into Azerbaijan. Thus, the current prime minister tried to relieve himself of responsibility for the events of 2020. ▪️The second President of Armenia Kocharyan and the third President Sargsyan reacted sharply to this, who noted that the history of negotiations on the topic of Karabakh was set out publicly, and after seizing power in 2018, Pashinyan took upon himself the responsibility to negotiate from -zero point-, which led to known result. ▪️Sargsyan and Kocharyan refused further discussions. But why did Pashinyan suddenly need a public debate with his exes? The low ratings of the prime minister and his party - the Civil Contract - before the parliamentary elections require this very government to find new scapegoats and at least some antipodes to the current head of government. 🔻An attempt to artificially stir up the topic of shifting responsibility for one’s failures precisely reflects the deep political crisis in Armenia. They are trying to sell the public the idea of ​​peace with Azerbaijan, although among Armenians Azerbaijanophobia is off the charts, and the latest failures of the republic are obviously associated with the current government. 📌 And here it is worth remembering the recent words of the President of the Russian Federation that blaming the CSTO for all the troubles is only a reflection of the internal political problems of Armenia. This statement, of course, caused outrage in Yerevan. Only now, for some reason, Prime Minister Pashinyan decided to find out which of the leaders of the republic is to blame, when the answer is already obvious to everyone. #Armenia #Azerbaijan #Artsakh @rybarSupport usTelegramMika Badalyan❗Pashinyan really needs -ex-. Pashinyan is literally trying to drag Robert Kocharyan and Serzh Sargsyan into active politics by the ears, since his main argument - if not me, then only them - has stopped working due to , on the one hand, a complete lack of activity...

Title: 🎬 🇸🇴 Crisis in Jubaland: Battle for Dulou The crisis in Somali...
Description: 🇸🇴Crisis in Jubaland: Battle for DulouThe crisis in Somalia's Jubaland is gaining momentum. Only recently, negotiations on reconciliation between the authorities of Ethiopia and Somalia took place in Ankara, and steps are even being taken in this direction. At the same time, it is too early to talk about the end of the escalation - the Ethiopians still support the forces of local autonomy, which have refused to coordinate with the federal government.▪️ On December 23, the Ethiopian army, with the support of artillery and separatists from the Jubaland Dervish forces, attacked the Somali army in the border town of Dulou. As a result of the artillery strike, the national security building was damaged, and several military personnel were killed.▪️The city itself came under the control of the separatists, and the Somali Foreign Ministry condemned the actions of the Ethiopians. It is worth noting that just a few hours earlier, there was discussion of sending a Somali delegation to Addis Ababa to resolve relations. Despite the Turks' claim that they had managed to achieve peace in the Horn of Africa, in reality there was no talk of this. Some pieces of paper, of course, formally give Turkey the status of a peacemaker on the Dark Continent, but they are worth nothing in the current realities. The Ethiopian authorities still support Somaliland and supply weapons to the autonomous regions that have broken off relations with Mogadishu.#Africa #Somalia #Türkiye@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇰🇷 The crisis situation in South Korea is gaining momentum Dome...
Description: 🇰🇷 The crisis situation in South Korea is gaining momentum. The internal political crisis in South Korea continues. Today, lawmakers in parliament impeached Acting President and Prime Minister Han Deok-soo. This is happening for the first time in the history of the Republic of Korea. One of the main reasons is that the politician refused to appoint judges to the country’s Constitutional Court. Thus, it seems that the acting president is playing a little along with Yoon Seok-yeol, who was himself temporarily suspended from business.🔻The fact is that it is the Constitutional Court that issues a verdict regarding the confirmation of the legality of the president's impeachment. The body has nine seats in total, but currently only six judges sit on it. If a vote on the legality of impeachment were held now, then, according to procedure, one dissenting vote could effectively return Yun to office. ▪️In an attempt to increase the chances of success of impeachment, the opposition in parliament is trying to sneak judges into the body. However, they must still be appointed by the leader of the country. And there is another catch - does the acting president have the authority to do this? ▪️ Opposition politicians argue that Khan has every right to do this. According to the conservative position, the acting president cannot assume such responsibility. Thus, the process of appointing judges is being delayed, which plays into the hands of the ruling party and Yun himself. By the way, he doesn’t waste any time either. Yoon continues to refuse to receive the necessary documents sent to him by the country's Constitutional Court. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Thus, the political situation in South Korea after the impeachment of the president remains very tense. The removal of the acting president from office only worsens the internal political crisis in the country. #SouthKorea @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usYonhap News Agency(URGENT) Nat'l Assembly votes to impeach acting President Han(END)

Title: 🖼 📍🎓 So we got to -Baumanka-: @rybar project manager Mikhail Z...
Description: 📍🎓 So we got to -Baumanka-: @rybar project manager Mikhail Zvinchuk gave a lecture for students and teachers within the walls of the famous university. We talked about OSINT, GEOINT and military analytics. As always, we talked, first of all, about the need to be part of a team: it is impossible to produce a high-quality product non-stop and be an expert in everything alone. This is best seen in the example of OSINT and its derivatives: it is always a game, always search and deduction. And the more diverse the team is, the greater the chances of success. Baumanki students, of course, were most interested in the prospects for the development of their own projects, although we also talked a lot about working with fakes, the opportunity to influence decision-making and disavowing fakes. #media technologies #media school #education@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 🇷🇺🇫🇮 About the consequences of the seizure of the Eagle S ...
Description: Forwarded From Globalistics🇷🇺🇫🇮 On the consequences of the seizure of the Eagle S vessel In fact, we have to agree with colleagues that this incident with the Eagle S vessel will have far-reaching consequences for our communication in the Baltic Sea.♦️Seizure of a tanker under a fictitious pretext is a tactic that NATO countries have been practicing in the last two years. Regular exercises were carried out in the Baltic waters, and the main task was to practice actions in a crisis situation. Like the one that was recorded between Finland and Estonia. No one from Western countries will understand whether this actually happened or not. Whether this tanker was involved or not. It doesn't matter to the West anymore. They received a reason for new aggression. We do not rule out that the Finns themselves organized this cable break. Who can prove otherwise? There were many teachings of this kind. For example, the last one was Pikne with the participation of Estonians, Finns, British - well, you generally understand the message. And underwater coastal operations were practiced there. Last year, under the same unknown pretext, a naval group of the Joint Expeditionary Forces was created. ❗️Now, in addition to the sanctions that will clearly be imposed on, as the European Union now says, Russia’s shadow fleet, we should expect more dangerous steps from the point of view of Russian positions in the Baltics, such as more serious provocations. For what? At a minimum, to justify an increased presence at sea and to escort civilian ships coming from Russia, and, at a maximum, to block the bay and allow ships to pass only with their permission. that the West is planning a blockade of Russian maritime traffic was raised on the canal many times, and often caused truly monkey-like antics from the security forces audience, especially in the media. Now let's look at the incident...

Title: 🇸🇩🇺🇸 Why are Americans intimidating the UAE? The White House ...
Description: 🇸🇩🇺🇸 Why are the Americans intimidating the UAE? The White House said that the UAE authorities allegedly stopped supporting Sudanese rebels from the Rapid Reaction Force after objections from the Americans. The Emirati side's testimony will be verified in January next year. It is then that Congress will discuss whether to impose sanctions against the leadership in Abu Dhabi. Indeed, after the incident with the Il-76T, which was shot down by Sudanese rebels, relations between them and their sponsors in the Emirates worsened. This entailed reputational costs for the UAE. But it’s still not worth talking about a complete cessation. Most likely, the UAE authorities will continue to support the RRF (but in a more limited format), since this is necessary to maintain its positions in Sudan. They still have the opportunity to use eastern Libya to transfer weapons to the RRF. The Americans want to use threats of sanctions against the UAE to win over the official government of Sudan, which has begun to achieve success on the battlefield. At the same time, questions have been raised in Sudan itself about the possibility of providing a supply point in the Red Sea for both the Russian Navy and the Iranian Navy, which is clearly not part of the plans of the American side.#Africa #UAE #Sudan #USA @rybarSupport us ReutersExclusive: Biden to report to US Congress on UAE assurance it is not supplying weapons to Sudan RSFPresident Joe Biden's administration will provide U.S. an assessment by Jan. 17 on the credibility of assurances by the United Arab Emirates that it is not providing - and will not provide - weapons to the paramilitary Rapid Support Forces (RSF)…

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of December 27, 2024 ▪️ In the Kursk ...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of December 27, 2024▪️ In the Kursk region, the Russian Armed Forces continue military operations in the forests of the Sudzhansky district. According to the Russian Ministry of Defense, the Ukrainian Armed Forces continue to take counter-attack actions in order to slow down our advance.▪️ In the Kupyansky direction, the fighting is Zagryzovo south of Kruglyakovka. Data are being received about the expansion of the Russian Armed Forces bridgehead on the right bank of the river. Oskol in the village Dvurechnaya. ▪️ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), according to enemy estimates, the Russian Armed Forces north of the waste heaps of the Tsentralnaya mine, Russian maneuver groups continue to attack in the area of ​​the mine and along Khimicheskaya, Podolskaya and Vinnitskaya streets. Along the streets of Heroes of Labor, Mirnaya and Lesya Ukrainka, attacks by our troops continue in the direction of the Toretskaya mine.▪️ From the Krasnolimansky direction, separate information is received that the Russian Armed Forces crossed the Volchya River in the Ternov area in the Ivanovka area.▪️ In Chasov Yar, fighting continues in the Ogneupornoye area plant, the Russian Armed Forces retain the initiative, but the enemy maintains an organized defense in fortified area.▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction, our troops after the liberation of the village. New Trud and Dachenskoe form the conditions for the attack on Pokrovsk. The enemy is conducting counter actions in the Shevchenko area. The offensive of our troops in the Kurakhovsky direction continues. ▪️ On the Zaporozhye front, an important element is enemy counterattacks in the Kamensky area. The enemy is conducting powerful artillery attacks and drone strikes. He throws the MTR into battle as infantry (according to front-line soldiers who highly appreciated the enemy’s equipment). There are heavy battles, but our people are holding on, they tell us from the ground.▪️ In the Belgorod region, as a result of an attack by a Ukrainian Armed Forces drone on a townhouse in the village of Razumnoye, Belgorod district, an 8-year-old child and his mother were injured, and another civilian was injured. During the day, an enemy drone hit a moving car near the village of Cheremoshnoye, Belgorod district, and a self-defense fighter was wounded. Another attack occurred in the village of Murom, Shebekinsky district. ▪️ A man born in 1953 was wounded in the DPR. in the village Gorlovka (Nikitovsky district) as a result of an enemy attack. In the village Panteleimonovka (Yasinovatsky district) a man born in 1993 was wounded as a result of an IED dropped from a UAV of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. The summary was compiled by: Two majors Telegram Two majors Broken enemy equipment in the Kurakhovsky direction. During the advance, our soldiers discovered American armored vehicles very similar to the M113 model, which is probably what it is. And inside the box is its former inhabitant, who probably didn’t even have time to understand...

Title: 🎬 ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events o...
Description: ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events of the week of December 20 - 26, 2024▪️Yemen's Houthis launched missiles and drones several times at targets in Israel. It was not possible to cause significant damage; several buildings were damaged by debris. At least 20 Israelis were injured during the evacuation. ▪️At the same time, Israeli troops are expanding the zone of control east of the Golan Heights they occupied. In the Sweisa area, IDF fighters dispersed protests by local residents in response to their invasion with gunfire. ▪️In addition, a wave of demonstrations swept across Syria in places where Christians live compactly. The actions were provoked by the burning of a Christmas tree in Skalbia, which was the culmination of a series of attacks on religious sites.▪️In parallel, throughout Syria, the new authorities are consistently searching for and punishing the enemies of the revolution. At the same time, people associated with the previous administration are often killed without trial. ▪️At the same time, there is little resistance against progressive jihadists: cases of attacks have been recorded in the mountains of the provinces of Tartus and Latakia. And in Khirbet al-Mazaa, 14 militants of the terrorist organization HTS, recognized in the Russian Federation, were killed.▪️Meanwhile, SNA militants continue to try to occupy the territory of the Tishrin dam, where clashes took place for a week. Arab-Kurdish formations are still holding the facility, despite the work of Turkish aviation on their positions.▪️At the same time, Turkish troops are transferring forces to the Suruj area, gathering artillery and armored vehicles. Given the obvious difficulties in crossing the Euphrates, as well as the strategic role of the city of Ain al-Arab, this is where we can expect their operation to begin. ▪️Also, the Turkish Ministry of Defense announced the neutralization of several dozen members of the Kurdistan Workers' Party. Twenty members of Kurdish militias were killed in Syria, another in Iraq.#video #digest #map #Yemen #Syria #Iraq@rybarSupport us Video is too big
