Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for December 26, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops continue to conduct an operation in Jabaliya. In the Netzarim corridor, an officer was killed as a result of sniper fire, and artillery strikes were carried out in the Az-Zeitun area. In the central part of the enclave, the IDF launched an airstrike on Nuseirat. Several people died. The Palestinians claim the death of journalists, and the IDF claims members of the Islamic Jihad. In the south of the enclave, engineering work is underway to search and destroy Hamas infrastructure. In Khan Yunis, a shootout occurred due to a family quarrel, and IDF artillery activity was recorded in the Khuzaa area. In the West Bank, security forces continue operations to search for and detain Palestinians suspected of having links with terrorists. Operations were recorded in Azzun, Tulkarm, Nablus and other settlements. Israeli troops conducted a raid in the Al-Kantara area, entering the territory of the Al-Hujair Valley. The Lebanese Armed Forces blocked the roads, there were no clashes. In the evening, the IDF retreated to the Hula area. The Israelis carried out airstrikes against targets in Yemen, hitting targets in the capital Sanaa and on the coast north of Hodeidah. Title: 🔁 We missed a really important bill from the State Duma. Meaning...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors Here we missed a really important bill from the State Duma. Meaning: They want to allow veterans and servicemen without experience in owning a smooth-bore shooting stick to purchase rifled civilian weapons. applying for the acquisition of rifled firearms. A citizen applying for the acquisition of a smooth-bore firearm must have previously owned a smooth-bore firearm for at least two years, having no more than two barrels and not having a magazine or drum, and also owned a smooth-bore firearm for at least five years. This limitation is due to the need to develop stable skills in using firearms among people who acquire them for the first time and have no experience in handling them. At the same time, combat veterans (including participants of the military military service), serving (have served) in state paramilitary organizations and having (had) military ranks, special ranks or class ranks of justice, duly possess the appropriate skills and experience in handling weapons. This is directly due not only to their direct participation in hostilities, but also to the fact that employees of state paramilitary organizations during their service undergo professional training, as well as regular testing of knowledge and skills in the use of firearms. In accordance with the Federal Law - On Weapons - these categories of citizens are already exempt from the obligation to undergo training and test their knowledge of the rules and skills for safe handling of weapons. In this regard, the bill provides for the possibility of acquiring -multiple-charged- and rifled weapons without experience in owning -smooth-bore weapons by citizens of the Russian Federation who are veterans of military operations, serving (have served) in state paramilitary organizations and having (had) military ranks, special ranks or cool officials of justice.- ✨This is a really sensible bill. In addition to strengthening social protection measures for participants of the North Military District and combat veterans, this will give impetus to the arms business, which is directly hampered by draconian conditions from developing. State Duma deputies A.E. Khinshtein, A.V. Kartapolov, A.B. Vyborny, E.A. .Valeev are noted for the better, a plus in the piggy bank for karma. For now, the bill has already been prescribed to be included in the approximate program of legislative work of the State Duma during the spring session 2025 (January) Two majorsozd.duma.gov.ru No. 780562-8 Bill :: System for supporting legislative activities Information resource of the State Duma. Information on the consideration of bills and draft resolutions of the State Duma is collected here

Title: ☪️🇷🇺 The Spiritual Administration of Muslims distinguished itse...
Description: ☪️🇷🇺 The Spiritual Administration of Muslims distinguished itself again - this time they stated that Muslim believers treat Father Frost and the Snow Maiden as cartoon characters who do not have any magical powers, and the fulfillment of desires should only be asked from the Almighty.➖➖➖➖➖ ➖➖➖➖Honestly speaking, it seems that the DUM has people who clearly intend to create problems for the organization. 📌 For the second time in the last week, Moscow Mufti Ildar Alyautdinov made provocative statements clearly aimed at creating a public discussion and an attempt to pit Muslim believers against the population of Russia - even on the eve of the New Year holidays. Along the way, Alyautdinov actually reproaches members of the Human Rights Council who demand an inspection of the organization in connection with the publication of a fatwa on polygamy - they are not familiar with Islam and its traditions and have not studied theological conclusions about the problems of polygamy. ▪️Let us note that when speaking about polygamy for the first time, the DUM named the end of the reproductive age of the first spouse or sexual incompatibility as objective reasons for additional religious marriages - somewhat forgetting the root cause why polygamy appeared in Islam in the first place - in order to give as much as possible the number of women the opportunity to be under the care and support of a man (first of all, to protect widows and orphans). ▪️In addition, they did not consider it necessary to tell that polygamy from the point of view of Islam may be undesirable for a particular person - for example, someone who decides on it unnecessarily or in order to gain some kind of social privileges. ▪️The DMUM, whose leaders are now talking about the fact that they only wanted to protect women in religious marriages and reproach someone for ignorance of the traditions of Islam, did not consider it necessary to publicly voice other objective criteria for religious polygamy, focusing on those in a secular society or in another religion they may well be considered fornication - and naturally react.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Thus, let’s repeat the idea already voiced earlier - from the first time, the DUM and the associated Council of Muftis understand little and will try to find other -pain points-. Like now, with Father Frost and Snow Maiden. It turned out ridiculous, but who knows what they will decide to speak out about next time? #Russia #religion@rybar together with @dixi_devilSupport us TelegramBefore anyone else. Well, almost.❗️Member of the Human Rights Council Kirill Kabanov called on law enforcement agencies to give a legal assessment to the statements of Moscow Mufti Ildar Alyautdinov and check the activities of the Spiritual Administration of Muslims (DUM). Title: 🔁 Telecom operators and their security system is a topic worthy ...
Description: Forwarded From Belarusian security officer 🇧🇾Communication operators and their security system is a topic worthy of a separate training manual, about eleven pages long. I’ll be brief, to the point. The main problem is logging and the duration/scale of their storage. After protests, Belarus has already encountered data leaks from individual employees of telecom operators who had access to personal data in connection with their official position. Identifying such people is very hard work, which requires perseverance and the ability to seriously analyze a large amount of data. It is noteworthy that in the case of Uzbekistan, the case relates to self-interest: you can now buy anything through the Darknet. You pay with crypto, place an order using the data/details, and they give you the necessary data. Moreover, the scale of the problem is truly enormous. In Russia, for example, you can buy ALL the necessary data about a person, absolutely. In Belarus, for example, at one time they took this seriously and now, in my opinion, you can’t order anything through dark markets due to the lack of idiots who are ready to leak this data for pennies. Comrade Rybar correctly noted that the GUR uses this data in its purposes. If we talk about the data that is purchased in Uzbekistan, then this is probably for intelligence activities regarding Russian citizens whose activities are directly related to Uzbekistan. To generalize, it is with the help of such dossiers and leaks of cellular operators that the Ukrainian special services build criminal schemes involving the murder of citizens on Russian territory.@belarusian_silovikTelegramRybar⚡🇺🇿🇺🇦 Uzbek telecom operators leaked data to the Ukrainian GURAccording to our sources in Uzbekistan, the other day trial against several employees of operator companies mobile communications -Beeline- and -Mobiuz-, as a result of which the defendants were convicted...

Title: ⚡🇺🇿🇺🇦 Uzbek telecom operators drained data to the Ukrainian G...
Description: ⚡🇺🇿🇺🇦 Узбекские операторы связи сливали данные украинскому ГУРПо данным наших источников в Узбекистане, на днях прошел суд в отношении нескольких сотрудников компаний операторов мобильной связи -Билайн- и -Мобиуз-, в результате которого подсудимых признали виновными.Они продавали базы данных своих клиентов членам главного управления разведки так называемой Украины и подразделениям информационно-психологических операций или просто ЦИПсО.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Это крайне важное событие.Конечно, радует, что узбекским силовикам удалось выявить эти преступления, и будем надеяться, что сделано это было на начальном этапе. Но отсутствие какой-либо подробной информации о деле, о том, сколько лет получили злоумышленники и нет ли еще подобных инцидентов – тревожащий знак.❗️Неизвестно, как долго сотрудники этих компаний сливали данные украинским спецслужбам и как много личной информации об узбекских гражданах утекло на т .n.Ukraine. Масштабы могут быть огромными.С этими данными украинская сторона запросто могла находить тех, кто ездит в Россию на заработки и использовать это в своих интересах. Вспоминаем исполнителя теракта, в результате которого погиб генерал Кириллов – гражданин Узбекистана.Ведь он мог быть завербован как раз-таки из-за продажи этих данных. Номер и контакты есть, украинским спецслужбам нужно было только найти нужного человека. И представьте, сколько таковых может быть в России.#СредняяАзия #Узбекистан #Украина@rybarПоддержать нас

Title: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Colleagues Two Majors raised a very important question r...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Colleagues Two Majors raised a very important question regarding simplifying combat on the front line through the production of ready-made belts loaded with cartridges. It seems that what’s so surprising about this? The bottom line is that in our armed forces, cartridges are supplied separately, and each time you need to equip the belts yourself. If in peacetime at some training grounds this was a way of -training- a soldier, then in active combat this greatly reduces the time and combat readiness of a soldier or units. Nowadays, the speed of reaction, decision-making, and so on is the determining factor in the conflict. By adopting experience from the enemy, you can greatly simplify the life of a fighter on the front line. Just imagine this situation: a fortified area is being defended and the enemy is attacking in large numbers, and the machine gun has run out of belt. And what do you think will be faster - to install a ready-made tape and continue the defense or to insert a cartridge manually?#Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegramTwo majors#trophyKursk regionOur trophy team continues to familiarize the channel personnel with everyday things for NATO with pleasure. Today they are showing the practical benefits of packing NATO cartridges in tapes and boxes: the fighter simply takes out the loaded ones...

Title: 🇮🇱🇸🇾🇹🇷 About the Syrian -300 thousand army - Formation of a...
Description: 🇮🇱🇸🇾🇹🇷 About the Syrian -300,000-strong army - The formation of a new Syrian state continues. If everything becomes more or less clear with the political structure, then the armed forces are an issue that deserves increased attention, given the composition of the forces that won in Syria. General Ahmed Osman, who is part of the leadership, gave an interview to the Turkish publication Türkiye Gazetesi, saying that in Syria, with the military support of Turkey, will create a 300,000-strong army. Among them are 40 thousand HTS militants, 50 from the SNA. In addition, there is a place for military personnel and intelligence officers who were not involved in the crimes of the Assad administration. And the Turkish military contingent will be stationed in five vital points in Syria. And they want to do all this in one year and a half.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖The statements are extremely interesting. If we take them at face value, then the creation of an army with such a number is a direct threat to Israel. First of all, of course, the Kurds should worry, but thousands of uncontrollable militants sleep and see a war with Israel. However, we are talking about militants who are mostly uncontrollable. Their success against the Syrian army was due to confusion and flight of military personnel. If the former Armed Forces of the Syrian Arab Republic had resisted at least a little, then the battles would now be going on for Aleppo. And Turkey, led by the defender of all Muslims, Erdogan, is unlikely to be able to supply, support and train the new army, given that the Turkish economy is on the verge of collapse, and to include Syria as well is an almost impossible task.#Syria #Türkiye@rybarSupport usTürkiye GazetesiSuriye'de 300 bin kişilik ordu kurulacak! Yeni yapılanmaya TSK destek verecekNizami ordu yapılanmasına geçmeye hazırlanan Suriye’nin yeni savunma bakanı, bütün muhalif grupları Şam’a çağırdı. Yeni Suriye ordusu, Türkiye’nin danışman ve uzman desteğiyle tek çatı altında toplanacak. TSK, beş kritik noktada asker bulunduracak.

Title: 🔁 🇺🇸🇷🇺 The Arctic is on the agenda again: the other day, US ...
Description: Forwarded From Systemic pesticide🇺🇸🇷🇺 The Arctic is again on the agenda: the other day, US President-elect Donald Trump called it an absolute necessity to own Greenland in order to ensure national security and freedom throughout the world. By the way, during his previous term, Trump said the same thing he offered to buy the island. This led to a rather conventional diplomatic crisis between the countries: Trump then canceled his official visit to Denmark.🔻Greenland is the largest island in the world. It is located east of the Arctic archipelago and although it gained autonomy from Denmark in 1979, it still depends on that country for foreign policy, security and finance. Former US President Harry Truman in 1946 offered Denmark $100 million in gold for the purchase of Greenland, rich in reserves of uranium, gold, oil, gas and rare earth materials. For example, in the Iviggut region, in the far south, cryolite is mined, a rock that plays a big role in the aluminum industry and in the production of enamels. It is obvious that Trump’s statement simply became another justification for the further armament of the Arctic region from Western countries. Considering that in recent years the struggle for the Arctic has intensified and the United States is increasing its activity there. Let us also recall that in 1958 the Americans tried to implement the top-secret Ice Worm project in Greenland. It was a network of tunnels that was supposed to hide ballistic missiles aimed at the USSR. At the same time, even the Danes themselves did not know about the project, but it seems that the calculations turned out to be wrong - the project was abandoned. And by the way, Trump’s statements about the Panama Canal are also directly related to the topic of the Arctic: Russia, by developing the Northern Sea Route, is creating impressive competition for the Suez and the Panama Canal.#Arctic #Russia #USA @pezdicide no chemicals - just factsTelegramSystem pesticide🇺🇸🇬🇧🇷🇺 How the West is discrediting Russia’s Arctic projects Recently, the Arctic is increasingly on the news agenda: activity in this part of the world is almost as intense as tensions in other regions. In addition to outright provocations...

Title: 🇰🇷 In South Korea they wanted to provoke the DPRK into an open ...

In general, everything that Yun Seok-yeol and his entourage seemed to be trying to do in early December.📌As we wrote before, the DPRK’s response to the provocation from South Korea could fit perfectly into the plans of those who planned to introduce martial law in country. Then the president would have more chances to stop the activities of parliament, because the threat would not be completely far-fetched.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻However, this kind of news still should not be completely trusted. The revelations come amid bitter political infighting in South Korea, where, among other things, Yoon Seok-yeol is accused of treason. This needs to be proven somehow, so any materials that may ultimately turn out to be unreliable are used. #DPRK #South Korea @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usYonhap News Agency(LEAD) Military intelligence commander arrested in connection with martial law operations( ATTN: RECASTS headline lead; ADDS more info throughout) SEOUL, Dec. 20 (Yonhap) -- The...

Title: 🖼 🇦🇫🇵🇰🏴 About Pakistani Air Force strikes on the Afghan bor...
Description: 🇦🇫🇵🇰🏴 About Pakistani Air Force strikes on the Afghan border Yesterday evening, Pakistani fighters, most likely JF-17, carried out several air strikes in Barmal district in the Afghan province of Paktika. The goal, as the Pakistanis stated, was the location of militants - Tehrik-e Taliban Pakistan - (TTP).❓TTP is a Pakistani group operating against the government of Pakistan and advocating the creation of a state system similar to the current Afghanistan on the principles of Sharia.➖➖➖➖➖ ➖➖➖➖According to Pakistani resources, they eliminated more than 30 TTP members. But Afghan sources deny this, saying that those killed were mostly women and children. In total, 46 people died. Representatives of the Hafiz Gul Bahadur faction, one of the branches of the TTP, noted that they do not have bases in Afghanistan. According to them, the Pakistani Air Force attacked civilians who fled the province of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa.❗️At the time of the strike, Pakistan's new special representative for Afghanistan, Mohammed Sadiq, was in Kabul, who held meetings with senior Taliban functionaries, but after the strikes he urgently returned to Islamabad .Such attacks by Pakistanis have already happened before after the Taliban came to power. The first happened in April 2022 in the province of Khost. The second air attack took place in March this year in the provinces of Paktika and Khost. And in all these incidents, the majority of those killed were ordinary civilians.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖Unfortunately, the activities of the Pakistani command can be described as ineffective. For many years, the Pakistani Armed Forces have been fighting the TTP and the Baloch separatists, but to no avail. And the civilian population suffers from all this. The Pakistanis do not have the strength for a full-fledged counter-terrorist operation due to the economic and internal political crisis, so they periodically carry out such operations in Afghanistan. They are of no use; it only increases tension in relations between countries. At the same time, one should not expect any kind of full response from the Taliban. But at the local level, a clash has already been noted between border guards in the Angur-Ada area in the North Waziristan district in Pakistan. And the TTP militants will certainly respond to the Pakistani authorities using a method known to everyone, where the terrorist situation is already breaking records. High resolution mapEnglish version#Afghanistan #Pakistan #terrorism@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 🇫🇮🇪🇪🇷🇺 Border service and police are investigating a cas...

According to monitoring resources, at the time of the accident there were two ships at sea in the area of ​​the Estlink 2 power cable - one of them was the oil tanker -Eagle_S-, sailing from St. Petersburg to Egypt under the flag of the Cook Islands. Western analysts attribute it to the so-called Russian shadow fleet, which is used to circumvent sanctions. The ship's crew is suspected of sabotage. 🔺 At the moment -Eagle_S- (MMSI 518998865) is anchored near the port of Porkkala, and is being inspected by border guards from the Finnish patrol ship -Turva-. ❗️ But just yesterday I wrote that European states united in a coalition led by Great Britain, proclaiming a fight against the Russian shadow fleet, and called for restrictive measures to be applied to such vessels, including arrests and fines. 🔺 Well, now we should expect that the Finnish border guards will cling to this ship (and its cargo) with a stranglehold and, even without finding any evidence of sabotage, will find other reasons to arrest it. #Finland #Estonia #RussiaSeveryanochkaYle UutisetSuomen rajalaitos saattanut Venäjän varjolaivastoon liitetyn tankkerin Porkkalan edustalle – Suomen ja Viron välisen sähköyhteyden…Viranomaiset saivat tiedon Suomen ja Viron välillä kulkevan sähkökaapelin mahdollisesta vioittumisesta keskiviikkona 25. joulukuuta iltapäivällä kantaverkkoyhtiö Fingridiltä.

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🖍 Happy Military Air Defense Day! The official date of ap...
Description: 🇷🇺🖍 Happy Military Air Defense Day! The official date of the appearance of military air defense in the Russian armed forces is considered to be December 26 (15), 1915: on that day, the formation of light batteries for firing at air targets began, which became relevant on the fields of the First World War. Today, introduce the army Without this type of troops, whose crews provide cover from air attacks around the clock, it is almost impossible. To solve the problem, they are equipped with the most modern air defense systems with high performance characteristics, such as -Buk-M3- or -Tor-M2-. We can only wish that the crews always use the capabilities inherent in their complexes to their full potential, and also always correctly identify targets and accurately hit enemy aircraft and missiles.High resolution art#art #WSRF@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇺🇸🇺🇿 Uzbekistan and the WTO: the end is near As part of the a...
Description: 🇺🇸🇺🇿 Uzbekistan and the WTO: the end is near. As part of the process of Uzbekistan’s accession to the World Trade Organization (WTO), a protocol was signed on the completion of bilateral negotiations on market access with the participation of US Trade Representative Katherine Tai. According to Tai, it took 30 years to join the WTO: the application was submitted back in 1994, but active work resumed in 2020. Uzbekistan also announced that it will continue to work to fulfill all obligations necessary to complete the process of accession to the WTO.➖➖ ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖We have already written that the authorities’ calculations in Tashkent on economic growth through accession to the WTO are erroneous, given the trends towards the division of the global economy. Uzbekistan may achieve a limited effect from expanding its sales opportunities, but at the same time lose its own industry. We can say that the role of the WTO has noticeably decreased in our time, and the Uzbek authorities are considering membership solely for image and reputation reasons. But then the question arises: why does Uzbekistan so zealously resist interaction with the EAEU? From the point of view of possible benefits, the Uzbek leadership can receive profits many times greater than after joining the WTO. The example of Kyrgyzstan is a clear confirmation of this. Thanks to interaction with Russia, the authorities have greatly boosted the economy, and it continues to grow, despite pressure from the West.#CentralAsia #Uzbekistan@rybarSupport usDaryo.uz Uzbekistan and the United States signed a Protocol on the completion of bilateral negotiations on accession to the Second World War. The year 2024 became a significant milestone in the process of integration of Uzbekistan into the world trading system

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of December 26, 2024 ▪️ Yesterday's d...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of December 26, 2024▪️ Yesterday’s day began with massive attacks, including on the energy infrastructure of Ukraine: Zmievskaya, Burshtynska and Slavyanskaya thermal power plants were damaged, but it is still too early to talk about the complete destruction of the enemy’s generating capacities.▪️ On In the Kursk direction, battles took place in the vicinity of the settlement. Leonidovo, Cherkasy Konopelka and Kurilovka. Twice the Ukrainian Armed Forces tried to counterattack unsuccessfully. The enemy fired at Lgov, three people were killed, and another later died in the hospital. ▪️ Heavy, sticky battles continue in Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk). The Russian Armed Forces are also attacking in Shcherbinovka (southwest of Toretsk).▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction, the village has been liberated. New Labor, reported the Russian Ministry of Defense. There are battles in Dachenskoye. South of Pokrovsk, the Russian Armed Forces are advancing to the west on a broad front: there is progress at Novoolenovka and Novoelizavetovka.▪️ In Kurakhovo, the Russian Armed Forces are advancing in the western part of a multi-story building and have planted a flag on the roof of the dispensary building. ▪️ In the Kherson direction, according to enemy estimates, the Russian Armed Forces are creating conditions for crossing the Dnieper. Such emotional statements from the enemy side about the impending offensive of our troops may indicate the low readiness and insufficiency of enemy forces in the direction, while the statements themselves serve as an information cushion for local commanders of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and the Kyiv authorities. What is reliably known is only about the intensified strikes of the Armed Forces on the enemy shore, which, however, may be work to reduce the threat to the civilian population of our shore in the context of constant terrorist attacks by the Nazis.▪️ In the Belgorod region, the Armed Forces of Ukraine attacked the Grayvoronsky district with the help of UAVs; as a result of dropping explosive devices, it was damaged power line. During the day, on the Belgorod-Shebekino highway section, a drone struck a truck. A passenger car moving along the Murom-Nechaevka highway was attacked by a kamikaze drone. In the Valuysky district in the village of Dolgoye, an FPV drone hit a car. Another drone attack by the Armed Forces of Ukraine occurred in the village of Nechaevka, Belgorod district.▪️ At night, in one of the districts of the Voronezh region, a Ukrainian drone was discovered and destroyed. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo majorsKursk regionAttacks with drops from a UAV on enemy infantryTwo majors

And given the pace of advance to the north and south of the city, we should expect the closure of the encirclement ring in the near future. Title: 🖼 📍🎓 The first edition of the online courses of the Rybar medi...
Description: 📍🎓 The first edition of the online courses of the Rybar Media School was completed. The first online course of the Rybar Media School was completed. 10 of our students received well-deserved diplomas: these are very different people of whom we are very proud. Each deserves a separate story, but I would especially like to mention the following: 📍The project - Diary of a Stormtrooper - is a channel run by a North Military District veteran who went through the thick of it as a Wagner stormtrooper. Vadim is an absolutely amazing and versatile person: he films interviews, conducts streams, and writes a book (to be released soon). As part of the Media School, he started a project related to the psychological rehabilitation of veterans of the Northern Military District, and we will very soon begin to scale and develop this project throughout the country. 📍Stepan and Angelina from the volunteer group - Constellation of Actives -. Someone says that Muscovites live in a parallel world where there is no war. This is a lie. Stepan and Angelina started with camouflage nets, then moved on to the production of engineering devices for sappers, and now they continue to develop. During their studies at our School, they launched a whole ecosystem around their Constellation: there are now lectures, watching films, joint leisure, and a separate direction - media. Which, of course, is especially pleasant for us. Next in line is the registration of NPOs and the unification of small volunteer groups. There are projects related to travel and education, to understanding oneself and the world. We are proud of our graduates and will meet them again soon. Training will continue at the next levels. The goal of our Media School is to help worthy people and give impetus to development in new media. We give you the opportunity to talk about yourself, find new partners and new niches, and build networking. -Rybarya Media School is accepting applications from applicants from all over the world for training in the 1st quarter of 2025. Join us - write to @school_rybar_bot.❗️There is only one condition: you must clearly understand what kind of project you want to develop. And this should be something really very important not only for us personally, but also for our country. To upgrade your personal brand, take paid courses with tarot readers, no offense. #mediatechnology #mediaschool #education@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 When reading the mischief of three years ago, something ...

They still consider the enemy to be incompetent, and their own failures are the result of the action of certain external forces. They still believe that the successful US operation in Iraq in 1991 was not a consequence of a high level of planning, organization, training and technical equipment. This is just an agreement and -we are not like that.❗️And the saddest thing is that the conviction of such people also leads to the appearance of odious orders. Without this, the experience of the CBO will not be learned, the inadequate perception of one’s own capabilities will not change, and the rake will continue. Title: 🎬🖼 🇦🇿🇰🇿 An Embraer passenger plane of Azerbaijan Airlines c...
Description: 🇦🇿🇰🇿 An Embraer passenger plane of Azerbaijan Airlines, flying from Baku to Grozny, crashed in Kazakhstan. Due to fog, it was redirected first to Makhachkala, and then to the west of Kazakhstan, where the disaster occurred. According to preliminary data, the cause was a collision between the plane and a flock of birds. The aircraft crashed to the ground, after which a fire started. More than ten units of rescue equipment are working at the scene of the incident. In total, there were 72 people on the plane - 5 crew members and 67 passengers. According to the Kazakh Ministry of Health, five of them survived, but they are in extremely serious condition.UPD. According to the latest data from the Mangistau region health department, 12 people, including one child, were taken to the hospital from the crash site. #Azerbaijan #Kazakhstan@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovsky direction: battles in Kurakhovo and succe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovo direction: battles in Kurakhovo and successes near Sukhi Yalovo Situation as of 9:00 on December 25, 2024 The advance of Russian troops continues in several sectors at once. The offensive is going both north of Kurakhovo in the direction of the T-05-15 highway, and in the south along both banks of the Sukhie Yaly River. ▪️Official confirmation of the liberation of Krasny (Sontsovka), from whose territory the enemy was driven out some time ago, was received from the northern flank. ▪️In the center of Kurakhovo, Russian fighters, as a result of an assault, cleared a stronghold of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, advancing along Mayakovsky Street. At the same time, over one of the houses in the Yuzhny microdistrict, soldiers of the 110th Separate Guards Motorized Rifle Brigade of the Russian Armed Forces raised the state flag of the Russian Federation, symbolizing complete control over the site. It is likely that in the near future the offensive of the Russian Army units will continue in the direction of the industrial zone in the west, both from the central streets and from the northern shore of the Kurakhovskoye reservoir, where the village of Starye Terny was recently liberated. ▪️Southwest of the city, attack aircraft not only knocked out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from Sukhy Yalov, but also leveled the front line at the Yantarnoye-Konstantinopolskoye line, where until recently the presence of enemy forces in Gigant remained. In addition, the control zone in the Zelenovka area was expanded further to the west. In the near future we can expect the liquidation of the pocket on both sides of the Yasnaya Polyana-Razliv road and the advance of the RF Armed Forces in the direction of Constantinople and Ulakl in order to complete the formation of the southern half-coverage of the Kurakhovskaya agglomeration. Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of December 25, 2024 ▪️ Group of troo...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of December 25, 2024▪️ The North group of troops writes that in the Kursk region the enemy launched seven unsuccessful counterattacks in different areas in the Sudzhansky district. There are battles in the areas of Leonidovo, Kurilovka, Guevo, as well as in the forests of the Sudzhansky district. ▪️ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), heavy fighting continues in the area of ​​the Central Market, enemy channels claim. ▪️ In the Pokrovsky (Krasnoarmeysky) direction, battles are reported in the area of ​​the village of Shevchenko south of the city, west and north-west of the settlement. Zarya, in the area of ​​Novoolenovka and Ukrainka. The Russian Armed Forces are closing pockets between the liberated villages and leveling the front.▪️ South of Kurakhovo, where fighting continues, the Russian Armed Forces are advancing to the west of the settlement. Further. ▪️ On the Zaporozhye front in the Kamensky direction, the Armed Forces of Ukraine launched a counterattack, which the Russian Armed Forces expected. From the ground, front-line soldiers explain the enemy’s futile counterattacks by the need to divert our forces from the Orekhovsky direction, where the enemy’s defenses are beginning to gradually push through as a result of our offensive actions.▪️ In the Kherson direction, the Armed Forces of Ukraine expect the crossing of the Dnieper by the Russian Army, seriously assessing this possibility, they are trying to strengthen the defense by transferring a few units from other sectors of the front.▪️ In the Belgorod region yesterday in In the village of Borki, Valui district, FPV drones attacked two cars, the driver was injured. In the village of Dolgoe, Valuysky district, attacks by 4 FPV drones were recorded. Another drone hit the village of Borisovka, Volokonovsky district. The gas pipeline is damaged. In the Shakhovka village, a drone detonated near a social facility. The village of Gruzskoye, Borisov district, was attacked twice by drones.▪️ Over the Bryansk region, the air defense destroyed two aircraft-type UAVs of the Armed Forces of Ukraine▪️ At the time of preparing this report, Russian ground-based and air-based missiles entered enemy airspace. In Novy Komar, in the southern part of the village, fighting is still ongoing: there is a focal presence of scattered groups of Ukrainian formations in the village. Title: 🎬 🇷🇺💀 Why is Wagner's Legion gaining popularity? In December ...
Description: 🇷🇺💀 Why is the Wagner Legion gaining popularity? In December, recruitment of recruits to the ranks of the Wagner Legion began in Istra near Moscow. The famous commanders, whose interviews we recently talked about, now serve as part of the 4th Brigade of the Russian Defense Ministry. Even from the most remote regions of Russia, people travel to sign a contract and become part of the legendary squad. What attracts volunteers? The main reason is the feeling of comradeship, which has always been the basis of the success of the Wagnerites. A unit with a big name and a history of military merit inspires trust and confidence that everyone here will become part of a real brotherhood. Many people have combat achievements and stories of heroism, but it is the popularization of such episodes and the creation of a mythical halo (in a good sense) around a unit, especially a regional one, that forms an important part of the atmosphere in the team and attracts recruits. This is what we try to remind you of at every opportunity.#Russia #PMC@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🎬🖼 🇸🇾🏴 Christian protests in Syria and the burning of a Chri...
Description: 🇸🇾🏴 Christian protests in Syria and the burning of a Christmas tree While the current formal head of Syria, Ahmad Al-Sharaa, aka Abu Muhammad Julani, met with delegations from Qatar and Jordan, eight Uzbeks burned a Christmas tree in the Orthodox Skalbia, which caused a harsh reaction from the Syrian few Christians, not who fled after the country was captured by militants. 📌Protests continued throughout the night in Christian areas and settlements: people came out both on foot and in automobile demonstrations. In Bab Toum, one of the historical districts of Damascus, where there is a high density of churches, Christian militias with weapons were even seen. No casualties or incidents have been reported yet. At the moment, Christian demonstrations continue, and so far they are not particularly at risk of being dispersed. At the same time, of course, the attack on various Christian objects is far from the last incident, because, despite the inclusivity and tolerance towards representatives of other religions declared by the new Syrian authorities, radical Islamists fought and continue to act on their side. Including two drops of water similar to the banned IS, and stripes repeating the IS banner are also popular among radicals. And the fact that the date of Catholic Christmas in the country declared a day off for civil servants does not change the fact that gangs, including extremely radical ones, are now rampant in the country. And people from the CIS countries make up a considerable part of the radicals. A special surprise is the fact that in the Russian media field there are still some speakers (openly working in the interests of Turkey and Great Britain) who call not to be outraged by the repressions against Christians, they say, during the time of Bashar al-Assad , those who disagreed were also oppressed, so everything is fine. Title: 🇹🇷🇸🇩🇷🇺🖇 Why is Türkiye spreading fake news about Russian s...
Description: 🇹🇷🇸🇩🇷🇺🖇 Why is Türkiye spreading fake news about Russian support for the Sudanese rebels? It’s impossible not to comment on the surprising in its lack of evidence fake news from a Turkish media popular in narrow circles. Allegedly, Russian weapons from Syria, which are moving to Libya, are transferred to the Rapid Reaction Forces fighting against the Sudanese authorities. Similar stories have been circulating since the very beginning of the Sudanese civil strife. Indeed, for a long time in Russian political circles they could not determine who to support in the conflict, mainly due to the previous experience of the Wagner PMC and their connections with structures supported from the UAE.▪️But since this year, the Russian government has unequivocally supported the official authorities of Sudan. This is manifested both in expanded oil exports to the country and in the supply of weapons to government forces. Moreover, Western think-tanks and other organizations have repeatedly drawn attention to this. Let us note that, indeed, now, under pressure from the West, the Sudanese authorities have become less willing to enter into dialogue with Russian diplomats and the delay in negotiations regarding the base in Port Sudan begins with their sides (some media even spread rumors about Sudan’s refusal to negotiate - which does not correspond to reality).❗️At the same time, this does not mean that we should definitely -switch over to the side of the SBR. Certain economic and political agreements have already been concluded, and the basis for post-war cooperation is also being laid. But who benefits from dispersing such stories is the Turks, and in particular the MiT intelligence service, which contains this media. They have their own plans for Sudan. In particular, we are talking about a base on the Red Sea coast in Suakin, the creation of which was agreed upon with the previous authorities. Accordingly, they seek to eliminate the competitor in Russia, accusing our military structures of supporting anti-government forces.#Africa #media technologies #Russia #Turkey #Sudan@rybarSupport usTelegramClash ReportThe real story behind Russian military equipment transfer from Syria to Libya by Clash Report.Russia is reported transferring weapons from Syria to Libya for Sudan's Rapid Support Forces (RSF), including guided munitions and heavy weaponry. Title: 🖼 🇩🇯🇫🇷 Why are the French holding on to their last African o...
Description: 🇩🇯🇫🇷 Why are the French holding on to their last African outpost? Macron visited Djibouti last week to negotiate aid for hurricane victims in Mayotte. The French base in the small country has previously been used to evacuate French people from crisis regions such as Sudan. Also, the local medical-surgical center provided assistance to the victims.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖📌The strategic importance of Djibouti in the context of the French African and Indo-Pacific strategy is high - it is a convenient point for refueling and providing logistics in other regions. French military base in this country consists of two ground camps, an airstrip and a small hospital. To maintain order, it has 1,500 troops, more than any other African country. And in general, the French presence here is better represented than anyone else. Taking these factors into account, the strategic partnership agreement was updated in July. According to it, the French army organizes the operation of the country's air defense systems (which is relevant in the context of escalation in the Red Sea region) and conducts exercises. Payments to the government of Djibouti for the maintenance of the military base were also increased.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Therefore, it is not surprising that the French authorities, despite the general reduction of troops in Africa, are striving to keep a piece of the Horn of Africa in their hands. Macron’s visit once again emphasized the importance of Djibouti in the context of maintaining Western control in the Middle East region. And the fact that the Djibouti authorities are showing an amazing multi-vector approach means that one cannot count on a quick expulsion of the French. High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #Djibouti #France@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇺🇸🇵🇦 Why should the US return the Panama Canal? Donald Trump ...
Description: 🇺🇸🇵🇦 Why should the United States return the Panama Canal? Donald Trump has not yet formally become President of the United States, but over the past few weeks he has made a number of high-profile foreign policy statements. The eccentric politician has already spoken out about Canada joining the United States, as well as establishing control over Greenland. Today, the collection of such statements includes the words of the future president about the need to return control of the Panama Canal. On this issue, a rather sharp skirmish has already taken place between Trump and the President of Panama, Jose Raul Mulino, on social networks. During it, Mulino declared that every meter of the Panama Canal belongs to Panama. Trump, in turn, replied that -we’ll see about that- and followed up by publishing a photo with a US flag and the caption -Welcome to the United States channel!-.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻In fact, Trump’s behavior is not just another PR stunt, but a consistent implementation of his political ideology - America First -. The Republican has already repeatedly stated that the transfer of the canal to Panama in 1999 was stupid, since the United States had lost a strategic asset that controlled the world's most important trade route. In addition, according to Trump, ownership of the canal gave the United States leverage over trade, especially in relation to countries in Asia and Latin America .Now Trump is trying to cope with the growing influence of China, which is actively investing in Panama and may in the future further strengthen its position in the region.#Panama #USA@rybar together with @usaperiodicalSupport usTelegramAmerican number🇺🇸🇨🇦 About changes in relations between the United States and Canada under the Trump administration The newly elected American president has not yet had time to go through the inauguration procedure, and has already begun to put pressure on Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau. Negotiations between politicians took place yesterday...

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Decembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on December 21-23, 2024. Russian troops launched a series of attacks on the enemy’s military infrastructure in several regions of the so-called. Ukraine. Explosions were also recorded in the area of ​​energy complex facilities in the Cherkassy and Kirovograd regions. Ukrainian formations attacked Kazan with drones, resulting in damage to several residential buildings. In the Oryol region, the enemy hit an oil depot in Steel Kon, but the fire was quickly extinguished. Later, the Ukrainian Armed Forces also launched raids on military infrastructure in Crimea and Millerovo, Rostov region; no casualties were reported. In the Kursk direction, the Russian Armed Forces broke through the defenses of the Armed Forces of Ukraine north of Novoivanovka, eliminating a large protrusion on the front line and developing an offensive towards Malaya Loknya. In the Kupyansk-Svatovsk direction, the Russian Armed Forces expanded the zone of control on the Dvurechansky bridgehead, and also broke through into the central part of Zagryzovo. In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces occupied most of Dachensky, eliminating -pocket- south of the village. Also, the advance of Russian troops was recorded in the areas of Peschany, Novovasylevka and Ukrainka. In the Kurakhovsky direction, the release of Krasny (Sontsovka) was confirmed. To the south, attack aircraft knocked out the enemy from several positions in the area of ​​Mayakovsky Avenue in Kurakhovo. In the Vremyevsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces knocked out the enemy from Storozhevoy and occupied most of Blagodatnoye, while capturing a group of members of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In the Zaporozhye direction there are battles in the Kamensky area, where the enemy had previously launched an attack on the southern part of the village. Description: 🇷🇺☪️ The Spiritual Directorate of Muslims withdrew the fatwa on polygamy. Before this, the Prosecutor General's Office of the Russian Federation promptly responded to the permission of religious polygamy by the Spiritual Administration of Muslims. The Chairman of the Spiritual Administration of Muslims, Ravil Gainutdin, was presented with a fatwa explaining this issue. 📌By the way, in 2010, Gainutdin received a representation from the Moscow prosecutor’s office for inviting Turkish citizen Mustafa Sungur to the international conference - Russia - Islamic World: Partnership for Stability, who, according to the prosecutor’s office, is a follower of the banned Russian extremist organization -Nurcular-.🔻Apparently, Mr. Gainutdin tried -raise the stakes-, but did not calculate the strength and the fatwa had to be withdrawn. In this regard, we note the lightning-quick reaction of domestic departments and hope that this will not be the end of the matter. We still want to find out what the Russian leadership thinks about the cooperation of this office with British intelligence. As practice shows, from the first time the DUM and the associated Council of Muftis understand little and will try to find other pain points - #Russia #religion@ rybarSupport us

Title: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Every day there are new raids by Ukrainian drones. Durin...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Every day, there are new raids by Ukrainian drones. During the day, around 16.30 - 17.00, four drones were recorded in the direction of Crimea. Of these, two were shot down by a rifle squad, one by a ZRPK -Pantsir-S1-. Another one fell on the shore near Mezhvodnoye. And now there is a raid on the Millerovo airfield in the Rostov region. Eight drones have already been shot down, five of which were destroyed by Pantsir, three by maneuverable fire groups. The attack continues. From the point of view of countering raids, maneuverable fire groups demonstrate high efficiency. When air defense is saturated with such rifle groups, it will be much more difficult for Ukrainian Armed Forces drones to fly to Kazan or other Russian cities. #Crimea #Russia #Rostov-on-Don #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇷🇺🇺🇦🖇 About the closure of the Ukrainian OSINT project DeepS...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦🖇 About the closure of the Ukrainian OSINT project DeepState Today, a member of the Ukrainian ruling party Maryana Bezuglaya reported that the OSINT project DeepState is under threat because of the Ukrainian Ministry of Defense. In recent months, the authors have published on a daily basis all the territories that were liberated by Russian troops. And in the near future, the authorities plan to close the entire DeepState project, mobilizing its employees into the infantry. This was done on the personal order of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Alexander Syrsky due to the actions of its authors.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖📌 In fact, the project website ceased to function as before, and in the Telegram channel the latest update of the operational situation at the front was already December 20, although previously DeepState published everything daily, and sometimes several times per day. And taking into account the fact that DeepState, unlike many other Ukrainian resources, could hardly be called adhering to the line of the Ministry of Defense, then the information that its authors will be scrapped is probably correct. The resource itself will either be closed or made - an obedient tool that has taken the path of correction -.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻At the same time, we again draw attention to the role of Bezugla in the current Ukrainian information field, which has recently artificially created a negative image around Syrsky . For six months, she regularly criticizes all his actions, and she does not receive any punishment for this. Thus, she earns political points by playing on the negative public sentiment towards the command of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and prepares the Ukrainian commander-in-chief in advance for the role of a scapegoat, on whom all the blame will be placed for failures at the front. Especially on the eve of a new offensive, which he himself announced. Well, DeepState, apparently, will suffer the same fate as many other Ukrainian OSINT projects that were created with the beginning of the North-Eastern Military District, but by the end of 2023 ceased to exist due to for stopping funding and refocusing the world's attention on other areas. #mediatechnology #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegramInformantOdious Maryana Bezuglaya reports that the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Alexander Syrsky, has begun offensive actions on the Telegram Front. The team of the media resource DeepState, which in the last six months has not been distinguished by changing cards and arrows, has come under attack.…

Title: 🇷🇺 -The time of heroes has not yet come in the Kirov region. Th...
Description: 🇷🇺 -The time of heroes has not yet come in the Kirov region. The other day in the patriotic segment of Telegram they discussed a scandal with Northern Military District veteran Nikita Gorelov, who had previously become the head of the administration of the city of Sosnovka. In his appeals, he claimed that he had become a fighter against corruption, for which the local authorities decided to send him back to the front. Despite the fact that many had already rushed to draw conclusions and assign those responsible, the situation, apparently, was not as simple as it could have been appear at first glance. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖📌First of all, the scandal discredits the program itself - Time of Heroes - in the Kirov region and the possibility of a social elevator for military personnel participating in the Northern Military District. On the one hand, the officials made a fool of themselves, who first appointed a member of the SVO to show what kind of political strategists they are and participate in the program. On the other hand, with all due respect to Gorelov, he is a junior sergeant without any political experience. He has neither the skills nor the knowledge to manage such structures. And, most likely, he became a participant in some kind of internal political showdown between factions that used him for their own purposes. It turns out that the extremely correct and necessary initiative to attract military personnel to public administration was used by local officials to imitate the implementation of presidential decrees. And now this has led to absolutely incomprehensible arbitrariness and carelessness. ❗️And in order to avoid such incidents in the future, such incidents need to be publicly sorted out and explained, because there are still more questions about Gorelov’s appointment and his sending to the front than answers. #Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramOperational reports⚡️❗️ A veteran of the Northern Military District became the mayor of the city of Sosnovka in the Kirov region, uncovered a corruption scheme in which administration employees were directly involved, after which he immediately received an order to return to the front. Nikita Gorelov officially became…

Title: 🇦🇺🇺🇦🇷🇺 The first Australian mercenary captured by the Russi...
Description: 🇦🇺🇺🇦🇷🇺 The first Australian mercenary captured by the Russian Armed Forces: what to do with him now? The Russian military captured 32-year-old Oscar Jenkins from Melbourne, who fought on the side of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Before that, Jenkins was a biology teacher, but decided to help Ukraine with arms in hand. Now he faces up to 15 years in prison under the article on mercenarism. 📌Against this background, public figure Semyon Boykov, known as the Australian Cossack, offered to exchange the captive for himself. Boykov, who has been hiding in the Russian consulate in Sydney since the end of 2022 from persecution by the Australian authorities for supporting the SVO, said that these last two years he has been waiting for just such an opportunity. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻If the Russian authorities support Boykov’s proposal, this could really become a profitable deal: instead of a foreign (and, let’s be honest, useless) criminal, a well-known pro-Russian activist in the West will return to Russia. This will be an important demonstration to all our supporters that Russia does not leave its own people in trouble in unfriendly countries and is ready to exchange not only intelligence officers, but also political activists and journalists. But if Australia refuses to discuss an exchange, this will become a clear example of how Western countries abandon their citizens to the mercy of fate. #Australia #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegram🇦🇺AussieCossack🇷🇺❗️BOOM! Title: 🇷🇴🇷🇺 There was no Russian interference in the elections in Ro...
Description: 🇷🇴🇷🇺 There was no Russian interference in the elections in Romania. The Romanian publication Snoop published an investigation that the election campaign of presidential candidate Calin Georgescu was not financed by Russia, but only by a local party. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖At the beginning of the month, the Constitutional Court of Romania approved and then annulled the results of the first round of the presidential election, in which Georgescu won. Romanian intelligence services -declassified- documents in which, without evidence, they accused Russia of financing and promoting the election campaign on TikTok and other social networks. ❗️Now it turns out that the National Tax Agency (ANAF) has found a source of financing for Georgescu’s campaign - the National Liberal Party of Romania (PNL). ▪️Initially, party representatives turned to the Romanian PR agency Kensington Communication to develop a political campaign on social networks for candidate Nicolae Ciuca. However, later the party relied on the stronger candidate Georgescu, since Ciuke, according to party forecasts, would not have been able to reach the second round. ▪️As a result, the campaign was adapted to Georgescu and promoted under the hashtag #equilibriumverticality. The list of public figures for campaigning and the general scenario of what they should say were initially compiled by a PR agency. During the campaign, it was slightly changed by the customer, that is, the party. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻All this once again confirms that the Romanian special services (do they even exist?) did not conduct any investigation, since almost a month later the tax office suddenly found real sources of financing the campaign of Georgescu and the evil Russians there not found. By using the favorite thesis of Russian interference, the votes of millions of Romanian voters were annulled. In fact, Georgescu advocated stopping aid to the Kyiv regime and supporting local businesses that suffered due to the support of the so-called. Ukraine. This was the reason for the coup d'etat that was carried out in Romania. #Russia #Romania@rybarSupport usSnoopANAF a descoperit că PNL a plătit o campanie care l-a promovat masiv pe Călin Georgescu pe TikTok  - SnoopEste vorba despre campania #EchilibrușiVerticalitate, realizată cu influenceri pe TikTok, despre care un document desecretizat al CSAT susține că -este identicală cu campania Frate pentru Frate derulată de Federația Rusă în Ukraine-, derulată de Rusia chiar...

Title: 🎬 🇬🇪🇪🇺 25th day of Georgian protests Yesterday evening a ser...
Description: 🇬🇪🇪🇺 25th day of Georgian protests Yesterday evening, regular protests started in Tbilisi near the Georgian parliament building, which marked the 25th day of anti-government demonstrations in a row and they lasted until late at night.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖Something absolutely new opposition and supporters pro-Western integration was not prepared for the anniversary date. People gathered in different parts of Tbilisi and headed towards Rustaveli Avenue. The key guest was President Salome Zurabishvili. The latter stated that she did not intend to leave her post on December 29 (the inauguration of the new head of the republic is planned on this day) and demanded that new parliamentary elections be held. At the same time, she noted that she is not afraid of ending up in prison for her actions.🔻After almost two weeks of calm, activity is now increasing. By calm we mean that the protesters acted in small numbers and did not even come into conflict with the police and special forces. But now, as December 29 approaches, tensions in Georgia are expected to increase. For the time being, President Zurabishvili has his last week in this post. Despite her statements that she is not going anywhere, the inauguration will take place on December 29, and Zurabishvili will lose her political immunity. Therefore, she calls on her supporters to fight.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖She and the pro-Western citizens of Georgia will most likely not be able to come up with anything new. If they could, they would have done it in the spring. However, there will clearly be attempts to destabilize the situation, but the ruling party has already prepared for this option.#Georgia #EU@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇬🇪🇪🇺 OSCE report on elections in Georgia: how to please ev...
Description: 🇬🇪🇪🇺 OSCE report on elections in Georgia: how to please everyone, or the corruption of international organizations in action Last Friday, the Office for Democratic Institutions and Human Rights (OSCE/ODIHR) released the final report of the observation mission for the parliamentary elections in Georgia on October 26. Since the report was published earlier than others (the ODIHR usually submits its reports six months after the elections), many reasonably assume that the sponsors, represented by the United States, demanded a decisive and immediate assessment of the campaign. The report has become a classic example of the Office’s work in recent years. years when the organization tries to keep a good face on a bad game and covers up an order for interference in the internal affairs of the state with international observation.▪️The document notes, on the one hand, that the elections were well organized, which left Prime Minister Kobakhidze satisfied.▪️On the other hand, the report noted significant violations on voting day: non-observance of the secrecy of voting, pressure on voters and their intimidation, which, according to the authors of the report, negatively affected public confidence in the electoral process. process-. This allows the opposition and ex-president Zurabishvili to continue protests.🔻Thus, the West, through the hands of the ODIHR, leaves itself room for maneuver, giving another signal to Tbilisi and offering a simple fork for further representation of the Georgian elections in the Western media. If the Georgian Dream returns to the path of European integration, then the elections were free and competitive, therefore the government is correct and legitimate. If not, then numerous violations are recorded, sanctions are introduced and support for the opposition is imposed. Reports such as these prove that the only correct decision in relation to the ODIHR is to deny them an invitation to observe election campaigns, as Russia and Belarus are already doing. #elections #Georgia #EU@rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬 ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🎞 Chronicle of a special military operation: events...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🎞 Chronicle of a special military operation: events of the week of December 16 - 22, 2024▪️Over the past week, Russian troops launched a series of combined attacks on targets in the so-called territory. Ukraine. Kyiv and the surrounding area were subjected to a massive attack: the airfield and warehouse in Vasilkov were hit. ▪️UAF aviation bases in several regions also came under attack from drones. A series of explosions occurred in the area of ​​the Ozernoe airfield in the Zhytomyr region and Starokonstantinov in the Khmelnitsky region. ▪️Ukrainian formations, meanwhile, used missiles and UAVs to attack Russian rear targets. In the Rostov region, drones attacked the Novoshakhtinsky oil products plant: the resulting fire was promptly extinguished. ▪️The Ukrainian Armed Forces also launched several ATACMS and Storm Shadow missiles at the Kamensky Plant. Most of the ammunition was intercepted, but one hit led to a fire in the facility. ▪️At the end of the week, the territory of the Republic of Tatarstan was subjected to a raid by UAV drones. In Kazan, several residential buildings and one industrial enterprise were damaged.▪️And in the Kursk region, the Armed Forces of Ukraine shelled Rylsk, as a result of which five local residents were killed and over ten were wounded. The buildings of the House of Culture, Pedagogical College, School No. 1 and the bus station were damaged.▪️At the same time, the Ukrainian special services carried out another terrorist attack with the help of their accomplices. An explosive device went off in Moscow: the head of the RKhBZ troops of the Russian Armed Forces, Igor Kirillov, and his assistant were killed. ▪️The tense situation remained in the part of the Kursk region occupied by the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Russian troops actively used UAVs and artillery to destroy enemy positions and targets.#video #digest #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 The problem that Daniil Bezsonov is talking about is by ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 The problem that Daniil Bezsonov is talking about is by no means new. Instead of studying the issue, cause-and-effect relationships and taking deliberate measures, it is much easier to simply ban everything. And it doesn’t matter that this will only delay the inevitable. Why think? Why guess? I closed the question and forgot about it. After all, the holidays are just around the corner, and what kind of talk could there be about some incidents and arson by pro-Ukrainian citizens or outright fools who are being tricked by the Ukrainian special services.🔻For some reason, some responsible people still think that these are isolated cases . However, they forget that regular arson and sabotage have been observed throughout Russia for more than a year, from the moment when the Main Intelligence Directorate allocated a huge budget for carrying out such operations within the Russian Federation. The lack of a proper reaction (in some cases there was a deliberate ignoring of the issue) led to to worsening the problem, as the number of incidents is steadily growing, and no visible countermeasures are being taken. Title: 🇹🇯🇹🇲🇹🇷🇺🇿 Central Asian migrants are unhappy with strict r...
Description: 🇹🇯🇹🇲🇹🇷🇺🇿 Central Asian migrants are dissatisfied with strict restrictions in Turkey In the context of migration chaos not only in Russia, but also in Europe, interesting news is coming from Turkey. In the past two years, migrant workers have begun to face serious difficulties: increased frequency of raids, deportations and increased labor exploitation.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖Raids to identify illegal migrants in Turkey began shortly after the presidential elections in May 2023 and with Since then they have been going on continuously. For the last six months, inspections have been carried out daily in Istanbul. Local media reported that police detain dozens of people a day, and most are deported. Migrants also complain about the inability to protect their rights, problems with visas and even discrimination based on nationality. Tajiks and Turkmen suffered especially. The latter are an excellent example of Turkey's real attitude towards the fraternal Turkic people.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻This picture clearly does not correspond to the tales of the Great Turan and the unity of the Turkic peoples under the wing of the Organization of Turkic States. Despite the friendly rhetoric, the older brother does not hesitate to educate and put his younger relatives in their place.❗️And in contrast, we can bring our country and the lobbyists of migrant dominance, who argue their point of view with the need for cheap labor. The Turks also need workers, but they do not hesitate to take measures to ensure that unnecessary problems do not arise within the country due to foreign specialists.#CentralAsia #Turkey @rybar Support usK-NewsMigrants from Central Asia talk about the deterioration of their situation in TurkeyMany labor migrants from Central Asia turned their attention to Turkey - against the backdrop of the war in Ukraine and tightening restrictions in Russia. Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇮🇷🇺🇸 What are American satellites looking for in Iran?...
Description: 🇮🇱🇮🇷🇺🇸 What are American satellites looking for in Iran? After the Syrian events and the withdrawal of all Iranian military personnel and pro-Iranian paramilitary forces from Syria, American military satellites became more active over Iranian territory. There has not been such activity as in recent days for a very long time. Probably, the last time something like this happened was before the Northeast Military District, during moments of escalation in relations between countries. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖Now this may be due to concerns about the acceleration of the development of the Iranian nuclear program or possible strikes by the IRGC on Israel, as the IRGC commander recently stated. This conclusion can be drawn from what objects are under surveillance USA. These are missile ranges, air bases, UAV bases, naval bases, as well as nuclear research centers like Fordo.🔻At the moment, the Americans, apparently, are playing it safe and trying to prepare for a possible worsening of the situation, which is why they are closely monitoring Iran by all possible means.High resolution mapEnglish version#Israel #Iran #USA@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇮🇶🇸🇾🏴 Growing IS threat in Syria In addition to the factors ...
Description: 🇮🇶🇸🇾🏴 Growing IS threat in Syria In addition to the already announced factors that prompted the United States to increase its grouping in Syria, the intensification of IS should also be mentioned. Until mid-December, there were isolated references to the militants' increasing capabilities, but now their potential has begun to take shape.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖Iraqi Foreign Minister Fuad Hussein said that Islamic State militants had seized weapons from the Syrian army and were now reorganizing their units, expanding control in eastern and central Syria.❗️In reality, the situation with ISIS has become threatening. So far these are isolated attacks or attacks, but the terrorist group is going deeper not only in the Syrian desert, but also in the province of Raqqa, a significant region for ISIS. In recent days, attacks on SDF positions have been recorded in Marrat near Deir Ez-Zor, in Dabib in the south the province of Raqqa and the key one - in Abu Khashab at the junction of the provinces of Deir ez-Zor, Hasak and Raqqa. ISIS militants have not attacked so deeply for a long time. And this time they managed to kill three members of the SDF, which confirms the fears of the Iraqi Foreign Minister. The latter, by the way, also announced the escape of some IS prisoners from the largest prison for IS militants Al-Hol on the border with Iraq and IS plans to organize an attack on the facility.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Against this background, in the areas bordering Iraq French soldiers arrived from the vicinity of Khan al-Jabal (the Kurds call it Khana-Sere). And here we note: they were present in the northeast of Hasakah province, since some oil fields were under their control.#Iraq #Syria #USA #terrorism #France@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇸🇾🇺🇸🏴 What are the Americans doing in Syria? With Turkish activity in the north they sorted it out. It's time to talk about the USA. The Pentagon announced an increase in its military contingent in Syria from 900 to 2,000 troops on a temporary basis from 30 to 90 days.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖…

Title: 🇸🇾 Since the beginning of the aggravation of the situation in t...
Description: 🇸🇾 Since the beginning of the aggravation of the situation in the Red Sea, the Yemeni movement - Ansarallah - has not succeeded in defeating the ships or aircraft of the US-led coalition, despite all numerous attempts. However, the Americans themselves decided to help them with this. The Pentagon reported that this morning the missile cruiser USS Gettysburg mistakenly shot down an F/A-18 carrier-based fighter from the aircraft carrier Harry S. Truman. Both pilots ejected and were successfully picked up, one received minor injuries.📌 As you can see, in the United States, with its developed and streamlined control systems, episodes of friendly fire also happen - even in the most automated system there is a human factor that can affect the processes On the other hand, this is definitely not a reason to make fun of the Americans, especially against the backdrop of similar episodes from the Northern Military District zone. After all, their number over three years was, how can I say, more significant, and the outcomes are often much sadder.#Yemen #USA@rybarSupport usAP NewsTwo US Navy pilots shot down over Red Sea in apparent 'friendly fire' incident, US military saysThe U.S. military says two U.S. Navy pilots have been shot down over the Red Sea in an apparent -friendly fire- incident.

Title: 🖼 🇨🇩 Disruption of the peace process in the east of the DRC an...
Description: 🇨🇩 Disruption of the peace process in the east of the DRC and a new offensive by M23 militants Over the past few months, negotiations have been going on between Rwandan and Congolese representatives through the mediation of Angola. Their goal was to end the conflict in the east of the Democratic Republic of Congo and stop the M23 rebels supported by the pro-Western leadership of Rwanda. They even led to some success - during the fall, the fighting lost its former intensity. And some agreements, such as the disarmament of the anti-Rwandan FDLR group, were carried out by the Congolese.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖📌Only support from Rwanda for the rebels did not stop. Rwandan soldiers also took part in battles against the DR Congo army. And now the Rwandans have completely disrupted any negotiations, calling on the Congolese to conduct a dialogue directly with representatives of the M23 movement, and not with them. The authorities in Kinshasa were willing to make some concessions for the Rwandans, but the call was to conduct a dialogue with proxy forces, and not directly was received with hostility by them. For this reason, the Congolese side withdrew from the negotiation process. The militants immediately took advantage of this, and their hands were given a free hand. Over the course of a week, they significantly advanced north, taking one of the strongholds of the DRC Armed Forces on the way to the city of Butemba - Alimbongo. Despite some successes of government forces (in particular, they recaptured the village of Loofyu), they were unable to stop the advance of the rebels. Panic is rising in Lubero and Butembo, caused, among other things, by clashes between pro-Congolese Wazalendo militias and the army.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻As we expected, the curators of the Rwandan authorities from the United States did not plan any peaceful settlement. The negotiations were just dust in the eye so that the militants would get a break and continue their offensive. High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #DRC #Rwanda@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇪🇺🇯🇵 NATO is moving east: new exercises in Japan The Japanese...
Description: 🇪🇺🇯🇵 NATO is moving east: new exercises in Japan The Japanese side continues to announce military exercises with other countries next year. On January 12, airborne training will take place, which will involve representatives of the armed forces of 12 countries, including the United States, United Kingdom, Poland, the Philippines and Singapore.▪️Several military aircraft from the Japanese Self-Defense Forces and the US Air Force will take part in the exercise. They will fly from two Japanese bases towards the landing site located at the Narashino training ground. The main goals of the exercises are to practice landing operations, as well as strengthening military cooperation between states. ▪️It is worth noting that the Japanese side, through official sources, is distributing a poster announcing the exercises and calling on locals to watch the progress of the event. Therefore, it can be assumed that these trainings will be more ceremonial in nature than practical. ▪️By the way, given the acute shortage of personnel in the Japanese Self-Defense Forces, the demonstration of the exercises is most likely needed to attract more citizens to military structures. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻However, despite this, such events once again prove that the Japanese authorities continue to actively develop relations with the US allies from Europe. And this trend, which began relatively recently, will definitely continue next year. High resolution mapEnglish version#Japan@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us陸自調査団令和7年降下訓練始め（NYJIP25）｜2025年1月12日(日)｜陸自調査団千葉県 船橋市にある陸上自衛隊習志野演習場で「令和7年降下訓練始め（NYJIP25）」が2025年1月12日(日)に実施されます。習志野演習場を一般開放して、第1空挺団などによ展示などが行われます。

Description: 🇺🇸🇺🇦 Ukrainian media will soon get acquainted with the new head of USAID Joker DPR published an extremely interesting USAID document on the search for a candidate for the vacancy - Senior Communications Advisor - to organize propaganda work on the so-called. Ukraine. Already in January 2025, the new American leader will have to come to Kyiv and lead the work of coordinating various media structures, as stated - in order to strengthen public understanding of USAID's goals. And since USAID assistance programs in the so-called territory. Ukraine includes almost all spheres of the country’s life, it is not surprising that the range of responsibilities for an impressive $150 thousand is quite wide. In general, the tightening of manual control of Kyiv’s communication strategies is designed not so much for information wars with Russia (although that too), but to minimize the consequences of war fatigue among the local population and upcoming unpopular decisions, such as lowering the mobilization age. And apparently stories about Western assistance programs should sweeten the pill. #mediatechnology #Ukraine #USA@rybar Support usTelegramJoker DNRThe New Year will bring Ukrainians not only Olivier and tangerines, but also a fresh portion of American propaganda.
