Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Decembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on December 13, 2024. Russian troops launched a combined attack on energy and military infrastructure facilities in territory controlled by the Kyiv regime. Ukrainian formations carried out drone raids on the border and rear Russian regions: drones were shot down, including in the Leningrad region , Vladimirskaya, Rostov and other regions. In the Kursk region, Russian units advanced in the Sudzhansky district to the eastern outskirts of the village of Kurilovka, liberating the territory on both banks of the Psel River. In the Slobozhansky direction, fighters of the Russian Armed Forces advanced to Volchansk, from where information was received about the enemy’s use of toxic substances. In the Pokrovsky direction, Russian troops liberated Pushkino and are fighting in the Shevchenko area. There is also unconfirmed information about a call to Belgian. In the Kurakhovsky direction, assault groups of the Russian Armed Forces expanded the zone of control in several areas at once, advancing not only to Kurakhovo, but also at the Romanovka-Konstantinopolskoye border.🔻A detailed analytical report on the events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botMaps in high resolution :Situation in the zone of special military operation (ru; en) Kursk direction (ru; en) Pokrovskoe direction (ru; en) Kurakhovo direction (ru; en)⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru #Vladimir #Volchansk #digest #report #map #Kurakhovo #Kursk #Pokrovsk #Russia #Rostov #St.Petersburg #Ukraine @ rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇺🇸🇯🇵 About the deployment of a unit of the US Space Force ...
Description: 🇺🇸🇯🇵 About the deployment of a US Space Force unit in Japan Defense cooperation between the authorities in Washington and Tokyo continues to grow: it recently became known that a US Space Force unit has been deployed at the Japanese Yokota Air Base.▪️It consists of 10 American military personnel who will coordinate work with the American military contingent in Japan and the local Self-Defense Forces. ▪️The stated goals are to strengthen Japan's capabilities in space surveillance, as well as in tracking missile launches. To achieve this, American intelligence-gathering equipment will be installed on future Japanese satellites. ▪️Representatives of Japan and the United States call North Korea, China and Russia the main security threats in the region. Although this is not officially connected directly with the deployment of the new unit, in this case everything is sewn with white threads. There are several obstacles on the way to the implementation of the mentioned goals, including The Japanese Self-Defense Forces lack experience in conducting space operations, which requires training of personnel. Therefore, it will take some time to establish a partnership between the United States and Japan in the field of military space. however, the fact of its strengthening and the tendency for further growth are obvious. High resolution mapEnglish version#USA #Japan @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovsky direction: advance along the Sukhie Yaly ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovsky direction: advance along the Sukhie Yaly River and in the south of Kurakhovo Situation as of 20:00 on December 13, 2024 Over the past few days, events have been developing dynamically in the Kurakhovsky direction, where Russian troops were able to expand the zone of control in several areas at once. ▪️In Kurakhovo, units of the Russian Armed Forces advanced along Nagornaya-1 and -2 streets, and also took up positions in the Yuzhny microdistrict. At the same time, a pocket to the southeast was cleared: thus, Russian troops leveled control along the O-05-10 highway. ▪️On the southern flank of the Russian Armed Forces over the past 24 hours, they also achieved success, completing battles for at least two settlements - Annovka and Vesely Gai. In the latter, Russian military personnel planted a flag on a destroyed Ukrainian Armed Forces vehicle, which also confirmed control over the populated area. ▪️Also, attack aircraft of the Russian Armed Forces occupied most of Uspenivka - in the central part of the village, a drone filmed a Russian soldier holding a flag near one of the buildings. The situation in the western part remains unclear, from where the enemy could retreat beyond the O-05-10 route, where he had previously strengthened the defensive lines. 🔻In the near future, Russian troops are highly likely to continue their offensive along the Sukhie Yaly River for the further liberation of Constantinople and Yantarny. Units of the RF Armed Forces can try to encircle these settlements, advancing both in landings from the side of the O-05-10 highway and from the outskirts of Sukhoi Yalov. If you have additions to the situation, you would like us to highlight the successes of your unit, — You can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #Kurakhovo #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇸🇾🏴 Recently, the leader of HTS Abu Muhammad al-Julani made...
Description: 🇸🇾🏴 Recently, the leader of HTS Abu-Muhammad al-Julani made an appeal to Syrians with a call to voluntarily go to the squares after Friday prayers for demonstrations in support of the Syrian revolution. Mass rallies took place in all major cities, including even Latakia. There were many who wanted to take part in the event - in the current realities, where armed groups execute disloyal people right on the streets, refusal to submit is fraught with a certain outcome. Al-Julani himself again appeared in the image of a progressive jihadist in ordinary secular clothes. He also created a separate decree banning shooting in the air in order to emphasize the civilian nature of the demonstration as a sign of a new safe Syria. It is curious that after Giulani’s call to go to rallies, the Kurdish Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF) turned off the Internet in Raqqa under their control and banned any mass gatherings due to fear that the rally will develop into an action against the Kurds. And taking into account their classic habit for the Middle East to disperse demonstrations with machine guns fire, it is possible that after some time there will be a message about the mass death of activists in Raqqa and other territories occupied by the SDF. High resolution mapEnglish version #Syria #terrorism@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇸🇾🇹🇷🇺🇸 As HTS and other groups gradually settle in...
Description: 🇸🇾🇹🇷🇺🇸 As HTS and other groups gradually settle in the Syrian capital and other occupied territories, various external players are actively establishing contacts with militant leaders.▪️Yesterday, the head of Turkish intelligence MİT Ibrahim Kalim visited Damascus for negotiations with Abu Muhamad Al -Juliani. With a high probability, the purpose of the negotiations was to convey to the leader of HTS how Turkey sees the future of Syria and what steps they want to see from him in this direction. ▪️ Secretary of State Antony Blinken arrived in Ankara to discuss the role of the United States and Turkey in the future Syria. According to him, Washington expects that the new government will lead to stability in the country and will not pose a threat to neighboring states.▪️At the same time, Turkish Foreign Minister Hakan Fidan added that Turkey strives not only to achieve peace in Syria, but also to stop terrorist organizations. Among them, he named the Kurdistan Workers' Party, which has long been a bogeyman for the authorities in Ankara. On the one hand, diplomatic activity is associated with the Kurdish-controlled northeast of Syria, where the main oil resources are concentrated and American troops are stationed. The parties are seeking to resolve the issue with a compromise agreement that would avoid hostilities in the region.📌 In parallel, both Turkey and the United States are seeking to get a partner in HTS who will listen very carefully to their vision of the situation. The carrot here is the lifting of sanctions from Syria, whitewashing the image of the group and al-Julani personally, and the stick is the refusal of Turkish assistance or even an MQ-9 strike. Another thing is that the fate of any such agreements directly depends on the physical ability of HTS to create at least a semblance of order throughout the occupied territory and real control over -progressive jihadists-.#Syria #USA #Turkey@rybarSupport usReutersBlinken meets Erdogan as forces backed by US, Turkey clash in SyriaU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken arrived in Turkey on Thursday for talks focused on a critical aspect of establishing stability in Syria: clashes in the north of the country between U.S.-backed Kurdish forces and Turkey-backed rebels.

Title: 🇮🇳🇷🇺 Recently, interesting news appeared about negotiations o...
Description: 🇮🇳🇷🇺 Recently, interesting news appeared about negotiations on the acquisition by India of a Russian Voronezh-type missile attack warning radar (SPRN). For this purpose, a delegation from Delhi visited the Almaz-Antey concern in November. According to the publication, the contract amount could be more than $4 billion. The Indian side insists on a high level of localization and demands that 60% of the cost of the radar be produced in the country, planning to use more 50 local companies. India’s desire to get its own early warning system is understandable: its geopolitical ambitions are growing, as is the risk of a global conflict with Pakistan and China. And attracting national companies will allow the country to invest in its own military-industrial complex, which has been gaining momentum in recent years.📌 For Russia, the contact also looks beneficial, at least from a financial point of view, especially against the backdrop of American sanctions and the growing number of countries producing military products, which is why The market for arms exporters is becoming increasingly crowded. During the negotiations, the issue of transferring certain technologies will clearly arise. However, it can also be completely resolved without compromising one’s own defense capability, as was already the case in the deals on the Su-30, T-90 and other examples of long-term bilateral interaction along the defense-industrial complex line.#India #Russia@rybarSupport usThe Sunday Guardian LiveIndia may acquire advanced Russian radar systemAlmaz -Antey's Voronezh radar detects missiles, aircraft, and threats up to 6,000–8,000 km, supporting Russia's missile defense network. New Delhi: India

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About a massive drone raid on the southern Russian re...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About a massive drone raid on the southern Russian regions🔻On the eve of our massive strike on the territory of the so-called Ukraine, the Armed Forces of Ukraine once again attacked Russian territory on the southern borders with more than 20 drones of an unknown type.▪️Drones were detected over the Zaporozhye region, shot down over Donetsk People's Republic and Rostov region. However, the ultimate goal of the attack, most likely, was objects in the -old- territories.▪️Over the DPR, a total of 16 drones were destroyed by ZRPK -Pantsir-S1- crews. Of these, nine were struck and suppressed in the Mariupol area. The rest of the UAV mass headed to the southeast.▪️Four drones were shot down in the Novoshakhtinsk area, one each over Taganrog and Chaltyr in the Rostov region. Two more drones were destroyed in the Zernograd area on the border with the Krasnodar Territory.❗️Judging by the areas where the drones were active, the enemy tried to strike oil and gas facilities in the south of Russia, as well as Russian aviation airfields. However, the enemy did not achieve success. Nevertheless, the number of drones launched across Russia indicates the preservation of the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ production capacity for assembling drones, which pose a serious threat to both military and civilian Russian facilities. High resolution mapEnglish version#Donetsk #Russia #Rostov #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁🖼 As we wrote, the liberation operation was completed immediat...
Description: Forwarded From NERYBAR As we wrote, south of Kurakhovo, the operation to liberate several settlements along the Sukhie Yaly River was completed - this was confirmed by footage of Russian Armed Forces servicemen with flags in Vesyoly Gai and the center of Uspenivka. It is noteworthy that just yesterday, Ukrainian resources described the situation at the site contradictorily: while some complained about the depressing situation of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, others made do with formulations in the spirit of -everything is under control.- Now the latter, based on new personnel, can finally dispel doubts. Moreover, the de facto loss of control over populated areas was also recognized by the Donetsk Gauleiter Filashkin, who for the first time in a long time did not report on the strikes of the Russian Armed Forces on Uspenovka, Annovka and Vesyolyi Gai. ⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru

Title: 🇲🇩 About Sandu’s negotiations with NATO instead of resolving th...
Description: 🇲🇩 About Sandu's negotiations with NATO instead of resolving the energy crisis The other day, Moldovan President Maia Sandu visited NATO headquarters in Brussels, where she spoke to the North Atlantic Council for the first time. However, the performance took place behind closed doors without access to the press. Sandu also met with the new NATO Secretary General Mark Rutte, to whom she confirmed Chisinau’s commitment to cooperation to ensure the security of citizens. In the public part of the negotiations, nothing new was said, except for reciting memorized formulations about -defending democracy.- However, it is significant that against the backdrop of the onset of an energy collapse in Moldova, Sandu prefers to negotiate with NATO on military cooperation instead of solving pressing problems. ❗️It seems that Sandu’s office is deliberately avoiding solving the energy crisis. First of all, to cause colossal damage to the economy of Transnistria, which risks being left without Russian gas due to a stop in its transit. In Chisinau, they have been pursuing a policy of economic strangulation of the PMR for a whole year, and the process is clearly continuing. It is obvious that Moldova will also suffer greatly from the crisis, but the authorities have done nothing to prevent the impending humanitarian catastrophe. After all, another benefit for Sandu’s office is another opportunity to introduce a state of emergency, which will allow one not to account for part of the decisions made and finances implemented. At the same time, the authorities will be able to better prepare for parliamentary elections in 2025. 🔻As expected, Sandu's re-election allows her to implement the most unpopular scenarios for Moldova. It is obvious that turning the republic into a military springboard for NATO is much more important than solving the socio-economic problems of Moldovans. However, that is why they voted against it. #Moldova #NATO #Transnistria @rybarSupport uspresedinte.mdÎn vizită la Cartierul General al NATO, Președinta Maia Sandu a reafirmat angajamentul Moldovei pentru pacea și securitatea regionalăPreședinta la Cartierul General al Organizației Tratatului Atlanticului de Nord (NATO), cu sediul la Bruxelles, marcând 30 de ani de Parteneriat pentru Pace între Republica Moldova și NATO.

Title: 🎬 🇷🇺🇺🇦 In the morning, Russian troops launched a combined st...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 In the morning, Russian troops launched a combined strike on critical infrastructure facilities in the territory controlled by the Kyiv regime. According to preliminary data, strategic bombers, naval ships and kamikaze UAVs -Geran-2- were involved in the raid. As a result of the attack, the arrival of missiles and drones was recorded in various Ukrainian regions, contrary to the standard stories of the Kiev regime resources about the interception of most targets.▪️According to preliminary data According to data, in the Ivano-Frankivsk region the target was the Burshtyn thermal power plant, which has been systematically hit since the end 2022, as well as the Kolomyia airfield. In the Cherkasy region, hydroelectric power station facilities in Kanev were damaged.▪️In the Lviv region, explosions were heard in the vicinity of Stryi - there is an underground gas storage facility, which had previously been the target of attacks several times. In Odessa, explosions occurred in the area of ​​the Limansky airfield. There was a massive loss of electricity throughout the entire territory controlled by the Kyiv regime, but these could well have been preventive shutdowns. It will be possible to talk about the effectiveness of the raid some time after satellite images appear.#Russia #Ukraine #electricity @rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Last night, Israeli troops launched a series of att...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Last night, Israeli troops launched a series of attacks on the central part of the Gaza Strip. Nuseirat came under the most concentrated fire, where the post office building and several residential buildings near the local cemetery were destroyed. Footage of the consequences of an attack on a populated area is being actively disseminated in Arabic-language media. They show destroyed buildings, injured children, bodies of the dead, as well as the work of rescue teams clearing the rubble. According to the latest data, at least 30 people died, including ten children. More than 50 Palestinians were injured of varying degrees of severity. At the same time, in the Israeli media, in the usual manner, all victims of the raid were classified as Hamas militants. #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of December 13, 2024 ▪️ At night, aft...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of December 13, 2024▪️ At night, after two days of relatively calm air conditions, the Russian Armed Forces launched about 100 Geraniums into the enemy’s rear areas. In the morning, enemy channels reported recording the launch maneuvers of our Tu-95MS. ▪️ In the Kursk region, the North group of troops is waging fierce battles in the north of the Sudzhansky district. Our assault groups advanced into the forest plantations to the east of the settlement. Novoivanovka and in the village Nikolaevo-Daryino. The enemy, having accumulated reserves, resumed active operations and carried out 3 counterattacks with a total number of up to 20 people, but were unsuccessful. ▪️ In the Kharkov direction there are heavy battles in Volchansk. The enemy has reported using chemicals with asphyxiating symptoms. In the Liptsovsky direction, strikes from FPV drones of the Russian Armed Forces thwarted 1 attack of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the area of ​​a dacha village. ▪️ Over the territory of the Rostov region, 9 enemy UAVs were destroyed by air defense this night: in Novoshakhtinsk, Zernogradsky, Myasnikovsky, Neklinovsky districts. 1 UAV of the Ukrainian Armed Forces was destroyed in the evening over the Bryansk region. ▪️ Separate messages are coming from the Kupyansky direction, south of the settlement. Dvurechnaya expands the bridgehead of our troops on the right bank of the Oskol River. ▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces advanced in the southern part of Sontsovka and liberated the settlement. Dawn, also occupying neighboring forest belts. South-west of Pokrovsk (Krasnoarmeysk), our troops are advancing from Novotrotsky to the west.▪️ In the Kurakhovsky direction, units of the Russian Army are already advancing in the central part of Kurakhovo along Nagornaya 1st and Nagornaya 2nd streets, Prokofiev, Zaporozhsky Avenue. The bag of defense of the Armed Forces of Ukraine is collapsing in Uspenovka, Vesyoly Gai, Annovka. The enemy channels characterize the situation as critical.▪️ In the Vremevsky direction, southeast of Velikaya Novoselka, an area of ​​4 by 1.6 kilometers was taken under control. West of Velikaya (Bolshaya) Novoselka, the Russian Armed Forces are advancing in the direction of Storozhevoy and Neskuchny.▪️ On the Zaporozhye Front, the Russian Armed Forces are striking enemy concentration areas and UAV operator points in the Vasilyevsky direction (Stepnogorsk). ▪️ In the Belgorod region at night, the Belgorod district was attacked by enemy drones, one civilian was wounded. In the village of Oktyabrsky, Belgorod district, an FPV drone attacked a car. In the area of ​​the Oktyabrsky village, a commercial building was damaged as a result of an FPV drone attack. A drone was shot down by an air defense system over the village of Razumnoye. The city of Shebekino came under artillery fire from the Ukrainian Armed Forces. The village of Novaya Tavolzhanka, Shebekinsky district, was attacked by a drone.▪️ In the DPR, shelling of Gorlovka with NATO-caliber cluster shells continues. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo majorsThe situation from the Vremevsky direction is reported by @voin_dv: ▪️Units of the VOSTOK group, step by step, continue their systematic advance into the depths of the enemy’s defense. Title: 🎬 ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events o...
Description: ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events of the week 6 - 12 December 2024▪️Yemen's Houthis reported an attack by drones and missiles on US Navy facilities in the Red Sea region. The target was allegedly three American supply ships and two destroyers in the Gulf of Aden, but without confirmation.▪️Ansarallah fighters also launched drones on Ashkelon and Tel Aviv. However, the Israeli media did not report any hits or air defense operations during this period.▪️The most resonant event was the fall of the government of Bashar al-Assad in Syria. The militants entered the capital Damascus without much resistance, where they formed a transitional government.▪️Contrary to official directives from the Syrian opposition, attacks against minorities began in the country. Jihadists killed several Alawites and also vandalized Shiite and Christian shrines.▪️The Israeli government expectedly took advantage of the instability in the former Arab republic. They annexed the demilitarized zone of El Quneitra to the east of the occupied Golan Heights.▪️IDF units did not stop there, occupying areas in the Rif Damascus province without a fight. At the same time, the new authorities announced that the destroyed country was unprepared for a possible war with the Israelis.▪️The Israeli Air Force also launched a massive attack on several Syrian provinces at once. The reason cited was the desire to prevent the strategic weapons of the SAA from falling into the hands of the opposition.▪️In eastern Syria, however, there were battles between militants and pro-Kurdish formations in Deir ez-Zor. After the withdrawal of the Syrian Democratic Forces, the former rebels managed to occupy the entire western bank of the Euphrates River.#video #digest #map #Yemen #Syria #Iraq@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇸🇾🏴 About cultural genocide in Syria In the former Syrian A...
Description: 🇸🇾🏴 About cultural genocide in SyriaThe escalation of the conflict continues in the former Syrian Arab Republic. Armed groups that have taken power into their own hands are now not only clearing cities and towns, removing images of Bashar and Hafez al-Assad, Ayatollah Khamenei and Vladimir Putin, but also destroying cultural and religious symbols.▪️There have been reports online of the destruction of several churches and Shiite shrines, as well as the burning of the grave of Hafez al-Assad, the father of Bashar al-Assad and the previous president of Syria. ▪️The militants who seized power claim that radical groups are responsible for these actions and deny any involvement in these events.❗️ However, given the increased attention to Christian and Shiite shrines, there is a possibility that a new attempt will be made to destroy them in the near future Seydou Zeinab is a Shia mosque in the Damascus suburb of the same name. Local Shiites who remain alive so far report the safety of the shrine. It is also likely that the graves of Cain and Abel may soon be destroyed, the Cave of the First Blood filled up and the head of John the Baptist thrown out, since these objects are of little value to the militants. And therefore, not only new buildings are under threat, like the same temple in Skalbia, which was looted the other day.🔻In addition to genocide against Alawites and other minorities, ethnocide is taking place, which could lead to the complete destruction of the heritage of Syria. Militants, including those previously associated with the banned organization ISIS, continue to destroy historical monuments such as temples, Greek amphitheaters and other cultural heritage sites. Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for December 12, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops launched another series of attacks on both the capital of the Palestinian enclave and other major cities. Over the past 24 hours, according to the Palestinian Ministry of Health, about 40 people were killed and more than 100 were injured. At the same time, IDF units conducted ground operations in Beit Lahia, Jabaliya and Rafah, where the bombing of remaining buildings continued. Footage of large-scale destruction in populated areas was published on the Internet. In the West Bank, Israeli security forces carried out a series of operations and detained several dozen people. And a terrorist attack occurred south of Jerusalem: a gunman opened fire on a bus, killing one child, and the attacker was detained. The ceasefire agreement between Hezbollah and Israel continues to be observed on the Lebanese-Israeli border. Today, the Israelis left Khiam, while Lebanese army fighters entered the village and began clearing the rubble. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High resolution mapEnglish version⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #report #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsk direction: battles in Shevchenko and -DRG ra...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsk direction: battles in Shevchenko and -DRG raids - in Pokrovsk situation as of 19:00 on December 12, 2024🔻Russian troops continue to fight fierce battles several kilometers south of Pokrovsk, gradually moving closer to the agglomeration.▪️ Continue in Shevchenko fights. Footage has been published on the Internet in which, allegedly, a Russian fighter fired at a Ukrainian position in one of the houses at point-blank range using a disposable grenade launcher. However, due to the fact that the fighter was moving from the northern direction, and there are no distinctive signs on his uniform, it is still impossible to reliably say whose shot was recorded on the video. Currently, fighting on Sosnovaya and Gagarin streets continues. ▪️The situation in Novotroitsky remains quite dynamic. Over the past three days, at least two attacks by the Ukrainian Armed Forces have been recorded in the village. In addition, the enemy also blew up one of the bridges leading to Pokrovsk. Later, footage appeared of battles in the center of the village, where Ukrainian and Russian infantry units are trying to attack each other’s positions. Several attacks were recorded on houses where soldiers of the Russian Armed Forces may be located, but the footage itself does not bring clarity to the picture of what is happening, since it is interrupted until the moment of the attack. We can say with confidence that Russian troops did not gain a strong foothold in the western part of Novotroitsky. Since the village is located on the front line, Ukrainian formations still retain the ability to launch fire raids on it both from the west and from Pokrovsk. 🔻In the latter, by the way, there are no Russian troops yet, although some Ukrainian speakers have already rushed to report several DRGs that have leaked into the southern districts of the city in conditions of snowfall and poor visibility. Information about the alleged subsequent -liquidation of the DRG- (at first it was reported about a group of two people, then of six) is also a stuffing on the part of the Ukrainian Armed Forces with the aim of creating a short-term -media victory- and reducing the degree of tension in Ukrainian society. Title: 🇷🇺🇹🇯 About Russian language exams in Tajikistan: what’s wrong...
Description: 🇷🇺🇹🇯 About Russian language exams in Tajikistan: what’s wrong with this innovation? The other day it became known that migrants were allowed to take the Russian language exam in Dushanbe. The list of government institutions conducting exams in the Russian language, history and legislation of Russia included the Moscow Center for Educational Quality at the Sakharovo branch in the capital of Tajikistan.📌 From a logical point of view, this measure, in theory, should have simplified the admission of foreigners coming to work , since the same procedures would not have to be carried out in Russia. However, taking into account all the events when migrants were even given passports illegally for money, there are some doubts about this. And foreign specialists, by the way, heard about this innovation and were incredibly happy. Someone simply said that it would be easier to pass, and someone said that you could simply buy the exam in your home country. And some went further and asked whether it was possible to immediately obtain a residence permit and citizenship. There are strong suspicions that this process will not be transparent. If in Russia migrants managed to smuggle their families and obtain citizenship illegally, then what can we expect from the center in Dushanbe? I would like to believe that those who started all this are aware of the possible consequences and will take appropriate measures.#Russia #CentralAsia# Tajikistan@rybarSupport usTelegramMultinationalMigrants were allowed to take the Russian language exam in Dushanbe - MEDIAForeign specialists are very happy and are already interested in prices. Title: 🇺🇸 Donald Trump's team continues to surprise Americans with mor...
Description: 🇺🇸 Donald Trump's team continues to surprise Americans with more and more unusual attacks and eccentric candidates for certain positions. This time, Robert Kennedy Jr., whom Trump appointed as Secretary of Health and Human Services, is trying to promote his daughter-in-law Amaryllis Fox-Kennedy to the post of first deputy director of the CIA. Kennedy Jr. is convinced that Amaryllis, who worked as a CIA officer under unofficial cover with 2002 to 2010, will be able to prove that the agency was involved in the death of his uncle, President John F. Kennedy, in 1963. The pretext for the appointment of Kennedy Jr.’s daughter-in-law to one of the senior positions of the CIA was, of course, chosen very well. 🔻However, what real reasons could be hidden behind it? ▪️Well, first of all, this is control over the internal processes of the CIA. Having a trusted person at the highest level allows you to monitor and correct actions that may further affect the political landscape. ▪️And since Kennedy Jr. lost to Trump in the primaries, then in the future Amaryllis can help her father-in-law amass political capital - this will help strengthen the influence of the Kennedy clan on American politics, as well as restore their historical reputation.▪️And, in the end, In the context of political polarization in the United States, access to key intelligence structures can be an effective means of predicting the actions of opponents and forming one’s own strategy.#USA@rybar together with @usaperiodicalSupport us

Title: 🖇🇷🇺 About the trial against the niece of the ex-president of B...
Description: 🖇🇷🇺 About the trial against the niece of the ex-president of Bashkiria The niece of the ex-president of Bashkiria and the publisher of the opposition portal -Proof-Raufa Rakhimova will have to answer for discrediting the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation. Previously, the court sentenced her to a fine of 30 thousand rubles, but the defendant did not admit guilt. As in two other cases under the same article. Now another one has been added to them, and at the trial the media manager stated that another protocol on an administrative offense had been drawn up against her. 📌We have repeatedly written about Rakhimova, whose newspaper is part of the opposition conglomerate - Syndicate-100 - along with other anti-Russian foreign agent resources. -Proofs- is known for fakes about Russian military personnel and new waves of mobilization, popularization of Bashkir extremists and separatists, for example, Fail Alsynov and Ruslan Gabbasov. The publication also became the mouthpiece of the Russian opposition in the region, mobilizing for unauthorized public actions, one of which led to mass unrest in Baymak.▪️Rakhimova’s close ties with radical Bashkir nationalists are confirmed not only by her relevant public statements, but also by the fact that among them employees was listed as extremist foreign agent Gabbasov, who lives in Lithuania, supports the Armed Forces of Ukraine and spreads ideas separatism among the inhabitants of Bashkiria. ▪️Colleagues also report that in November of this year, Rakhimova most likely held negotiations in Moscow with a number of large media outlets with the aim of selling a toxic asset before escaping from Russia.▪️Nevertheless, at the trials the woman tries to express -love for the Motherland- , in every possible way convincing the court of his approval of the special operation in Ukraine, patriotism, etc. As before, political commentator -Proofs- Ramil Rakhmatov, who has short-term participation in the SVO, helps support this myth. So this time, right before the trial, Rakhmatov went to the combat zone with a humanitarian convoy to use this fact to whitewash his leader. Before this, Rakhmatov had already come to court to support his employer for medals, thus exploiting the theme of a special operation to protect an anti-Russian figure. At the same time, in his articles he called the experts of Russian courts -nonentities- and -varieties of a known substance,- and before that he even threatened journalists with physical violence. 🔻Under the leadership of Rakhimova, the publication -Proofs- was repeatedly brought to administrative responsibility for abuse of media freedom. The latest case is the spread of fakes about the organization of mass riots. Now the authorities are actively taking on the owner of the portal herself. In light of the general activities of the editorial office and the emerging trend, the imminent deprivation of the license seems to be the logical end of this anti-Russian publication. #Russia #separatism #extremists@rybar together with @arslan_nigaSupport usTelegramKommersant BashkortostanThe Supreme Court of Bashkortostan yesterday upheld without change the resolution of the Kirovsky District Court of Ufa, which imposed a fine of 30 thousand. rub. media manager, publisher of the portal -Proofs- and niece of the ex-president of Bashkortostan Murtaza Rakhimov, Raufa Rakhimova. Title: 🖼 🇸🇴Situation in Somalia: crisis in Jubaland Summary for Novem...
Description: 🇸🇴The situation in Somalia: the crisis in Jubaland Summary for November 22 - December 12, 2024 The political crisis in Jubaland has reached the peak of escalation. In the city of Ras Kamboni, where Somali troops and local militias from among the Jubaland Dervish forces had previously been sent, clashes took place.▪️During short fighting, a brigade of the Somali army, trained in Turkey, Gorgor, suffered heavy losses and partially surrendered to the separatists. while other soldiers fled to Kenya. The surrounding areas of the city also came under the control of local forces. After a break with the federal authorities, the Jubaland authorities abandoned dialogue and proceeded to escalate the conflict. It’s interesting that they took their elite abroad in advance. Thus, the Minister of National Security of Jubaland was taken out of the country under the escort of Ethiopian troops.🔻And all this is happening against the backdrop of negotiations on reconciliation between Somalia and Ethiopia, held in Ankara. According to the final communique, both sides agreed on mutually beneficial commercial agreements and sustainable access to the sea. ❗️But this does not mean that the Ethiopian authorities will stop secretly supporting separatists in Somaliland and, now, in Jubaland. Due to the rapprochement of the leadership in Mogadishu with the Egyptians, who are the Ethiopians’ rivals in the struggle for regional influence, other provocations should be expected. Moreover, the true intentions of the Ethiopians were emphasized by the visit of the head of the administration of the Ethiopian national district of Somalia to Hargeisa to meet with the President of Somaliland.▪️In addition to the events in Jubaland, the situation in the fight against terrorism also remains stable and tense. Some al-Shabab attacks take place near the capital. At this time, in autonomous Puntland, the armed forces are preparing an offensive against the Islamic State militants hiding in the rugged mountains. The latter, with the help of Western media, have managed to turn into almost the main base of the international terrorist group. We will find out what they really are in the near future. High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #Somalia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇦🇲🇫🇷🇺🇸 About the military cooperation of Armenia with Franc...
Description: 🇦🇲🇫🇷🇺🇸 About the military cooperation of Armenia with France and the USA Representatives of the military departments of Armenia and France signed a defense cooperation program for 2025 in Yerevan. The parties noted the strategic importance of the relations between the two countries, which include military planning, education and exercises. The Armenian Ministry of Defense did not provide more detailed details of the agreement. Recently, a meeting between Armenian and US Defense Ministers Suren Papikyan and Lloyd Austin also took place in Washington. A short summary from the Pentagon noted that such a meeting took place for the first time in 20 years, and the parties confirmed the strategic partnership of the two countries in achieving lasting peace in the South Caucasus. Both news feeds predictably caused a storm of emotions in the Armenian information field, but it is significant that, at least publicly, neither the French nor the American sides promised anything fundamentally new for Armenia in the field of security. Perhaps we can note the promises of the Americans to develop a new military uniform for the Armenians. 🔻Apparently, it is important for the outgoing administration of President Joe Biden to outline American priorities in Armenia. Moreover, as we wrote, it is still unclear what role the South Caucasus will play in Donald Trump’s policies. However, the State Department adviser is already working hard in the Armenian Ministry of Defense, and they promise to reform the Armenian army to NATO standards. For the government of Nikol Pashinyan, both events are important in domestic political terms, creating the appearance of building a new security system for Armenia, and even more so after Yerevan’s regular claims against the CSTO. However, as current practice shows, relying solely on external assistance in regional contradictions does not necessarily protect against complete collapse. #Armenia #USA #France @rybarSupport us. 2025 November 10-ին ՀՀ News News News The նախարարության…

Title: 🇩🇪🇸🇾🇺🇸🏴 Crisis in Syria: what will happen to the Islamic S...
Description: 🇩🇪🇸🇾🇺🇸🏴 Crisis in Syria: what will happen to the Islamic State? The other day, US Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin said that IS militants could take advantage of the collapse of the Syrian government and restore their combat effectiveness in the Middle East. But the head of the Pentagon is disingenuous : The group is already gradually increasing its activity. Even during the offensive of the pro-Turkish conglomerate, IS terrorists resumed attacks in the Syrian desert. A few days ago, the Americans, as they say, carried out an operation against them, hitting about 75 targets, but did not provide any facts, so we cannot take the press release of the joint central command at its word worth it.❗️A huge role in the possible restoration of the combat potential of the Islamic State was played by the terrorists themselves from the Idlib reserve, who freed everyone along the way prisoners from all prisons, including notorious ISIS thugs. Does anyone seriously think that the extremists have reformed while in prison? They became even angrier - much more likely. And the unrest, lynching, and lynching that are now happening are only to the advantage of the Islamic State.🔻And this applies not only to Syria or neighboring countries. In Europe, the radicals weren’t hiding much anyway, but now they’ve raised their heads high. In Germany, three IS supporters were detained with rifles and ammunition in the states of Hesse and Baden-Württemburg. And this is just the beginning, since with the waves of refugees, not only civilians fleeing war, but also terrorists or supporters of extremist ideology will infiltrate into the EU countries.#Germany #Syria #USA #terrorism@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the night drone raid on Crimea That night, Ukra...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the night drone raid on Crimea This night, Ukrainian formations again attacked Crimea. But it was not a massive and terrifying attack, as Ukrainian resources called it. The Ukrainian Armed Forces used only eight drones.▪️The alarm about the danger in the air in Crimea and Sevastopol lasted for more than two hours due to the fact that the enemy launched drones one or two at a time, but no more. Because of this, the air defense work was long.▪️The first UAV was shot down by a Su-34 fighter 30 km west of Cape Tarkhankut. The next one was two hours later in the area of ​​Cape Khersones in Sevastopol - apparently he was flying to Sevastopol Bay.▪️Then two UAVs were destroyed on approach to the Balaklava Thermal Power Plant, another drone was destroyed over Cape Fiolent from the air defense missile system -Pantsir-S1-. Half an hour later, two more drones were suppressed 5 km west of Sevastopol and another one was shot down in the area of ​​the thermal power plant.❗️The attack was expected and completely standard without any changes. It is not entirely clear what type of drone was used. We do not rule out that this was again the same know-how of the Ukrainian regime, which intercepted the MiG-29 the day before yesterday. However, the danger of new attacks remains. The enemy's actions show that preparations are underway for massive raids and missile strikes, so it is better to remain vigilant in the next few days. High resolution mapEnglish version#Crimea #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Late at night, another tragedy occurred in the West...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Late at night, another terrorist attack occurred in the West Bank: near the small settlement of Al-Khader south of Jerusalem, a gunman opened fire on a bus carrying civilians. The driver continued on his way and reached a checkpoint at the entrance to the Israeli capital - the victims were treated there, but a twelve-year-old child received non-life-threatening injuries. Meanwhile, the attacker tried to escape, but was quickly detained in the Bethlehem area by Israeli soldiers. The terrorist turned out to be a resident of Beit Ava - apparently, searches will be carried out in his house in the near future. 📌Such incidents are nothing new for the Palestinian Authority - they occur quite regularly. At the same time, Hamas often calls such terrorist attacks a response to the Israeli Defense Forces’ aggression in the Gaza Strip. #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 🇺🇦🇵🇱🇫🇷 By the way, about Macron’s peacekeeping mission a...
Description: Forwarded From Warsaw Mermaid🇺🇦🇵🇱🇫🇷 By the way, about Macron’s peacekeeping mission and how it is perceived by the Poles. Despite the active resistance to this idea in the media from officials at various levels, one cannot help but recall Jaroslaw Kaczynski’s statements regarding this kind of mission. In the fall of 2022, during a pre-election tour of Polish cities, the leader -Rights and Justice- compared the Northern Military District in Ukraine with a series of armed conflicts on the territory of what was then Yugoslavia in 1990-2001. At the same time, he stated that the situation in Ukraine now is much worse. There was a war in Yugoslavia, but it was of a special nature. There were many fronts, many opponents, and everything happened on a territory that was clearly smaller than the territory of Poland, because Yugoslavia is 240 thousand km. The war was such that they shot here and danced there. I say all this from my own experience, because I was there. In any case, this had little to do with what was happening in Ukraine,- the politician said then. Here are the supporters of organizing a certain -peacekeeping mission- in Ukraine: they seriously believe that a -humanitarian- intervention in Yugoslavia in the form of a reset more than 30 thousand cluster bombs - it was something between dancing and shooting. Now think about the nature of the intervention awaiting Ukraine. #Poland #Ukraine@pl_syrenka - Poland is not a foreign countryTelegramRybar🇵🇱🇫🇷🇺🇦 French President Emmanuel Macron will arrive in Poland tomorrow to discuss the plan for a European peacekeeping mission, which should preserve the sovereignty of the so-called. Title: 🔁🎬 We have already published the advantages of disposable bulle...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors We once already published the advantages of disposable loaded belts for machine guns 🇷🇺 The footage shows the method of storing ammunition in a box (7.62x51, .308) NATO ⚡️ Please note: disposable belts are stored immediately equipped with 200 pieces. in vacuum packaging, not in iron zinc.✨That is, when working with NATO machine gun belts, the algorithm is as follows: opened the box, loaded the weapon with the finished belt, and started shooting. Ours needs to: open the iron zinc with cartridges, find a clean machine-gun belt, equip it manually or using a Rakov machine, only after all these long manipulations will the machine-gun crew be ready for battle. These procedures are not always convenient to carry out in the mud of trenches. We ask our dear gunsmiths to pay attention to the approach of evil foreigners to the use of modern technologies in the military industry. Two majors

Title: 🇨🇳🇹🇼 About new Chinese exercises in the Asia-Pacific region.....
Description: 🇨🇳🇹🇼 About new Chinese exercises in the Asia-Pacific region New military maneuvers of the Chinese army have begun. According to reports from Taiwanese and Western sources, about 90 PLA ​​Navy ships are participating, deployed not only near the island, but also in other areas, as well as Chinese aircraft.▪️The official goals and objectives of the exercise remain unknown. Chinese authorities have yet to make any announcement regarding the training, although it is believed to have started on December 9. In general, the maneuvers are actively discussed only in Taiwan, as well as in the Western press. However, taking into account both the statements of Taiwanese sources and the areas of activity of Chinese aviation and naval forces, several conclusions can be drawn. ▪️Firstly, the exercises are not only aimed at containing Taiwan. Chinese forces are conducting training both near the island and in the South China and East China Seas. The Chinese are believed to be active throughout almost the entire First Island Chain, a strategically important area stretching from Japan to Southeast Asia. The first chain of islands actually encircles the entire coast of China. Control over it, which the Americans are striving for, makes it possible to contain the PRC militarily. During the current exercises, the Chinese are working on measures to limit access to it from the inside. Therefore, Chinese technology was observed both near the Philippines and near the Japanese islands. ▪️Secondly, the main purpose of the exercises is most likely not to punish Taiwanese politicians. Yes, the leader of the island, Lai Qingde, last week visited American territories in the Pacific Ocean in transit, which the Chinese authorities did not really like. However, comparing the areas of previous exercises, which began after the actions of the Taiwanese and surrounded only the island, with the current ones, it becomes clear that the matter lies not only in the activities of the local administration. 🔻Perhaps such large-scale exercises are intended to send a signal to the future American administration and the elected US President Donald Trump. This is necessary to show China's influence on the first island chain and prove China's willingness to take control of it. Let us emphasize that the Chinese authorities have not yet made any substantive comments on the ongoing exercises. Therefore, the situation may become clearer after they are completed. High resolution mapEnglish version#China #Taiwan @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of December 12, 2024 ▪️ In the evenin...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of December 12, 2024▪️ In the evening, the enemy attempted a massive UAV raid on Sevastopol, the governor reported that air defense and Black Sea Fleet units shot down 5 UAVs, 2 drones were suppressed by electronic warfare. There were also reports of downed targets over the sea. At the same time, several heads of regions wrote about the missile threat, in some it has already been canceled. At Sochi airport, the plan -Carpet-▪️ was introduced. At 00:55 in Grozny, a drone was shot down over the barracks buildings of a special police regiment of the Ministry of Internal Affairs for the Chechen Republic. 4 guard soldiers were slightly injured. The personnel on duty at that time were in premises protected from such attacks, Kadyrov wrote.▪️ During the day, the Russian Ministry of Defense reported that six American-made ATACMS ballistic missiles were used in the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ attack on Taganrog last night. -This attack by Western long-range weapons will not go unanswered, appropriate measures will be taken,- the defense department stated.▪️ In the Kursk region, the North group of troops continues its offensive in the north of the Sudzhansky district, and has advanced east of the settlement. Novoivanovka, as well as in forests near the village. Malaya Loknya. A new element of the situation, according to local assessments, was the refusal of the Ukrainian Armed Forces to carry out counterattacks, the enemy’s concentration on holding positions and the creation of tension in other sections of the state border. The advance of the Northerners continues in the forest areas to the west of the settlement. Plekhovo. During the cleanup, 1 serviceman of the 129th TrO brigade was captured; in total, 502 servicemen of the Armed Forces of Ukraine are in captivity.▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces are expanding the zone of control to the south of the city. Fighting is taking place on the outskirts of Vozrozhdenie (New Labor), near Shevchenko and in the Novotroitsky area. ▪️ The group of troops - East - south of Kurakhovo is gradually moving on the right bank of the river. Dry Yaly. Fighting continues in the area of ​​the settlement. Merry Guy and Constantinople. Intense fighting is taking place northeast of Velikaya Novoselka; the Ukrainian Armed Forces are counterattacking in the area of ​​Novy Komar and Razdolnoye. South of Velikaya Novoselka, the enemy, with the support of armored vehicles, attempted to attack our positions in Oktyabr (Blagodatnoe) and was destroyed. There is an advance of the Armed Forces in the Ravnopol area, our units are gradually advancing through forest belts. The summary was compiled by: Two majors Telegram Two majors Situation in the South Donetsk direction, reports @voin_dv: Fierce fighting continues along the entire front line. ▪️In the area south of Kurakhovo, gradual progress is being made on the right bank of the river. Dry Yaly. Fighting continues in the area of ​​the settlement. Funny…

Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for December 11, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops attacked Jabaliya and Beit Lahia. The southern quarters of the capital of the Palestinian enclave were also hit, and there were no casualties. In the central part of the enclave, Nuseirat remained under the most concentrated fire, where six people were killed. In the south, engineering work is underway in the Philadelphia Corridor. Police raids continue in the West Bank. In Nablus, Palestinians fired at an Israeli civilian vehicle, injuring three adherents of Braslav Hasidism. Yemen's Houthis reported a combined attack on supply ships and US Navy destroyers in the Gulf of Aden. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Decembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on December 11, 2024. Ukrainian formations used six ATACMS operational-tactical missiles to strike the Taganrog aviation scientific and technical complex in the Rostov region. In the Bryansk region, the enemy attacked the territory of the Druzhba oil pipeline with drones. At the same time, over the Black Sea, the air defense systems of the Russian Armed Forces intercepted the drone missile of the Ukrainian Armed Forces -Peklo-. In the Pokrovsky direction, Russian units reached the western outskirts of Novy Trud (Vozrozhdeniye), knocking out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from several forest belts and forest areas. In parallel with this, the Russian Armed Forces are fighting on the northern outskirts of Shevchenko and in the Novotroitsky area. In the Kurakhovo direction, Russian troops are liquidating a pocket south of Kurakhovo. The attack aircraft knocked out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from most of Vesyoly Gai and almost completely cleared the southern bank of the Sukhie Yala River. At the same time, from the north they are advancing on Uspenovka, the liberation of which will close the encirclement ring around the enemy garrison in Annovka. In the Vremyevsky direction, the Russian Aerospace Forces attacked the enemy crossing in the Novoocherevatoy area. At the same time, heavy fighting is taking place in the vicinity of Novy Komar and Razdolnoye. A detailed analytical report on the events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the special military operation zone (ru; en) Pokrovsky direction (ru; en) )Kurakhovskoe direction (ru; en) ⭐️ Online maps are available by subscribing to map.rybar.ru#Bryansk #Vremevka #digest #report #map #Kurakhovo #Pokrovsk #Rostov #Russia #Ukraine @rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsk direction: fighting in Novotroitsky situatio...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsk direction: fighting in Novotroitsk situation towards the end of December 11, 2024🔻Russian troops are consolidating on the western outskirts of the settlement of Novy Trud (Vozrozhdenie). Probably, the enemy was also knocked out of the forest to the south near the railway, since without control over him an attack towards the village would have been impossible.▪️With the liberation of Novy Trud, the Russian Armed Forces provide a bridgehead for encircling enemy positions in Zeleny and Dachenskoye from the west, simultaneously with thereby attacking from the east from Lysovka. In the future, this will make it possible to eliminate the pocket along the section of the M-30 highway between Dachensky and Novy Trud.▪️ At the same time, the enemy made an unsuccessful attack attempt in the village of Shevchenko. Two armored vehicles of the Ukrainian Armed Forces and a tank were blown up at minefields on the northern outskirts of the village by the Russian Armed Forces. Exactly how they were installed - from the air or by sappers manually - is not yet known. It is possible that at the moment the village has already been taken under control by Russian troops.▪️To the west, fighting continues in Novotroitsky, on the eastern outskirts of which Ukrainian formations are trying from time to time to organize fire raids under the cover of armored vehicles. If you have any additions to the situation, you would like we highlighted the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botMap in high permissionEnglish version#digest #map #Pokrovsk #Russia #Ukraine@rybar⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ruSupport us

Title: 🇵🇱🇫🇷🇺🇦 French President Emmanuel Macron will arrive in Pola...
Description: 🇵🇱🇫🇷🇺🇦 French President Emmanuel Macron will arrive in Poland tomorrow to discuss the plan for a European peacekeeping mission, which should preserve the sovereignty of the so-called. Ukraine within the framework of a possible agreement between the United States and the Russian Federation. Details of the plan are not disclosed, but it is known that it is based on the Korean scenario. According to it, a foreign contingent of peacekeeping forces is introduced to the demarcation line. Macron's idea received tacit approval from the UK in November. Poland's participation in this strategy is presented as decisive due to its military potential and geographical location. And it is clear why the French President expects special support from the Poles: after all, in this way they would be able to legally approach Vskhodny Kresy. It is interesting that there has already been a reaction to Macron’s plan in Warsaw: the head of the Polish Ministry of Defense, Wladyslaw Kosiniak-Kamysh, said that the sending of Polish soldier on so-called Ukraine is out of the question, since the key role here should be played by NATO, and not by individual countries. At the same time, after a long time, the Poles again started talking about legalizing their mercenaries who are fighting for the Armed Forces of Ukraine illegally - Officially this should be punishable by up to five years in prison. The details of the initiative are unknown, but they say that the bill provides for forgiveness and oblivion of crimes and misdemeanors from February 24, 2022 to December 31, 2026 for joining the Armed Forces of Ukraine without the consent of the competent authority of Poland. That is, in addition to the fact that the Poles will be allowed to fight unhindered in .n. Ukraine will also be allowed, in fact, to do it as it pleases - no criminal prosecution is provided for. In this situation, it will be possible not to take the Poles prisoner. However, it is worth understanding that in reality we are not talking about a peacekeeping mission as such - that is, the deployment of blue helmets, which will essentially perform police functions in no man's land: for Neither people nor special equipment will be enough for this. 🔻The conversation concerns the introduction of a limited contingent of NATO troops, who could thus simply take over Ukrainian territory. And this, in turn, means a truly serious military escalation with the Russian Federation. As a result, the parties will probably not reach any solution: none of the European governments is ready to take on such responsibility and thereby face the threat of a nuclear strike. But for now, you can distract yourself from internal political crises, economic collapse and social tension, and pretend to be hegemons, pretending that the fate of the entire Western world depends on the participation of France or Poland.#Poland #France #Ukraine@rybar together with @pl_syrenkaSupport usTelegramVarshavskaya mermaid🇵🇱🇫🇷🇺🇦 Poland is expecting a visit from French President Emmanuel Macron. He intends to discuss the plan for a European peacekeeping mission, which should preserve the sovereignty of Ukraine within the framework of a possible agreement between the United States and the Russian Federation. The Polish media are delighted: leave France...

Title: 🇬🇧🇷🇺🌓 And again about the British influence on the migration...
Description: 🇬🇧🇷🇺🌓 And again about British influence on the migration situation in Russia. In recent days, the topic of the migration situation in Russia, the possible consequences and the destructive influence of Western intelligence services (primarily the UK) on what is happening has been raised in the highest political circles.➖Today, the director of the FSB Alexander Bortnikov, who stated that the activities of Western intelligence services are aimed at creating artificial hotbeds of tension through ethno-confessional specifics.❗️This is a serious fact, since the head of such a structure as the FSB personally drew attention to this problem.➖Before this, State Duma deputy Andrei Lugovoi spoke about the same, who noted the urgent need for a legislative settlement of migration issues and preventing hostile activities of foreign agents in this direction. The role of Western intelligence services and the organizations they feed on the territory of Russia is extremely high, if not called key at all. It was the discovery of these facts that became the reason for their expulsion in September of this year, and then again in November. The program to undermine the internal political situation in Russia was born back in the 90s, but only at the beginning of this century did intensive work begin on the implementation of a multi-year project aimed at the destruction of Russia from the inside.🔻And the actions of Great Britain in this direction are easy to determine if you can look into the details. Recently, the British MI5 and MI6 were prohibited from accepting -white citizens- for internships. Minorities fell into new categories (blacks, Asians, Arabs, and so on). It would seem, why would the British infringe on the rights of the indigenous population? But under the guise of working on the Western agenda, the British made a significant feint to create personnel intelligence officers for foreign intelligence, including from representatives of the nations of Central Asia. The British have made similar steps throughout their history. During the Great Game in Afghanistan, foreign intelligence schools functioned in India, where recruitment was carried out from among the population inhabiting the region, with subsequent transfer to the zone of Russian influence. A very similar scheme, isn’t it? Only instead of professional intelligence officers, thousands of migrants from Central Asia arrive in Russia, more than half of whom have a vague history. For what purpose is this being done - you can see the answer in the migration situation in Russia.#Great Britain #multinationalism #Russia@rybarSupport usThe TelegraphWhite British students not allowed to apply for security services internshipDecision described as 'blatant discrimination' and 'racist' as MI5, MI6 and GCHQ try to increase diversity among their ranks

Title: 🇺🇸🇵🇭🇯🇵 The United States, the Philippines and Japan continu...
Description: 🇺🇸🇵🇭🇯🇵 The United States, the Philippines and Japan continue to strengthen their security cooperation. ▪️Recently, the first round of trilateral maritime dialogue took place, at which the authorities of the countries discussed the issues of the South China Sea. ▪️The parties criticized the actions of the PRC in the water area, and also promised to further increase cooperation. Conducting joint exercises with other partners in the region was also discussed. ▪️In general, nothing new was said by representatives of the USA, Japan and the Philippines. Important agreements and even hints of them were also absent. This is largely explained by the format of the meeting - the level of representatives was quite low, and the dialogue itself is more of a platform for discussing problems, rather than something more significant. ▪️However, despite the lackluster nature of the event, its holding is another sign of growing close ties between the Philippines, the USA and Japan. Of course, there is no talk of a conventional analogue of a military alliance in the region yet, but the formalization of cooperation between the three countries is happening right now. 📌By the way, it’s funny that the incident with the use of lasers by the Chinese was revealed the day before the meeting. It originally happened last week, but the video appeared only recently. Of course, it is impossible to prove a direct connection between these events. However, it is difficult to deny the fact that before such negotiations in the South China Sea, similar incidents or exercises occur, only heating up the situation. #USA #Philippines #Japan@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usINQUIRER.NETPH-US-Japan maritime talks flag 'unlawful' Chinese behavior in West PH SeaMANILA, Philippines – The Philippines, United States and Japan raised -serious concerns- over China's repeated blocking and harassment of Philippine vessels in the West Philippine Sea during their inaugural trilateral maritime talks in Japan.

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Deir ez-Zor province): militants tak...
Description: ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Deir ez-Zor province): militants capture the administrative center of the region, situation as of 17.00 December 11, 2024. In the province of Deir ez-Zor, fighting continues between the Kurdish Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF) and associations led by - Hayat Tahrir al-Sham- (HTS) and -Syrian National Army- (SNA).▪️Pro-HTS militants -Department of Military Operations - completely took control of the city of Deir ez-Zor and the military airport located there. The Kurds did not offer resistance and went to the opposite bank of the Euphrates. ▪️In the Kurdish media, the retreat from previously taken (actually handed over by the SAR armed forces who fled from there) territories was explained by some agreements with the terrorists - Hayat Tahrir al-Sham - concluded through the mediation of the Americans. The condition was the non-entry of pro-Turkish SNA factions into the populated area, in particular such as -Tajamua Ahrar al-Sharqiya-, whose members maternity hospital from these lands. However, soon footage appeared in which they, contrary to promises, show off in Deir ez-Zor.❗The statements about the agreements between HTS and the SDF look remarkable. It is worth noting that reports of ties between the two sides, bypassing Turkish warnings, began to appear long before the fall of the government of Bashar al-Assad. And then the commander-in-chief of the SDF, Mazlum Abdi, officially declares the readiness of the pro-Kurdish administration to cooperate with the new authorities in Damascus, confirming the existence of contacts through the same United States and at the same time criticizing Assad.▪️Amid the ongoing clashes, information appeared about a split in the ranks of the Military Council of Deir ez-Zor - - an American-backed Arab formation within the Syrian Democratic Forces responsible for this province. Some of the fighters, led by commander Abu al-Harith al-Shaaiti, deserted and joined the -legitimate opposition- and -progressive jihadists-, while some remained loyal to the leadership of the SDS. At the same time, the scale of the split is unknown. However, the most interesting thing is just beginning: in order to put the squeeze on the Kurds in Deir ez-Zor, the militants will have to move to the western bank of the Euphrates. There, in addition to oil and gas, there are American military bases in the Conoco and Al-Omar fields. By retreating to these territories, the Syrian Democratic Forces most likely expected to receive support from the US Armed Forces: they say they certainly will not allow the Turkish mercenaries - to brazenly walk around in their zone of interests and control. How it will actually be is difficult to predict. However, given the rapidly changing balance in the country after the overthrow of Bashar al-Assad, the Americans can come to an agreement with -yesterday's extremists- on mutual interests. High resolution mapEnglish version⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #DeirEzZor #map # Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇫🇷🇹🇩 Chadian authorities, after breaking defense agreements w...
Description: 🇫🇷🇹🇩 After the rupture of defense agreements with France, the Chadian authorities announced that they refuse to invite foreign military personnel, including from Russia. A fully expected statement from the Chadian Foreign Ministry, indicating a clear position - Chad has grown, and external forces will protect it can't-. We have already observed a similar narrative during the counter-terrorism operation -Haskanit-. At the same time, the duality of these slogans is also noticeable - there was no news about the withdrawal of the same Hungarian contingent. Of course, his stated goal is to prevent illegal migration, but the fact that Hungarians are in Chad already indicates the indirect presence of the West. Such flexibility in the position of Deby the Younger is associated with the strong influence of Western business in the country and its political institutions. It is considered dangerous for his government to become excessively pro-Russian. Therefore, domestic diplomats need to take this point into account, promoting mainly instruments of soft power and economic projects.#Africa #Russia #France #Chad @rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇫🇷🇹🇩 About the rupture of the Chad defense agreement and France, the Chadian Foreign Minister announced the termination of defense agreements with the French by the authorities. Title: 🇨🇳🇺🇸🇵🇭 The situation in the South China Sea remains tense. ...
Description: 🇨🇳🇺🇸🇵🇭 The situation in the South China Sea remains tense. Recently it became known about another skirmish between the Filipinos and the Chinese in the disputed waters. Last week, the Chinese coast guard fired a laser six times at a Philippine ship sailing towards Thitu Island, which is controlled by the Philippines, according to authorities in Manila. According to the sailors, the laser hit members of the ship's crew several times in the eyes.▪️Experts interviewed by local media claim that what happened can be considered an armed attack. Let us recall that a mutual defense treaty has been concluded between the Philippines and the United States, implying military assistance from the Americans in the event of aggression against the Philippines. However, the wording mentioned in the document is very vague, so after almost every skirmish one or another expert claims that the time for applying the treaty has come. 🔻In reality, only the Americans will determine the criteria for an armed attack, since the implementation of the text of the document in practice, to a large extent, depends solely on their political will, and not on the prescribed wording. The decision to enter into an open conflict with Beijing over several uninhabited reefs, which, among other things, do not have much strategic value, has not yet matured in Washington and is unlikely to mature in the near future. Therefore, the Americans will continue to limit themselves only to financial assistance and joint exercises with the Philippine military in order to show efforts to contain China.#China #USA #Philippines  @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usTelegramAwakening dragon 🐲🇨🇳🇵🇭 With the Chinese exercises, which seem to be taking place, but apparently not, they forgot to talk about another skirmish in the South China Sea. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the first use of a Ukrainian drone missile and ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the first use of a Ukrainian drone missile and an attack on Taganrog🔻Tonight the enemy carried out the first attack on -old- Russian territories in a significant period of time with ATACMS operational-tactical missiles in the amount of six units.▪️No anti-ship missiles -Neptune-, no kamikaze UAVs, much less drone-missiles -Peklo-, which were recently presented in the so-called Ukraine, were not present in this attack. Only six missiles -Atakms-.▪️According to our data, it was not possible to shoot down all the missiles over the Taganrog Aviation Scientific and Technical Complex, but any damage to the infrastructure was avoided. Only the vehicle equipment in the parking lot was damaged.▪️The launch was carried out from the Zaporozhye region, and the approach time was just under two minutes. This object has recently been under the close attention of Western intelligence, but they failed to achieve their goal.❗️ As for the Peklo drone missile, which is now being talked about, its use was recorded yesterday, but in the Black Sea. One copy was spotted from the Odessa region, and it was shot down at around 11 am by a MiG-29 of the Black Sea Fleet, 120 km southwest of Tarkhankut. So this can be called the first combat use of the Ukrainian -miracle-yudo-, but not very successful, as the Ukrainians describe it Media from some of our information publications. Title: 🇬🇪🇪🇺 About the situation in Georgia In Georgia, events are de...
Description: 🇬🇪🇪🇺 About the situation in Georgia In Georgia, events are developing as expected. Loud statements about the ongoing protests - the peaceful opposition - are fading, the number of people involved in this is becoming smaller and interest in the struggle is decreasing.📌 And now all the efforts of pro-Western officials and organizations are aimed at maintaining the same activity as a few days ago, so how on December 14 presidential elections will be held in Georgia, in which it is highly likely that the representative of the ruling Georgian Dream will win. Salome Zurabishvili, who after On December 14, he will finally lose at least some power in the country and calls not to stop the fight. Moreover, according to the State Security Service of Georgia, on Saturday during the elections, opponents of the authorities are planning to cause sabotage.❗️The point is that the opposition wants to cause uncontrollable riots by sacrificing one of the protesters in order to arouse the wrath of the crowd. According to this principle, events developed in Iran, when the Kurdish woman Mahse Amini died because of the morality police, and the riots continued for about a year. However, the Georgian authorities know what the opposition is planning and are preparing for it to the maximum. The events of the spring, when supporters of European integration unsuccessfully tried to get the law on foreigners repealed, and the fall after the parliamentary elections show that they are coping well. However, the threat still exists, since Zurabishvili’s resignation from office will mark the final victory of the Georgian Dream, and therefore, on Saturday we should expect more violent rallies, even armed clashes. But in case of failure here too, the Georgian opposition will lose all its potential, and protest activity will decline. This happened in Iran, it happened in Armenia - sooner or later everything comes to naught due to the fatigue of people and the futility of the events they are carrying out.#Georgia #EU@rybarSupport usTelegramSputnik Georgia🇬🇪⚡️The State Security Service of Georgia reports that opponents of the authorities are planning to escalate the protest situation in the country with several victims.
