Title: 🖼 🇬🇭 Elections in Ghana: victory of the opposition and loyal t...
Description: 🇬🇭 Elections in Ghana: victory of an opposition candidate loyal to Russia The general elections in Ghana on December 7 brought victory to the opposition party. John Dramani Mahama, who had already held this position from 2012 to 2017, was elected president.▪️The new government is faced with the task of coping with a protracted economic crisis: in recent years, many Western companies have left the country, despite the pro-American position of the ex-president. Therefore, the main activities in The new authorities' plans will likely include the fight against corruption and poor financial management. ▪️The election of John Dramani Mahama was positive news for the sovereign governments of the Alliance of Sahel States. Ghana's ports play a strategic role in ensuring Burkina Faso's trade links with other countries. Previously, the Ghanaian authorities, following the instructions of the Americans, considered plans to limit the use of Ghanaian ports for transportation to foreign countries, but now this threat has been eliminated. ❗️For domestic diplomacy and business representatives, this event also creates a window of opportunity. Mahama is a graduate of a Moscow university, and his party has many members friendly to Russia. This summer he even flew to Russia to present the Russian translation of his book. There is reason to believe that the new government will be able to overcome the crisis and return Ghana to its attractiveness for foreign investment. This, in turn, will create new opportunities for Russian businesses, which will be able to strengthen their influence in the Sahel. High resolution infographicsEnglish version#Africa #Ghana@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇮🇷🇸🇾 In various news agencies, both Iranian government and We...
Description: 🇮🇷🇸🇾 Various news agencies, both Iranian government and Western, talk about an active discussion in Iran of the current events in Syria in terms of how and why this happened.📌 According to the ISNA publication, a closed informal meeting was held in the Iranian parliament with the participation of IRGC Commander-in-Chief Hossein Salami on Iran's future strategy in the Middle East due to the collapse Bashar al-Assad. Considering the importance Syria played for Iran, such discussions will continue for a long time. The logistics of the IRGC was built through Syria in cooperation with Lebanon and Hezbollah. Built during the war with IS, the Soleimani land corridor has long been the basis of the Iranian axis of resistance. And this does not take into account Iran’s huge subsidized investments in the government of Syria, which has sunk into oblivion.❗️Against this background, it is not surprising that Western resources report that there is a showdown in the highest Iranian circles over how such a mistake in support was made Syria, which led to disarray in the army and government. For the Iranian leadership, the loss of Syria is a serious blow that weakens the country’s capabilities in the confrontation with Israel - everything Pro-Iranian formations have been withdrawn from Syria. Now there are only militants, Israel and Turkey, and with them - chaos. And if personnel changes begin in Iran in the coming weeks, they will most likely be related to the Syrian events. Now the blade of the guillotine, judging by media reports, has risen above the head of the head of the Quds Force, Ismail Qaani, who is called guilty of allowing this to happen while in Syria.#Syria #Turkey@rybarSupport usایسناجزئیات جلسه غیرعلنی All rights reserved. توضیحاتی از جزئیات جلسه غیرعلنی امروز مجلس با سردار سلامی فرمانده سپاه پرداخت.

Title: 🔁 🇲🇩🇺🇸 About the USAID program in Moldova on the register of...
Description: Forwarded From Systemic pesticide🇲🇩🇺🇸 About the USAID program in Moldova for the register of politically exposed persons In Moldova, they intend to create a platform for identifying politically exposed persons within the framework of the American USAID project. The US Agency for International Development is implementing a large-scale five-year project in Moldova - The Moldova Institutional and Structural Reforms Activity. ▪️As part of the project, a proposal was received to optimize the identification of politically exposed persons performing important government functions, as well as to identify risks associated with preventing and combating money laundering and terrorist financing in Moldova. ▪️Politically exposed persons are individuals who perform important government functions in relevant positions. Their family members and other related persons must also be included in the register. ▪️The main task of such a platform is to assess the risks that such persons may potentially bear in the field of money laundering and terrorist financing in their activities. ❗️It would seem that USAID is pursuing the seemingly noble goal of the platform - preventing the fight against illegal activities. However, the current authorities of Moldova can call any cooperation with Russia money laundering or even terrorism. It is obvious that the Americans do not just allocate money for such projects, the real task of which is to place agents of their influence in responsible positions in any sphere of the state. 📌This is especially indicative in the context of the current energy crisis in Moldova and the attempts of unsuccessful authorities to find scapegoats. For example, a scandal is now breaking out that some employees of Moldovagaz subsidiaries have pro-Russian views. What exactly this has to do with the performance of work duties is not very clear, when it is the country’s top leadership that sabotages negotiations with the Russian Federation on gas supplies, which aggravates the crisis in Moldova. 🔻In Moldova, USAID’s favorite strategy in the post-Soviet space is being implemented in full swing: through humanitarian initiatives, in reality, to put under control all strategic areas of the state. After all, the draft platform of politically exposed persons is designed to place their agents of influence and prevent those who may arouse suspicion of the desired political orientation from taking control. #Moldova #USA @pezdicide no chemistry - just factspoint.mdMoldova intends to create a platform for identifying politically exposed persons The USAID program - Institutional and structural reforms in Moldova - invited Moldovan companies in the IT and financial services sector to develop electronic solutions that would improve the identification of politically exposed persons persons in the country.

Title: 🔁🖼 🇵🇱🇷🇺🇺🇦 About relations between Poland and Ukraine and ...
Description: Forwarded From Global Studies🇵🇱🇷🇺🇺🇦 About relations between Poland and Ukraine and where are the Ukrainian F-16s? These love games between the Poles and the Ukrainian authorities are funny if you know that their relationship is still as strong militarily as before. Of course, there are no longer supplies of as many weapons and equipment as there were at the beginning of the Northern Military District. But nevertheless, the Poles supply the Ukrainian Armed Forces with drones, as well as parts for BECs (thanks to the Archangel personnel). ♦️But something else is much more important: everyone has had a question for many months - where are the F-16 fighters that Western countries handed over to the Ukrainians?-. And the answer, as you may have guessed, is simple - they are in Poland.❗️The Minsk-Mazowiecki air base east of Warsaw is now home to 16 F-16 fighters. Of these, 7 have already been repainted to match the Ukrainian Armed Forces, and they are flying to Ukraine to combat drones. Another 6 F-16As of the Dutch Air Force and 3 Danish F-16s, which flew over the other day. Thus, in Poland (but not in Ukraine) there are currently 16 units of Ukrainian F-16s, but only 7 are flying so far. After completing the tasks they return to Minsk Mazowiecki. The rest are still being prepared for operation.♦️This is an interesting situation related to the Poles and Ukrainians. But another important point is that 18 F-16A units of the Dutch Air Force are now fixed in Romania at the Fetesti airbase. Crew training for these fighters has been organized in Romania since last year. Previously there were 6 units, but recently the number has increased. So in total, the Ukrainian Armed Forces now have 34 F-16 fighters. This relates to the question of possible negotiations at the beginning of 2025. The enemy is preparing for the exact opposite. #Denmark #Poland #Russia #UkraineGlobalistics - subscribe to the channel

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of December 11, 2024 ▪️ Yesterday, da...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of December 11, 2024 ▪️ Yesterday from the Kursk Bulge, data was received about the entry of the Russian Armed Forces into the territory of the Sumy region. We managed to take the border area near the village of Alexandria, Sumy region. The events take place south of the liberated Plekhovo and the forest areas near it - there were heavy battles for the area. The maneuver can be explained by the complexity of the terrain in the Plekhovo-Sudzha direction: the Psel River blocks the path of our troops. Group of troops -North- after the liberation of the village. Novoivanovka continued to advance eastward and, with heavy fighting, knocked out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from several positions in forest plantations. The enemy carried out 3 unsuccessful counterattacks with elite units totaling up to 30 people on 3 Bradley infantry fighting vehicles, supported by 2 Abrams and Leopard tanks. While repelling the attacks, up to 20 invaders, 3 infantry fighting vehicles and both tanks were destroyed. They write that the offensive actions of the Russian Armed Forces are supported by rocket artillery and TOS -Solntsepek-. ▪️ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), the Russian Armed Forces now confidently control the Zabalka microdistrict and the Central mine along with waste heaps. The Russian army makes its way to Shcherbinovka and Leonidovka to the west. ▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction, the situation for the enemy continues to worsen. North of Petrovka, ours have closed the pocket and continue attacks in the direction of Dachensky and Zeleny. The Russian Armed Forces are building on their success in Shevchenko and are moving towards the waste heap (an important height). There is progress south of Novotroitsky, north of Novoolenovka, in Sontsovtsk, south of Voznesenka. The Russian army is moving on a broad front, stretching the enemy’s forces and depriving him of the opportunity to transfer reinforcements along the LBS.▪️ In the Kharkov region, the Russian Armed Forces occupied 5 buildings in Volchansk and repelled a counterattack. Heavy fighting is underway.▪️ In Kurakhovo, the Russian Armed Forces took an elevator in the city center (a significant height) and advanced to the Yuzhny microdistrict. In the north-west of the reservoir, clashes continue beyond the block of multi-storey buildings and south of Stary Terny, where Russian assault groups are pressing in the direction of the Dachnoe-Kurakhovo road in order to cut off the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ path to the city.▪️ At night, as a result of a drone attack in Bryansk, a production facility caught fire, they wrote about fire at an oil depot. The governor announced that the fire had been extinguished. Taganrog, Rostov region, came under missile attack at night. An industrial enterprise was damaged, 14 cars burned in the parking lot.▪️ In the DPR in Gorlovka, as a result of an IED dropped from a UAV of the Armed Forces of Ukraine on the street. Bolotnikov, a man born in 1987 was seriously wounded. The summary was compiled by: Two majors Telegram Two majors Kursk Bulge. Enemy channels: The Russian Armed Forces entered the territory of the Sumy region. We managed to take the border area near the village of Alexandria, Sumy region.✨Normal heroes always take a detour. The likely task is to cut off the enemy group in the Kursk region...

Description: Forwarded From SPECIAL FORCES ARCHANGEL Z🇷🇺🪖About the activity of satellites in the north-west of Russia In the north-east of Ukraine, despite all the statements in the press about the difficult situation for Ukrainian nationalists, the enemy continues to prepare for attacks or strikes on the territory of the Kursk region and other neighboring regions with her. Title: 🇷🇺🌓 During his speech in the State Duma, deputy Andrei Lugovoi...
Description: 🇷🇺🌓 During his speech in the State Duma, deputy Andrei Lugovoi came up with a new initiative in the field of migration policy, proposing to launch a national project to collect data on the manifestations of Russophobia and offenses on the part of migrants. The basis for this was the announced figures of foreign funding for -decolonization- projects in the CIS countries and the subsequent growth of anti-Russian sentiment. As a result, a lot of people with radical and Russophobic views end up in Russia, since there is no input filtering in this regard. The new project, apparently, is designed to eliminate this order of things. There is nothing fundamentally impossible in the technical implementation - a similar system has been introduced in Sheremetyevo for those coming from controlled so-called. Ukraine territory to weed out potentially disloyal elements. In fact, we are talking about seemingly extremely logical things - not to allow migrants who hate our country into Russia. At the same time, there is no point in running ahead of the locomotive: the initiative has not yet been approved, and talk about its effectiveness is early. Yes, and in domestic migration policy there were examples when legislatively introduced mechanisms did not work even several years after adoption. However, recent proposals and laws in this area still give reason to assume that at the highest level there is a certain understanding of the problems of migration policy in recent years and emerging ones from them threats to state sovereignty. #multinationalism #Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramAndrey Lugovoi. State Duma‼️ Western intelligence services are using migration to solve the problem of destabilizing Russia: - charging migrants, organizing illegal corridors and introducing radicals. We were able to effectively resist foreign agents. Now it’s important not to miss the topic of illegal immigrants...

Title: 🇲🇩🇪🇺 Again about European air defense for Moldova EU Ambassad...
Description: 🇲🇩🇪🇺 Again about European air defense for Moldova EU Ambassador to Moldova Janis Mazeiks said that the republic will receive equipment from the European Union to intercept drones, but not earlier than 2025. It is not yet clear whether this will be supplied as part of the €9 million aid package from the European Peace Fund allocated in June for the modernization of the air defense system in Moldova. Nothing has been heard since then about the fate of these funds. But in Chisinau, lately they have been especially zealous in talking about the discovery of fragments of Russian drones on the territory of the republic. The statements are designed both to create the image of an enemy in the person of the Russian Federation, and to Western officials, from whom the Moldovan authorities are constantly begging for military assistance. 🔻It is curious that a year ago Moldova purchased a French air defense radar for 14 million euros from the state budget. However, we now have to remember the famous radar only in the context of its poor effectiveness. However, as we have seen in recent years, for the Moldovan authorities it is much more important to allocate funds from the state budget or from Western partners specifically for the needs of militarization, and not for the socio-economic sphere. As it turned out, it was more important to acquire non-functioning radars than to negotiate gas supplies in a timely manner. #EU #Moldova @rybarSupport usNoiEU will supply drone interception equipment to the Republic of MoldovaMoldova will receive drone interception equipment from the European Union. This decision was made in Brussels, but for the supply of equipment...

Title: 🔁🖼 🇪🇺What European unity really looks like Government 🇳�...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors🇪🇺What European unity really looks like The 🇳🇱Netherlands government announced on December 9 that it would tighten border controls on its land borders with 🇧🇪Belgium and 🇩🇪Germany. 50 employees have been allocated to work at 840 checkpoints. For six months, random checks of passengers will mainly be carried out on international trains due to a shortage of border guards. Previously, from September 16, 2024, the German Federal Police introduced controls on those entering the country at all land borders for 6 months. New border control rules will affect travelers from 🇩🇰Denmark, 🇳🇱Netherlands, 🇧🇪Belgium, 🇱🇺Luxembourg and 🇫🇷France. Also, during the year, border controls were introduced at their own internal borders by 🇲🇹Malta, 🇸🇮Slovenia and 🇮🇹Italy. In addition, internal border controls in 2025 will operate in 🇸🇮Slovenia (12/22/2024 - 06/21/2025, with Croatia and Hungary), 🇮🇹Italy (12/19/2024 - 06/18/2025 with Slovenia), 🇦🇹Austria (12/11/2024 - 11/05/2025 with Hungary and Slovenia), 🇳🇱Netherlands (09/12/2024 - 08/06/2025 (with Slovakia and the Czech Republic), 🇳🇴Norway (12/11/2024 - 11/05/2025 (all land, air and sea borders), 🇩🇰 Denmark (12/11/2024 - 11/05/2025 all internal borders, as well as land and maritime boundaries with Germany), 🇫🇷France (01.11.2024 - 30.04.2025 (with Belgium, Luxembourg, Germany, the Swiss Confederation, Italy and Spain, including maritime) and 🇸🇪Sweden (11.12.2024 - 05.11.2025 all internal borders).✨When it comes to their own benefit and security, Europeans begin to scatter in different corners. Encouraging lawlessness in various countries (👎🇺🇦Ukraine, 🇸🇾Syria, 🇱🇾Libya and other African countries,🇬🇪 Georgia) inevitably leads to the opposite effect and the growth of internal contradictions within the EU. Title: 🖼 🇺🇸 About testing elements of the American missile defense sy...
Description: 🇺🇸 About testing elements of the American missile defense system in the Pacific Ocean In the area of ​​the Northern Mariana Islands in the Asia-Pacific region, the US Missile Defense Agency is preparing to conduct another test of missile defense elements, which is scheduled for the period from December 10 to 12.▪️The Pentagon plans to launch Standard-3 block 2A (SM-3) anti-missile missiles from a position on the island of Guam to a range of 1700 km. The target will be an aerial target missile fired from a C-17A military transport aircraft.▪️Control will be provided by measurement complex ships from the US Department of Transportation reserve fleet and a C-11B optical tracking laboratory aircraft. Also in the area will be the Arleigh Burke-class destroyer USS Milius.▪️This will be the first test of the new Aegis Guam missile defense system as part of the Pentagon's program to protect the Mariana Islands. The previous time, the Americans carried out similar launches at the end of March at a training ground in Hawaii. Against the backdrop of a gradual increase in tension in the Asia-Pacific region, it is not difficult to guess that the deployed system is primarily directed against the PRC. Moreover, back in 2023, the United States planned to literally stuff Guam with missile defense and air defense systems. And on a more global level, this is part of the strategy to deploy similar facilities around the world, which Washington has been adhering to since the withdrawal from the ABM Treaty. In particular, within its framework, a similar Aegis system was recently put into operation in Poland near the Kaliningrad region. High-resolution infographicsEnglish version#USA@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇩🇪🇸🇾 About a new wave of Syrian refugees in Germany Against t...
Description: 🇩🇪🇸🇾 About a new wave of Syrian refugees to GermanyAgainst the backdrop of the flaring crisis in Syria, the Germans decided to suspend the consideration of applications for asylum from citizens of this country. The decision was made by the German Migration Department, where they explained that the situation in Syria is confusing and that will happen there politically is too difficult to predict. Currently, more than 47 thousand applications from Syrians. The department also said that the latest events in their country will not affect asylum decisions that have already been made. The political debate about whether Syrians should stay in Germany began at the same time as the crisis. Several deputies from the CDU party, which includes the main candidate for the post of German Chancellor Friedrich Merz, immediately spoke out in favor of returning refugees back to their homeland. At the same time, politicians from the Greens and the party of the current SPD chancellor called for restraint due to the unclear situation. It is obvious that this topic will occupy an important place in the election debates of German politicians: it is quite convenient to cover up more serious problems within the country, and at the same time beneficial play on the mood of the electorate.🔻However, the measure taken by the German government will obviously not save the situation. After all, when asking for asylum, you can lose your passport and provide false documents - Germany will not be able to completely or even half protect itself from the next wave of Syrians. It is also worth understanding that, according to official data alone, at least 1.5 million people are expected to flee from Syria - and it is quite obvious that most of them will try to break through to Europe. Namely, in Germany, a large diaspora of Syrians has settled quite firmly and long ago - this is the largest group in the country after the Ukrainians, only officially there are about 900 thousand of them in the country. Therefore, it is logical that many of the fugitives will want to join their brothers, and they will be happy to help them .#Germany #Syria #migrants @rybar together with @pl_syrenkaSupport usSpiegelAlle Verfahren ausgesetzt – Bamf stoppt Entscheidung über Asylanträge von SyrernDas Bundesamt für Migration und Flüchtlinge bearbeitet bis auf Weiteres keine Asylanträge von Syrerinnen und Syrern. Jede Entscheidung stünde sonst -auf tönernen Füßen-, teilt das Amt auf SPIEGEL-Anfrage mit.

Title: 🖼 ❗🇮🇱🇸🇾 Massive air raid of the Israeli Air Force on Syrian ...
Description: ❗🇮🇱🇸🇾 Massive air raid of the Israeli Air Force on the territory of Syria While Turkish-backed groups were fighting with the Kurds for Menbij, and progressive jihadist Ahmad al-Sharaa (Abu Muhammad al-Julani) gave interviews to Western media, last night the Israeli Air Force carried out a series of strikes across Syria. The targets were objects in several provinces at once, including those controlled by the Kurdish Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF) in the northeast of the country, which had not happened before.▪️The hits were on military research centers in the vicinity of the Syrian capital Damascus and the suburbs of Qudsaya . Fires broke out, which were soon extinguished by local services.▪️Marine infrastructure and equipment in the port of Latakia were attacked. According to Israeli media, ships of unknown destination on the roadstead also came under attack, but this information has not yet been confirmed.▪️ Explosions occurred at the Al-Shayrat airbase in Homs province, which the Israelis have repeatedly struck. Apparently, there the IDF tried to destroy the remnants of the Syrian Air Force, air defense systems and infrastructure.▪️In territories controlled by Kurdish forces in the provinces of Ar-Raqqa and Al-Hasakah, the Israelis hit facilities previously used by the troops of the overthrown government of Bashar al-Assad.🔻As we wrote, on At the moment, the Israelis will do everything possible to ensure that the weapons and ammunition of the SAA, which has sunk into oblivion, do not fall into into the hands of the militants to the new authorities formed by the -legal opposition-. This can explain the attacks in the zone of control of the SDF, which for the time being coexisted with the enclaves of the Syrian Armed Forces: there is a considerable probability that the hand of the Syrian revolution in the person of the pro-Turkish Syrian National Army (SNA) will reach there too. The Israeli Air Force will continue to attack military warehouses, air defense elements, airfields and research centers in order to completely deprive the militants of the legacy of the SAA, which could threaten Israel or be resold to third parties. At the same time, the matter will not be limited to strikes alone, and after their completion, the IDF units that entered El Quneitra will not be in a hurry to leave. After all, if previously this kind of activity was justified by the presence of Iranian-backed forces in the region, now progressive jihadists will act as a punching bag. High resolution mapEnglish version#Damascus #Israel #map #Latakia #Raqqa #Syria #Hasakah #Homs@rybarSupport us

Title: ↩️ 🇺🇸🇺🇦 The American administration continues to insist on ex...
Description: Rybar: 🇺🇸🇺🇦 From time to time, materials appear in the press where the authors try to assess the long-term prospects of the so-called. Ukraine as a state entity. In our opinion, the best answer to the question is two recent news: ▪️The Commissioner of the Kiev... 🇺🇸🇺🇦 The American administration continues to insist on expanding mobilization by the Kyiv regime: the State Department stated that if the lower conscription limit is reduced to 18 years, the United States and its allies are ready -to fully train and equip all recruits-.Behind such formulations are hidden conditions to continue or expand military assistance to the Kyiv regime. Ukrainian ruling circles understand this and are already hinting at the possibility of reducing the mobilization threshold from the current 25 years to 20 years. On the one hand, such a step will lead to a certain influx of manpower and will improve the position of the Armed Forces of Ukraine at the front, especially in terms of the ratio of numbers with the Russian Armed Forces. However, the solution also has pitfalls: ▪️Due to the long-standing demographic problems of young people in the so-called. Ukraine doesn’t have so much - on the age pyramid, there is a noticeable strong subsidence in this category. It is unlikely that it will be possible to overwhelm the combat formations of Ukrainian formations with 18-25 year olds.▪️In the current realities, a large-scale conscription of yesterday's schoolchildren and students is quite capable of leading to a social explosion in the so-called. Ukraine, especially against the backdrop of the practice of busification. A significant number of them themselves will prefer to hide until the last moment, even in the Chernobyl exclusion zone.▪️Finally, the motivation of the young recruits abducted by the TCC will be appropriate. If in 2022 the patriotic impulse inflated by the Kyiv regime was at work, now, after almost three years of hostilities, morale is at a different level. Be that as it may, a possible reduction in the mobilization age by the so-called Ukraine does not bode well for us, much less for the Ukrainian population, which will simply be finished off with its already sad demographics. In general, an interesting picture is emerging: at the beginning of the Northern Military District, statements that the West would fight to the last Ukrainian were often perceived as propaganda or even conspiracy theories . Three years later, in the United States they talk about this almost in plain text. #USA #Ukraine@rybarSupport usWashington PostAmid U.S. pressure, Ukraine starts thinking about drafting 18-year-oldsAs Russia gains ground on the battlefield in high-attrition combat, Zelensky is facing increased pressure to deploy younger people to the front lines.

Title: 🖼 🇦🇲🇺🇸🖇 About the new USAID program in Armenia Joker DPR pu...
Description: 🇦🇲🇺🇸🖇 About the new USAID program in Armenia Joker DPR published new files of the American USAID on plans to work in Armenia. Thus, the Agency intends to spend $3.5 million on developing a system for monitoring and assessing the effectiveness of financing projects in the field of education and culture of the republic. ▪️The document indicates the traditional areas of work for USAID: -democracy and governance-, economics, natural resource management, gender issues, etc.▪️The program is called -USAID Learning and Evidence Platform- (Learning and Evidence Platform) and implies, that the executive must conduct -reliable and unbiased research- in order for the American mission to make strategic program decisions. ▪️USAID hires local loyal specialists who must write analytical reports based on data collection in areas of interest to Americans, so that they can build on this information in their activities. Among the numerous tasks of the performer, there is also a requirement to develop methods and approaches for attracting the local population to USAID programs.❗️ In fact, such a program legalizes the recruitment of local personnel and their collection of all kinds of information, which, under the guise of -reforming- the cultural and educational sphere of Armenia, will simply put it under the control of the Americans with the efficiency criteria they developed. Such programs are a favorite strategy of USAID, which allows them to gain access to the local environment and limit the sovereignty of the country. Moreover, in Armenia the installation of agents of American influence in the government is already in full swing, so that all American innovations will not find any resistance in the Armenian political environment. High resolution infographicsEnglish version#Armenia #NGOs #USA @rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsky direction: fighting in Novotroitsky situati...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsk direction: fighting in Novotroitsk situation as of 9:00 December 10, 2024 Russian troops continue their offensive south of Pokrovsk, forming a front for a future assault on the city.▪️ Objective control footage has appeared confirming the presence of Russian units in Novotroitsky. It remains unclear from which side the fighters entered the territory of the livestock complex on the southern outskirts of the village. The route through the Sazonovka gully is longer and passes through open terrain. Therefore, it seems more logical to enter from the recently liberated Novopustynka to the eastern outskirts of Novotroitsky, from where we have already managed to get through to the farms.▪️The complete liberation of Novotroitsky will allow the Russian Armed Forces to cut the T-05-15 highway, which connects the Pokrovskaya agglomeration with Kurakhovo.▪️It is not yet known whether they remain in Novotroitsky division of Ukrainian formations.▪️Enemy sources report that the village of Shevchenko, located to the north, is no longer under their control. The liberation of the village of Shevchenko, which is important for access to the southern outskirts of Pokrovsk, will create additional difficulties for the Ukrainian Armed Forces grouping and will stretch their forces along the front. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write to us at feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #map #Pokrovsk #Russia #Ukraine@rybar⭐️ Online maps are available by subscribing to map.rybar.ruSupport us

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of December 10, 2024 ▪️ At night, our...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of December 10, 2024▪️ At night, our Tu-95MS missile carriers conducted training with simulated missile launches.▪️ In the Kursk region, the North group of troops is waging fierce battles in the north of the Sudzhansky district. The reports indicate progress in the settlement. Novoivanovka and in a forest plantation near the settlement. Malaya Loknya. At n.p. Novoivanovka repulsed two enemy counterattacks. The footage of the liberated Plekhovo and the forest area around it dispersed.▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces took the settlement. Novotroitskoye, they are conducting a clean-up in the village. Shevchenko and continue to put pressure in the area of ​​Vozrozhdenie, Dachenskoye, and Pushkino. The situation for the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the direction is characterized by enemy channels as -very difficult.▪️ In the Kurakhovsky direction, our troops are making their way from Starye Ternov (northwestern shore of the reservoir) towards the western outskirts of Kurakhovo. If successful, this will cut off the enemy’s main supply route in the city, which is also being stormed by the Russian Army from the east.▪️ In the Vremevsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces are advancing north of Rovnopol towards Velikaya (Bolshaya) Novoselka. The plan of our command is visible to start putting pressure on the cascade of villages in the Vremevsky direction and from the west (now the attacks are coming from the south and east), depriving the enemy of the Vremevka-Uspenovka road.▪️ On the Zaporozhye front, our assault groups are fighting heavy, bloody battles in offensive operations. The lack of maneuverable equipment to deliver fighters to the enemy line of defense is taking its toll; the enemy is firing from artillery and hitting attack aircraft with drones. The main forces of the Russian Army have not been brought into battle, the Ukrainian Armed Forces are trying to strengthen the defense line.▪️ In the Belgorod region, near the village of Dvuluchnoye, Valuysk district, three civilians were injured as a result of an explosive device being dropped from a drone onto a moving passenger car. Under attack by Murom and Shebekino.▪️ In the DPR in Gorlovka, the Ukrainian Armed Forces dropped an IED on a passenger car, a man born in 1961 was wounded. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo majorsKursk region. Plekhovsky forest, 382nd battalion: 🖋-In fact, from the 20th of September until December 7th there were battles in Plekhov and on the outskirts, in the forests that surround the settlement. 382 infantry fighting vehicles of the 810th brigade, 5 infantry fighting vehicles of the 810th brigade took part in the battles, and 40th infantry fighting vehicles fought to the southwest of Plekhovo...

Title: 🖼 🇮🇷🇸🇾 Battles for Menbij situation as of December 9, 2024 �...
Description: 🇮🇷🇸🇾 Battles for Menbijob situation as of December 9, 2024🔻Last Sunday, pro-Turkish formations - the Syrian National Army - with the support of Turkish artillery, resumed the assault on the city of Menbij northeast of Aleppo, which is controlled by Kurds from the SDF.▪️At first, pro-Turkish militants managed to drop into the city and push the Kurds out of the village. They even filmed several videos from Menbij, declaring control over it.▪️But a few hours later, the Syrian Democratic Forces launched a counterattack with the support of their artillery and knocked out the pro-Turkish proxies from most of Menbij.▪️Currently, fighting for the city and surrounding villages and suburbs continue, and it is premature to talk about control of any of the warring parties.❗️Special attention One should pay attention to the kind of assistance Turkey provides to terrorists under its control. On December 8 alone, 5 UAVs - Akıncı - and at least 7 drones - Bayraktar - from different air bases in Turkey were recorded over Menbij and the surrounding area. Several air strikes were carried out from drones with MAM guided bombs according to the supporters of the Kurds. And then the drones provided guidance to the F-16C/D fighters on three SDS armored vehicles. And that’s not all. Artillery units of the Turkish Armed Forces were deployed to the border with Syria and carried out 12 strikes against the Kurds. This intensity confirms the theory that the Turks may soon launch a new operation against the SDF. High resolution mapEnglish version#Syria #Türkiye@rybarSupport us
Forwarded From Informant

Title: 🔁🖼 So, what is there in Syria by the end of the day? The status...
Description: Forwarded From UNFISH So, what is there in Syria by the end of the day? The status of Khmeimim and the base in Tartus is in limbo. There's not much else to say. The embassy in Damascus is also in a state of siege. In Daraa and Suwayda, the Israeli Air Force demilitarized a bunch of military facilities, removing the arsenals and air bases of the former SAA and some Iranian facilities. In the evening, the IDF Air Force attacked locations in Tartus and Latakia, where remnants of the Syrian military were or will be destroyed Navy. The pro-Turkish greens in the north are suppressing the Kurds, the status of Menbij is still unclear. The fighters say that they have recaptured, and the Kurds say that fighting is going on. In the area of ​​the Tishrin dam, two Kurdish women from the local militia were captured. Their fate is obviously unenviable. In the north, the activity of Turkish UAVs is growing, and the Kurds, out of fear, managed to shoot down the MQ-9. However, they are far from being the same as the Katozhuis in this matter. In Deir ez-Zor, local tribes are being hurricaned. They don’t really want to join the Kurds, and they swore allegiance to the greens very formally. The greens themselves, by the way, have not yet reached Deir ez-Zor, but by tomorrow they will probably be in the vicinity of the city. So far, everything is going to the point that the Kurds will be left alone with the coalition of greens, better known as lettuce. What adds zest to the salad is that there are American bases on Kurdish territory, but there is also an American base on the green territory in At-Tanf.⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru

Title: 🔁🖼 🇪🇺🇸🇾Syrian consequences for Europe After the final fall ...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors🇪🇺🇸🇾Syrian consequences for Europe After the final fall of Bashar al-Assad’s power, European politicians rushed to praise the rebels, calling it democratic change. At the same time, thousands of uncoordinated rallies of Syrian diasporas took place in major European cities. Some of the most numerous actions took place in 🇩🇪Germany, where more than 25 thousand participants took part in demonstrations in various cities. Germany accepted about 1 million Syrian refugees, tens of thousands more settled in France, Greece, the Netherlands, Austria and other EU countries. However, by today, euphoria has given way to pragmatism. As we reported, the EU began to massively introduce restrictions on the admission of refugees from Syria. Currently, such measures have been introduced by 🇩🇪Germany, 🇫🇷France,🇦🇹 Austria, 🇳🇴Norway, 🇩🇰Denmark, 🇫🇮Finland and 🇸🇪Sweden.✨So far, Europe's response to -democratic changes- has been limited offers to Syrians to return to their homeland (in Germany they offered to give a thousand euros when deciding to return a refugee) and suspension of registration of new applications from refugees from Syria. In the future, they will put pressure on the delayed guests by cutting benefits and expelling refugees who have settled in comfort to a new democratic country. And then the fun begins. Two majors

Title: 🖼 🇸🇾 About the supposed new government of Syria, Arabic-langua...
Description: 🇸🇾 About the supposed new government of Syria Arabic-language media published the expected composition of the Syrian government, which should be formed by the opposition within 18 months. Until then, power in the country will be exercised by transitional authorities: in the process, a new constitution must be written. A place in the cabinet went to everyone: from the leader of the terrorist organization Hayat Tahrir al-Sham (HTS) Abu Muhammad al-Julani, to members of the National Coalition Syrian Revolutionary and Opposition Forces (SRFOS) and independent activists and politicians like Ahmad Moaz al-Khatib. The new cabinet allegedly included the following persons: ▪️Riyad Hijab - former Prime Minister of Syria. In 2012, he was dismissed, after which he defected to the Free Syrian Army (FSA) and settled in Qatar, from where he called on officials and officers of the Syrian Armed Forces to desert. Until 2017, he was the head of the opposition High Negotiating Committee.▪️Abu Muhammad al-Julani is the leader of Hayat Tahrir al-Sham, which led the Damascus march. At one time he was the leader of Jabhat al-Nusra, the Syrian branch of the terrorist organizations ISIS and Al-Qaeda. Now in the West he is known as the progressive jihadist Ahmad al-Sharaa.▪️Hadi al-Bahra is the head of the NKSROS, supported first by Western countries and then by Turkey. She, in turn, heads the pro-Turkish Provisional Government of Syria (TPG), located in the territories controlled by the Syrian National Army (SNA) in the north of Aleppo province.▪️Faisal al-Qasim is from the province of Es-Suwayda in southern Syria, Druze by nationality. TV presenter of a separate show on Al Jazeera. Apparently, his belonging to a religious minority and this kind of specialization opened his way to the Syrian Ministry of Information. It is noteworthy that most of the possible ministers are members of the NKSROS, which is not very popular in the Syrian opposition environment. Which is not surprising - most of the time they are located and meet outside Syria, in particular in Turkey and Qatar. It cannot be said that the Syrian Salvation Government (PSS) formed by the terrorists - Hayat Tahrir al-Sham Idlib - is popular. However, unlike its colleagues, it was able to form quite strong state institutions and even subordinate the formations of the former FSA. However, the West may be quite happy with this situation: members of the NKSROS are persons who have not stained their hands with blood, sort of secular democrats -, representatives of precisely the moderate part of the Syrian opposition. It also follows that HTS received only one seat in the cabinet, where Ahmad al-Sharaa took the post of Minister of Defense. How strong such a government will be is another question. Superimposed on it is the huge abundance of motley factions - the Syrian revolution -, a considerable part of which views democracy as disbelief, the opposite of what they fought for. High-resolution infographicsEnglish version#infographics #Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁🖼 Objective control footage appeared in the Pokrovsky directio...
Description: Forwarded From NERYBAR In the Pokrovsky direction, objective control footage appeared, confirming the presence of Russian troops in Novotroitsky. At the same time, it remains unclear from which side exactly the fighters entered the territory of the livestock complex on the southern outskirts of the village. The movement could pass through the Sazonovka gully (which will mark a big paint job if confirmed), but this route is much more distant and extends through open area. The most logical option seems to be an approach from the recently liberated Novopustynka to the eastern outskirts of Novotroitsky, from where they have already managed to get through to the farms. It is not yet known whether any units of Ukrainian forces remain in the latter. However, given the approach of the front to Pokrovsk from the south, they could be transferred to Shevchenko to the north, whose fall opens the way for Russian troops to advance directly to the southern suburbs of the Pokrovsk agglomeration.⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Aleksandro-Kalinovskoe direction: liquidation of a po...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Aleksandro-Kalinovskoe direction: liquidation of a pocket near the dairy plant and liberation of most of the Zabalka microdistrict. situation as of 18:00 on December 9, 2024. The battle for Dzerzhinsk, a key defense center of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the Aleksandro-Kalinovskoe direction, is gaining momentum. Over the past few weeks, Russian troops have pushed the Ukrainian Armed Forces out of several large strongholds in the city, and have also started fighting for waste heaps to the west. ▪️In the Dyleevka-Dachnoe section, Russian troops are concentrated on weakening the positions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Artillery and UAV crews are working at enemy firing points and temporary deployment points, gradually dismantling large defense lines. ▪️In the northern part of Dzerzhinsk, by December 1, attack aircraft of the Russian Armed Forces took control of the territory of the Shcherbinovka substation - 110/35/6 kV. Their presence was also recorded to the north of the substation, which indicates a complete clearing of the facility and the consolidation of Russian troops at the achieved lines. Ukrainian formations maintain a presence at the Avangard stadium to the west, which allows them to keep the territory of the city park under fire control. ▪️In the central sector, the Russian Armed Forces made significant progress along Mayakovsky and Frunze streets, knocking out the enemy from several strongholds. In many ways, this became possible thanks to the successful actions of assault groups in the area of ​​the mine named after. Dzerzhinsky.▪️Battles for the facility began at the end of November, when the advanced groups of the Russian Armed Forces were able to gain a foothold on its outskirts and repel counterattacks of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The attack on the mine proceeded in parallel with the operation to liquidate a pocket in the area of ​​the Dzerzhinsky dairy plant, the main defense center of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, which for a long time hindered the advance of Russian troops in the city. By December 8, the pocket was cleared, and most of the mine named after. Dzerzhinsky, including the coal warehouse, was taken under control. ▪️In the south of the city, the Russian Armed Forces completely knocked out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from the western part of the Zabalka microdistrict. The enemy was unable to hold on to the positions they had previously recaptured, after which they were thrown back to the waste heaps. They are currently the main hub of its defense - through the roads passing here, Ukrainian formations are transferring reserves to the mine and the private sector. These routes are targeted by Russian troops and they regularly catch Ukrainian Armed Forces groups on them. Between waste heaps No. 7 and No. 1, a kind of cemetery was formed for enemy armored vehicles, burned by UAV and ATGM operators. ❗️Seeing the impossibility of holding urban agglomerations in Donbass, the Armed Forces of Ukraine switched to scorched earth tactics. Previously, this had already been observed in the vicinity of Kurakhovo and Pokrovsk. The other day, a video appeared on the Internet showing the explosion of the Toretskaya mine in the north of Dzerzhinsk. The enemy's goal is likely to destroy the city's industrial potential and create a humanitarian crisis. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot High resolution mapEnglish version⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru #Dzerzhinsk # digest #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇸🇴 Meanwhile, Somalia continues its own war: another politic...
Description: 🇸🇴 Meanwhile, Somalia continues its own war: another political crisis risks escalating into an armed conflict. The dispute over the introduction of direct elections throughout Somalia has led to an escalation in autonomous Jubaland. Previously, local authorities refused to recognize the new electoral system. In order to force the Jubaland leadership to consolidate with the federal government, the armed forces were deployed to the port city of Ras Kamboni. But they were unable to show strength - they were blocked by local militias near the airport. Now both sides are afraid to enter into direct confrontation, but are building up forces in the small town. At the same time, the local autonomy has secured military support from Ethiopia, whose authorities have long been interested in the collapse of Somalia. The tense situation in the region may become the impetus for the resumption of conflicts between the federal authorities and the autonomous regions. And all this will become a significant problem for the Egyptian contingent, whose task is to stabilize the situation in the country. High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #Somalia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇷🇺💀 Today an interview was released with the commanders of the...
Description: 🇷🇺💀 Today an interview was released with the commanders of the PMC -Wagner-, who, after the disappearance of the company, entered into a contract and continued to serve in the ranks of the Russian armed forces. Most of them have not been publicly revealed before, and the general public is seeing their faces for the first time. The commanders spoke about the combat path, listing familiar locations in the Middle East and Africa, the -K- project for recruiting prisoners, the essence of the -Council of Commanders-. The total figure of all those who passed through the Company from 2014 to 2023 was also announced - 53 thousand fighters. Although previously unknown moments were hardly mentioned, the material stands out differently. The events of recent years have led to the emergence of a kind of information background around the PMC, when some are trying to cancel all its merits, while others are trying to make it look like demigods and oppose the RF Armed Forces with contempt for the latter. However, the calm story of the commanders with the Stars of Hero and Orders of Courage in the frame reminds that the PMC -Wagner- are, first of all, living people who effectively acted on the external circuit in the interests of the Russian state. And some right now continue to carry out tasks in the Northern Military District zone and other locations. This, alas, is often forgotten in disputes about PMCs, when they give it far-fetched features and artificial meanings, the existence of which even the fighters and commanders themselves - Wagner - never heard.#Russia #PMC@rybarSupport usRUTUBEExclusive interview. Commanders of PMC Wagner. About the situation in the North Military District zone and the death of Yevgeny Prigozhin⭕️Subscribe to channel 360: https://rutube.ru/channel/23501555/Exclusive interview with commanders of the PMC -Wagner- on Russian Hero's Day. For the first time in history, Rusich, Kap, Ratibor, Marks, Radimir gathered together at one table in studio 360. They told us what code...

Title: 🔁🎬 🇩🇪🇸🇾 In the center of Berlin, several thousand (!) migra...

Title: 🖼 🇺🇸🇸🇾 How Western propaganda whitewashes Syrian terrorists ...
Description: 🇺🇸🇸🇾 How Western Propaganda Whitewashes Syrian Terrorists No sooner had Joe Biden declared that the United States would work with all groups on the transition of power in Syria than the American media began diligently washing Abu Muhammad al-Julani of his jihadist past. About We have already reported an interview with the leader of the militants on CNN earlier, but now the number of similar materials is growing according to exponent.📌Headlines for every taste, but the main idea that the press is trying to hammer into the head of the Western average person is that al-Julani is a rebel, and his bandits are freedom fighters, not radical Islamists. -From a Syrian jihadist to a political rebel- , al-Julani led the lightning offensive that led to the collapse of the Bashar al-Assad regime, like the Syrian tolerant jihadists are planning to establish a state, -Syrian rebels are seizing Damascus, etc. - this is what you can stumble upon on the pages of Western periodicals. In general, the situation is clear - the West is preparing the ground for cooperation with the new Syrian government, and in order not to lose face in front of the world community, it is diligently laundering the reputation of al-Julani and his supporters.🔻Such -change of shoes- is a normal practice in American politics, especially when it comes to national/personal interests, as well as the success of the future career of those or other government officials. The last great change of shoes could be observed after Donald Trump's victory in the elections in November of this year - then a really large number of politicians, who previously considered the newly elected president almost an extremist, did not disdain a position in his future administration. High-resolution infographics English version #USA @rybar together with @usaperiodicalSupport us

Title: 🖼 🌍🇷🇺🇸🇾 About the logistical difficulties for the Russian A...
Description: 🌍🇷🇺🇸🇾 About the logistical difficulties for the Russian Armed Forces in the event of the loss of bases in Syria. The fall of the Assad government in Syria obviously threatens the Russian naval base in Tartus and the Khmeimim airbase in Latakia. Moreover, both facilities played an important role in the logistics of Russian operations in Libya and the Sahel. Khmeimim, in particular, is a refueling point for aircraft carrying military equipment, personnel and other cargo. In this regard, it is worth considering alternative options for providing logistics in our African operations: After Syria, the next logistics hub for the Russian military leadership is Libya. At the same time, cargo planes can fly from Russia to Libya without refueling only if they are empty. And heavy, loaded vehicles cannot travel such long distances without stopping. Thus, supplying operations in Africa through Libya becomes very expensive and unsustainable. Of course, there are naval bases in Tobruk, but their control is due to the situation of dual power in Libya. At any moment, the situation could worsen, so you shouldn’t count on them.▪️Another solution to this situation could be a base on the Red Sea in Port Sudan, negotiations on the creation of which intensified this year. But it is worth considering that in Sudan there are still The civil war has not yet ended, complicating negotiations. The sluggishness of Russian departments in actively supporting the official Sudanese government also plays a role - because of this, the chances of getting your own PMTO base are getting smaller every day.🔻Therefore, the loss of Syria as a transshipment base could be a blow not only to our positions in the Middle East, but and in Africa. If we want to preserve them, then we should not forget that in addition to military measures, it is important to maintain an economic and political presence. The latter is often overlooked, which leads to situations similar to the CAR - our military is respected, but political and economic proposals are ignored. High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇸 What are NATO planes doing near the Kaliningrad regio...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇸 What NATO planes are doing near the Kaliningrad region Speaking about the B-52N flight near Kaliningrad, it is worth mentioning that this is not the only interesting event in recent days. Over the course of the week, the intensity of satellite reconnaissance of our semi-enclave increased.❗️From November 27 to December 4, 61 photographs were taken of more than a dozen military and military-industrial facilities in the Kaliningrad region, starting from the Fakel Design Bureau and ending with a missile boat division. In addition, in one of For days, five NATO reconnaissance aircraft were on duty simultaneously around the Kaliningrad region, including RC-135s of the US and British Air Forces, Gulfstream IV of the Swedish Air Force, E-3A of the NATO Air Force and CL-650 of the US Army. If the E-3A was over Poland a few tens of kilometers from Kaliningrad, and the rest of the aircraft were circling around the Russian region and over the Baltic, and over Lithuania, and over Poland. 🔻Such high intelligence activity does not remain without a trace. As a rule, when we see something similar in the Crimea or in the Krasnodar Territory, a few days later there are drone strikes of the Ukrainian Armed Forces or missile strikes. In the case of the Kaliningrad region, sabotage is possible (in November, a German citizen was detained for organizing such a thing). Or perhaps something else, given the latest events in the Baltic Sea related to incidents on submarine cables. High resolution mapEnglish version#Russia #USA@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇳🇴🇷🇺🇺🇸🇫🇮 About the flights of American bombers to Scan...
Description: 🇳🇴🇷🇺🇺🇸🇫🇮 About the flights of American bombers to Scandinavia🔻American B-52H strategic bombers again actively spent the last days of November and early December, visiting Scandinavia as part of their business trip to Europe.▪️Over the past days, in addition to standard flights to the North sea, airplanes B-52Hs also marked twice over Norway. Once they flew with Norwegian aviation in the central part of the country.▪️But the second time the B-52N flew to the Varanger National Park, which borders the Kola Peninsula. There they practiced simulated launches of bombs and missiles at the Northern Fleet base.▪️And after that, the American bombers flew towards Finland, flying 160 km from the Kaliningrad region and 110 km from Karelia and the Murmansk region, already over Finland itself, where they trained at the Rovaniemi training ground. 🔻The point of this type of aviation flights is to demonstrate the priorities of American foreign policy. Currently, the Arctic and the confrontation in this region are increasingly coming to the fore, which the United States demonstrates with such maneuvers. High resolution mapEnglish version#NATO #Norway #Russia #USA #Finland@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovsky direction: expanding the zone of contro...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovsky direction: expansion of the zone of control of Russian troops and the encirclement of KurakhovoSituation as of 10:00 December 9, 2024 On the fronts of the Donetsk People's Republic, the situation in the Kurakhovsky direction is dynamically developing, where since the end of November Russian troops have further expanded the zone of control, liberating one settlement after another. ▪️On the northern flank, fighters of the Russian Armed Forces advanced in the Zarya area, clearing a pocket in the area and leveling the front line. To the south, units of Russian troops advanced along the shore of the Kurakhovo Reservoir, liberating Ilyinka, Berestki and reaching Starye Tern, adjacent to Kurakhovo. ▪️In the city itself, one of the assault groups of the Russian Armed Forces took up positions in the center and installed a tricolor on the territory of school No. 5, while the other knocked out the enemy from a strong point to the southwest. The list of Ukrainian equipment destroyed in Kurakhovo has also been replenished - in just a few days, the Armed Forces of Ukraine lost the M113 armored personnel carrier, the HMMWV armored fighting vehicle and another Bradley infantry fighting vehicle.▪️On the southern flank, Russian troops liberated Romanovka and started fighting on the outskirts of Vesely Gai, from which conflicting information is still coming in about the ownership of the village point. Also, servicemen of the Russian Armed Forces advanced to Uspenovka from Dalniy, and to the south of the village they significantly approached the Konstantinopolskoye-Annovka line, taking control of the area in the vicinity of Trudovoy. ▪️The gain of today was a section of the area right up to Sukhy Yalov and the outbreak of battles on its streets. Southeast of the settlement, the situation in Gigant and Constantinople remains unclear, where, according to unconfirmed reports, clashes are also taking place. Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of December 9, 2024 ▪️ In the Kursk r...
Description: Forwarded From Two majors#Summary for the morning of December 9, 2024▪️ In the Kursk region, the Russian Armed Forces are achieving success in the Plekhovo area with heavy fighting. The enemy is putting up fierce resistance.▪️ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), during the retreat, the enemy blew up a mine. The Russian Armed Forces are taking control of significant heights. Our troops continue the complex assault on urban development.▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Army has advanced south of Dachensky and continues attacks on the settlement from the southeast. The Russian Armed Forces are moving to the area of ​​the settlement. Shevchenko is the last settlement south of Pokrovsk (Krasnoarmeysk). Enemy resources write about our troops preparing to storm the city.▪️ In the Kurakhovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces continue offensive operations north of the Kurakhovsky reservoir, and from the south of Kurakhovo, which our troops are storming.▪️ In the Velikonovoselkovsky direction, our units have advanced east of Rovnopol in the direction of the Storozhevoy front up to 6 km to a depth of up to 2 km. Blagodatnoye has been liberated.▪️ At night in the Rostov region, air defense forces and means destroyed three UAVs: two in the Millerovo area and one near Kamensk.▪️ Our air defense system worked over Belgorod and the Belgorod region at night - air targets were shot down on approach to the city. During the day, Shebekino, Tavrovo, and Otradnoye were under attack. Drones of the Armed Forces of Ukraine flew into high-rise buildings.▪️In the DPR, 8 civilians were wounded from Nazi fire: Ukrainian troops dropped an IED on a city bus, fired at Selidovo and NATO-caliber artillery. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo majorsVremevskoye direction, reports @voin_dv The liberation of Blagodatnoye (former village) is reported October) south of Velikaya (Bolshaya) Novoselka. We are told from the ground that our troops have indeed taken control of the populated area, but the enemy continues...

Title: 🎬 ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🎞 Chronicle of a special military operation: events...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🎞 Chronicle of a special military operation: events of week 2 - December 8, 2024▪️Russian troops continue to carry out targeted strikes on the enemy’s energy infrastructure in the western regions of the so-called. Ukraine. As a result of several drone flights, substations in the Ternopil and Rivne regions were temporarily disabled, which led to power outages.▪️For the first time in a long time, a Russian unmanned boat was used on a target on the coast of the Odessa region. An explosion occurred in the port of Odessa, causing a fire at the site of the impact.▪️Ukrainian formations, meanwhile, again attacked Russian rear targets in several regions of Russia. One of the UAVs hit a building in Grozny, another was shot down on approach to the Kapustin Yar training ground in the Astrakhan region.▪️For the first time in a long time, the enemy used unmanned boats for a raid on the coast of the Crimean Peninsula. Most of them were sunk near Sevastopol, three more drones that broke through to Kerch were destroyed in the area of ​​Kamysh-Burunskaya Bay.▪️In the Kursk direction, Ukrainian formations are attempting attacks in the Sudzhansky district, including using Leopard 2A6 tanks. The enemy was stopped on the southern outskirts of Daryino, and armored vehicles were destroyed by drone strikes. ▪️At the same time, fighting in Novoivanovka and Pogrebki continues in the Sudzhansky district. On the opposite flank, attack aircraft knocked out the enemy from the eastern outskirts of Plekhovo, advancing in the direction of Guevo. ▪️In the Slobozhansky direction in the area of ​​Volchansk and Glubokoye, no significant changes in the configuration of the front line were noted over the week. North of Veterinary, a Russian drone sprayed an incendiary mixture over Ukrainian positions on the state border line.▪️In the Kupyansko-Svatovsky direction, Russian troops are improving their tactical position along the Oskol River near Kruglyakovka. In the eastern part of Kupyansk, clashes continued in the area of ​​the industrial zone, where an attack by a Russian armored group was again noted.#video #digest #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Decembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on December 7-8, 2024. Russian troops launched a series of attacks on enemy targets in the so-called territory. Ukraine and repelled an attack by Ukrainian Armed Forces drones in several Russian regions. In the Kursk direction, Russian troops knocked out Ukrainian formations from the eastern outskirts of Plekhovo, clearing the territory of the agricultural enterprise. Title: 🖼 🇨🇳🇺🇸🇹🇼🇯🇵 On the build-up of the Chinese group in the A...
Description: 🇨🇳🇺🇸🇹🇼🇯🇵 On the build-up of the Chinese group in the Asia-Pacific region The Chinese command has increased its activity in adjacent waters since December 3 due to the exercises conducted by the US Armed Forces and allies in Japan, as well as the tour of Taiwanese President Lai Qingde to the USA, the Marshall Islands, Tuvalu and Palau.🔻Within training, the Chinese brought out 26 warships. Nine of them are in the East China Sea, and another 12, including the aircraft carrier Shandong, are in the South China Sea and near the Taiwan Strait. And five more - in the waters of the Yellow Sea.▪️From December 5 to 7, ships leaving military bases conducted a command post exercise to organize a conditional joint strike on military targets in Japan and on the island of Taiwan, and coordination was carried out by three AWACS-Kunjing-200 aircraft -.▪️At the same time, today the group of warships remains in large numbers, so in the coming days the Chinese the command can conduct a large-scale naval exercise as part of a response to the Americans and allies in the region. As we see, the game of ping pong in the Asia-Pacific region continues to gain momentum. The Americans or their allies will make a move, the Chinese will respond. But if previously China did this proportionately, now their actions are sometimes superior to their opponents, which increases the overall tension in the Asia-Pacific region. A training session was held over Romania to protect the airspace from attacks by the enemy - Russia. ▪️The actions of the Russian Aerospace Forces imitated Turkish F-16C/Ds, which simulated attacks on Romanian air bases and penetration into airspace. And they were opposed by Spanish and Greek fighters.▪️Detection and guidance were carried out by calculations of the LTR-25 radar installed in Romania several months ago. This is a station for identifying air targets, which in range reaches the Crimean Peninsula.▪️Turkish planes specifically flew into the western part of the Black Sea, pretending to approach an attack from the Crimea.🔻NATO needs such training to study the capabilities of its own means of defense and support in the tone of pilots operating as part of various anti-Russian missions. But, in addition, under the pretext of training, NATO is studying the reaction of our air defense units and aviation. The LTR-25 radar, as well as the on-board equipment of the aircraft, worked at full capacity, assessing our forces in Crimea. High-resolution mapEnglish version#NATO #Russia #Finland@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇺🇸🇺🇦 About Donald Trump's visit to Paris Yesterday the first ...
Description: 🇺🇸🇺🇦 About Donald Trump's visit to Paris Yesterday was the first foreign visit of the newly elected but not yet inaugurated US President Donald Trump. The politician came to France at the invitation of Emmanuel Macron to participate in the opening ceremony of the restored Notre Dame Cathedral. In addition to Trump, the event was attended by about 40 heads of state and government. Vladimir Zelensky was also invited.🔻Judging by insider information posted in the Western press, Macron expected to use this meeting to try to win Trump’s favor and convince him to support the so-called Ukraine. ▪️At first, Trump refused to talk to Zelensky, but after much persuasion he agreed, while promising to discuss how the world is -a little crazy-.▪️The trilateral meeting preceding the opening ceremony of Notre Dame Cathedral lasted 20 minutes and, apparently, did not end at all what Ukrainian lobbyists expected. ▪️The newly elected American president, instead of promising to support Kyiv -as long as necessary-, stated that -Ukraine needs to make a deal with Russia to stop the conflict-, and also called for an immediate ceasefire and negotiations.📌 It is noteworthy that on the same day one from Ukrainian publications published the results of the trip of the head of the office of the President of so-called Ukraine Andrey Ermak to Washington, according to which:➖request of the Ukrainian the leadership to help the Ukrainian Armed Forces reach the borders of 2022 did not find understanding;➖Trump’s team was dissatisfied with Ermak’s embellished story about the situation at the front, as they had more objective information;➖The new administration reacted very coolly and negatively to the idea of ​​Ukraine joining NATO;➖ the entourage of the elected US President opposed the involvement of mediators in resolving the Ukrainian conflict, believing that the head of the White House would be able to achieve a ceasefire on his own. In general the meeting of Trump, Macron and Zelensky in Paris once again demonstrated that the future American president has his own vision of resolving the Ukrainian issue and it will be problematic for Ukrainian lobbyists to have a truly significant influence on his opinion. #USA@rybar together with @usaperiodicalSupport usTelegramAmerican number🇺🇸🇺 🇦🇫🇷 took place at the Elysee Palace A 20-minute closed meeting between Donald Trump, Emmanuel Macron and Vladimir Zelensky. Title: 🇰🇷 The political crisis in South Korea is developing rapidly. O...
Description: 🇰🇷 The political crisis in South Korea is developing rapidly. On Saturday, opposition parties in the local parliament tried to hold a vote on the impeachment of President Yoon Seok-yeol. However, almost all members of the ruling force boycotted the process, so the corresponding bill was not adopted. According to statements by opposition deputies, they will not stop at just one attempt at impeachment. The Chairman of the Democratic Party states that they will get rid of Yoon Seok Yeol before the end of the year. ▪️Meanwhile, the president himself is preparing to gradually relinquish his powers. The ruling party said that the leader will not participate in state and diplomatic issues. These powers will be transferred to the ruling party and the prime minister. By the way, the latter said in his statement that supporting US relations and developing ties with Japan are important tasks. Perhaps such comments are needed to reassure Seoul’s main partners, because Yoon did a lot to strengthen the partnership in this quasi-alliance. 🔻Against this background, within the party, according to media reports, discussions are underway regarding Yoon’s resignation. Some argue that it should happen soon. In addition, the option of dragging the president until 2026, then holding elections, is being considered. Considering all this, it would be premature to hope for a quick solution to the political crisis in South Korea. There are still negotiations ahead between the ruling and opposition parties, which are hinted at by both sides. In addition, the protests of South Korean citizens do not end - the public opinion factor can play an important role in resolving this situation.#SouthKorea @rybar Support usTelegramRybar🇰🇷 On the preparation of the impeachment of the President of South KoreaThe situation in South Korea on the eve of the upcoming vote on the impeachment of President Yoon Seok-yeol is developing rapidly. Title: 🔁 Since Syria ceased to exist this night, it is worth noting sev...
Description: Forwarded From Andrey Medvedev Since Syria ceased to exist that night, it is worth noting several important points. It would be strange if our enemies did not take advantage of our mistakes. If they did not try to strike where the weak point is. Russian TG channels and independent analysts have been writing about the fact that the country's leaders are leading Syria to disaster since approximately 2021. And about the production of Captagon on an industrial scale, and about the terrible state of the army, about the removal of the most intelligent generals, and about the fact that the country’s economy has been destroyed. They also wrote that Syrians are fleeing to territories controlled by the Kurds and HTS (yes, yes), because life is easier there, there is electricity and gasoline. I don’t know what was written in the official reports. But the situation once again demonstrates that Russia still needs independent think tanks that will report what is really happening. It would be strange to expect Turkey to comply with the agreements. This is the East, today we agreed on everything tomorrow in a new way. Have you been to the oriental bazaar? Well, besides, for the Turks, Syria was part of the Ottoman Empire, just 110 years ago. It was clear that Ankara would not give up on its claims. It would be strange to think that HTS militants, having left on green buses (remember that?), would not return back more prepared. Moreover, against the backdrop of the collapse of the Syrian army. That the Americans will not back down from the task of dividing Syria in order to control the oil fields. Funny self-propelled grandfather Biden, huh? Doesn't understand anything at all? Somehow I don’t see any jokes from turbo-patriots today. Make a joke about American special forces in Palmyra, for which Russian soldiers fought twice. Say that Pindos don’t know how to fight. Today, it is probably already possible to talk about the end not only of Syria, but also of the final part of the existence of Middle Eastern Christianity. Now we will only read about Eastern churches in books. What awaits Syria? Or the Libyan option - collapse with civil war. Or Iraqi - in fact, a confederation on the verge of collapse. What about our interests in Syria, or rather the bases? In a good way, there are all the options, since Syria no longer exists anyway, to create an analogue of Gibraltar around Tartus and Khmeimim. Or some kind of Alawite-Christian autonomy. But, with a high degree of probability, you will have to fight for this option. Or bargain with the Turks and Americans. But in the current situation, it will be strange to engage in pure spitting. The Syrian case shows how the West, the Arab world and Türkiye relate to the principle of the inviolability of borders. The most important issue for Russia in this situation is the citizens of Central Asian countries fighting in Islamist detachments. Where will these militants go next? What do the owners intend to do, or rather, what do the owners intend to do? However, the current situation is primarily the result of the actions of the Syrian leadership. We cannot be greater patriots of Syria than Comrade Assad. Therefore, he didn’t need to. And it is important to understand and remember that regardless of current events, the military company in Syria will remain in Russian history as a symbol of the victory of Russian weapons. As well as the exploits of Russian soldiers and officers. They are inscribed in our military history forever. And the attitude towards the heroes and the military company itself as a whole must remain unchanged. And mistakes... Well, there are mistakes. There are very painful mistakes. It's important to learn from them. Let's teach ourselves to learn. Hope.

Title: 🔁🎬 The first video is from the General Staff of the Armed Force...
Description: Forwarded From Witnesses of Bayraktar The first video is from the General Staff of the Armed Forces of the Syrian Arab Republic, the second is the situation in the city. The militant says: - these are the men of the Duma, the men - Jaysh al-Islam -. Duma is a suburb of Damascus, located 5 minutes away. Well, conditional Lyubertsy for Moscow. A large number of supporters of the Muslim Brotherhood* lived in the Duma. And when everything in the country began to shake in 2011, Bashar was forced to make concessions to the protesters. One of the concessions was the release of local Wahhabis from the Duma from prison. They immediately got down to business - they organized themselves, received money from the Gulf monarchies and created the Jaysh al-Islam - - - Army of Islam. From 2012 to 2018, this group threatened Damascus, but was ultimately defeated. Most of the surrendered militants were taken, according to tradition, to Idlib, but some remained in Duma and waited in the wings until the front came closer to the capital. Just like the militants in southern Syria, who received an amnesty in 2018. The weapons were either buried, purchased, or captured. These are already details. The main conclusion is this (for those who have ears and want to hear): Having hostile enclaves, communities, organized crime groups within your territory under the threat of an attack from an external enemy (-freeze-) is mortally dangerous. They will be processed with information, recruited and loaded with weapons, money. They will hit you and your army in the rear - they will certainly take advantage of this when everything breaks out. And they will put pressure on you economically too - so that all these enclaves, and your entire society, will also boil over. -Freezing- - it only sounds cool, in fact it is a hot process of preparing for a new war. Just under the outer shell. S. Shilov* - terrorist organization Video is too big
