Title: 🖼 ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Deraa province): ongoing attacks on ...
Description: ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Deraa province): ongoing attacks on government targets situation to end December 5, 2024 In Daraa province in southern Syria, attempts by factions - the Syrian opposition - to provoke a rebellion continue. Local militant sleeper cells carried out several attacks on government positions. ▪️So, on the Damascus-Daraa road near the city of Izraa, a car with military intelligence officers was fired upon: two of them were wounded, one was killed. Opposition media accused them of collaborating with the Iranians. ▪️In the city of Aqraba in the north of the province, the checkpoint of the Political Security Directorate was already shelled. The militants used a hand-held anti-tank grenade launcher and small arms; there is no information about casualties. ❗At the same time, a video appeared on the Internet in which masked people announced the formation of an operational headquarters, which allegedly included several anti-government groups in the province. This suggests that the situation in Daraa will only worsen. Taking advantage of the collapse of the SAA's defenses, the sleeper cells will cease to be such and will move on to the open phase of the struggle with the central government. In turn, this will contribute to the deterioration of the situation in neighboring Es-Suwayda, where discontent among local Druze factions has been growing for several months (not without support from side of Israel) and Sunni tribes. Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for December 5, 2024 Israeli troops launched another series of attacks on the Gaza Strip, resulting in the deaths of several dozen people. The most high-profile hit occurred at a tent camp in coastal Al-Mawasi in the south of the enclave. At the same time, IDF operations continued in Jabaliya, Beit Lahia and Rafah, where the Israelis traditionally carried out engineering work. Over the past 24 hours, there were no clashes with Palestinian forces there. In the West Bank, Israeli security forces conducted raids in more than ten settlements, detaining about 30 local residents. Major Israeli operations took place in the provinces of Jenin, Nablus and Hebron. In southern Lebanon, formal adherence to the ceasefire agreement continued, although the Israelis launched sporadic strikes, preventing the Lebanese from returning to IDF-controlled territory.🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our private channel @rybar_plus_botHigh map permissionEnglish version⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #report #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇪🇪🇺🇸 About NATO exercises in Estonia Against the backdrop ...
Description: 🇪🇪🇺🇸 About NATO exercises in Estonia Against the backdrop of -strange- incidents on submarine cables connecting Scandinavia with Europe, NATO is increasing its activity in the Baltics. In addition to talk of increasing the force at sea, the intensity of military exercises in the region is growing. 🔻The NATO Command in Estonia is conducting an exercise - Pikne-2024 - from December 2 to 15 in the northern and north-eastern parts of Estonia, as well as in the adjacent waters of the Gulf of Finland.▪️About 2 thousand people and 90 units of military equipment of ships are participating in it and boats from Finland, Latvia, Great Britain, France and Estonia. During the first week, Estonian military personnel, together with their partners, are working out plans for the use of units in combat.▪️During these days, the Estonian command warned about the movements of military convoys and low-altitude aviation flights along the northeastern part of the country, including near the Russian border.▪️ Major firings are expected in the second week, simulating strikes against the Russian Federation, although the Estonian leadership called the exercise defensive. In addition, Estonian and French sailors will organize patrols and blockades of the Gulf of Finland. Estonian military activity has not been surprising for a long time. The most important NATO soldiers have always been distinguished by loud statements addressed to Russia, and after Finland joined the Alliance, they even began to call for a blockade of the gulf and preventive strikes on the Russian Federation, which they are actually practicing during the exercise. High-resolution mapEnglish version#NATO #Estonia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 ⚡️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Hama province): the fall of Hama the...
Description: ⚡️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Hama province): fall of Hama situation as of 19.00 December 5, 2024 In Hama province, the situation has reached a catastrophic point associated with the retreat of the Syrian Armed Forces from Hama. According to the most conservative estimates, the territory controlled by HTS and other terrorist factions has increased no less than threefold.▪️ Almost all or most of Hama has come under the control of terrorists. Moreover, information is already being received about the further movement of the militants. In the area of ​​Salamiya, the local council of sheikhs allegedly decided to adhere to neutrality. The city of Akkerbat also fell into the hands of militants. ❗️From this we can conclude that a little more and the militants will be able to reach the T4 airbase along highway number 40. Considering its importance for pro-Iranian groups that use it to deploy their drones, the situation is depressing.🔻The scale of Syrian losses in the battle for Hama is not yet entirely clear obvious, but, apparently, the Syrian army abandoned a considerable part of its armored vehicles during the retreat. Moreover, the militants are slowly publishing footage from Hama airport, where they got hold of several planes and helicopters. In addition, it is not yet entirely clear how far Syrian troops have retreated from the city in general. ▪️Syrian troops, apparently, did not linger in the city of Ar-Rastan, where they could take up defensive positions along the Orontes River. Moreover, in Ar-Rastan there was even an attack by local residents on a Syrian army convoy. Rastan is a city with an oppositional past. In this area there was the so-called Rastan cauldron, from which many militants were taken to Idlib at one time. And now -Idlib is going in the opposite direction.▪️In addition, information has appeared that Syrian aviation or artillery struck in Tel Bis. What happened is not yet entirely obvious, but if the militants reached this settlement, then by the evening clashes will begin on the outskirts of Homs.❗️The situation is deteriorating rapidly, and by the evening, it is quite possible that it will become even more depressing. High-resolution map⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #map #Syria #Hama@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇸🇾🏴 About attacks on the Russian Khmeimim airfield and ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇸🇾🏴 About attacks on the Russian Khmeimim airfield and negative forecasts🔻Even before the fall of Hama, many seriously speculated that the militants would stop sooner or later and would not advance deep south from Aleppo, including to Latakia. But these people are deeply mistaken, especially now.▪️The fact is that throughout the week, Syrian militants have been attacking the territory of the Syrian coast with drones. Drones are shot down time after time near Masyaf in mountainous Latakia, and today several birds were shot down on their approach to the Russian Khmeimim airbase. ▪️And similar attempts will continue to be made. Now the militants are taking out all the accumulated weapons that during the four years of the truce they were able to create, accumulate, and organize production, using workshops on the territory of their so-called Greater Idlib to inflict maximum fire damage. ▪️At the same time, a huge number of fakes are being circulated online that all military equipment has been removed from the affected area from Khmeimim and Tartus, and so on. Although in fact this is not true. In reality, we need to understand that the militants will not stop. ▪️They will try to inflict maximum defeat, reputational and physical damage on representatives of the Russian Federation, in particular to destroy our military bases, so it is necessary to continue to fight them and shift all responsibility onto the shoulders of the Syrian Arab army, in this case it is a lost cause. ▪️The Syrians objectively cannot cope now without the help of our aviation and our specialists. And in the absence of support, the rollback of the Syrian Arab Army will continue. Especially now, when militants are clearing Hama and Homs looms before them. High resolution mapEnglish version#Russia #Syria #terrorism@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 🇷🇺🇸🇾🇹🇷 In addition to what has already been said as part...
Description: Forwarded From Global Studies🇷🇺🇸🇾🇹🇷 In addition to what has already been said as part of the assessment of the possible consequences after the fall of Hama, two more important factors should be mentioned. The first is what the Syrian government expects, in addition to pro-Turkish militants. And we are talking about the moderate opposition and rebellious tribes in southern Syria. They have already shown signs of intensification in recent days, but recent events will clearly push them to action. The weakness of the Assad government is no longer just visible, but has clear outlines. And it’s not that there are no prospects for saving the situation. But there are very few options, and that’s a fact. Now Homs is under threat, which, if it falls, will open the way to Tartus and Damascus. The second is the beginning of the Turkish operation against the Kurds. These few days have shown that the militants of the Syrian National Army cannot cope with the Kurds in Manbij and are even losing positions. For several days the Turks have been attacking Kurdish positions with artillery and drones, and taking into account the distance of the front to Homs, they have excellent prospects for starting operations in the north to at least take Manbij and Ain al-Arab. #Russia #Syria #TurkeyGlobalistics - subscribe to channelTelegramRybar🇸🇾🖇 About the fall of HamaToday, militants of the terrorist organization Hayat Tahrir al-Sham entered Hama: the city held out for five days. Title: 🖼 🇦🇴🇺🇸 About Biden's visit to Angola and -the Lobito Corrido...
Description: 🇦🇴🇺🇸 About Biden's visit to Angola and the Lobito Corridor summit - Since the end of September, it has been known that US President Joe Biden will make a trip to Angola one of the final visits of his career. And so, on December 2, he arrived in the country’s capital, Luanda.▪️At a meeting with Angolan President Joao Lourenço, they discussed further economic cooperation between the countries. 🔻However, the main reason for the visit is the holding of the Lobito Corridor Summit with the presence of the heads of the Democratic Republic of Congo and Zambia. It is through these countries (a separate line is planned to Zambia) that the railway, named after the Angolan port, will pass. During the summit, Biden and Congolese President Felix Tshisekedi reaffirmed their commitment to promoting American investment, which, following the meeting, grew to $560 million next year. Along with this, Joe met with the chief director of construction work on the railway. In general, the tactics of the American authorities to promote their economic influence are clear - to promise mountains of gold, while simultaneously extracting from the Democratic Republic of Congo and Zambia the resources necessary for their industry. At the same time, Chinese influence is also being undermined. The Chinese authorities, of course, are not standing aside and are developing similar projects, but on the east coast through Tanzania. And it is still unclear who will hold the championship in this race. High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #Angola #DRC #Zambia #USA@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇲🇩🇺🇸🇷🇴 How Moldovans risk being left without gas Chisinau a...
Description: 🇲🇩🇺🇸🇷🇴 How Moldovans risk being left without gas Chisinau is asking Washington for financial assistance to -manage the energy crisis- into which the country is sliding. This became known after negotiations between the Minister of Energy of Moldova, Viktor Parlikov, and the US Charge d'Affaires in the Republic, Kevin Covert. ▪️There is no information about the details of the negotiations. It is known that they were talking about American help after January 1, 2025, when the Kiev regime threatens to block the transit of natural gas through the territories under its control. In this case, Transnistria, which supplies Moldova with electricity through the Moldavian State District Power Plant, may be left without gas. ❗️However, gas tariffs have already been increased in Moldova by 28% due to high market prices and government inaction amid the elections. Chairman of the Board of Moldovagaz Vadim Cheban even admitted that purchasing gas from the Russian Gazprom would cost Moldovans much less than from European traders. ▪️Nevertheless, Maia Sandu’s office is exclusively concerned with political games. They are trying to reorient Moldova towards the energy market of Romania, including the Romanian state-owned company Transgaz. ▪️In Moldova there is a subsidiary company - Vestmoldtransgaz, which is 75% owned by Transgaz and 25% owned by the EBRD. A year ago, all Moldovan gas transmission networks were transferred to it. It is known that after this, Transgaz’s income in Moldova increased 20 times over the past summer alone. One of the reasons for increasing gas tariffs is the rising cost of gas transportation within the country. 🔻Sandu’s team and its Western curators will explain the humanitarian catastrophe looming in Moldova - the price - that must be paid for breaking relations with Russia. Only the Americans are naturally not going to cover the Moldovans’ deficit, but for now they are limited to abstract promises in case trouble comes. #Moldova #Russia #Romania #USA @rybarSupport usMoldpresSUA va susţine Republica Moldova în contextul crizei energetice actualeChişinău, 4 dec. /MOLDPRES/. Ministrul Energiei, Victor Parlicov, avut ieri o întrevedere cu însărcinatul cu afaceri ad-interim al Statelor Unite ale Americii în Republica Moldova, Kevin Covert. Părţile au discutat securitatea livrărilor de gaze naturale…

Title: 🇸🇾🖇 About the fall of Hama Today, militants of the terrorist o...
Description: 🇸🇾🖇 About the fall of Hama Today, militants of the terrorist organization Hayat Tahrir al-Sham entered Hama: the city held out for five days. Currently, the presence of terrorists is recorded in the northern part of the city and in the military airfield located to the west. The official communiqué of the Syrian Arab Army said that the units left the city in order to save the lives of civilians and move the fighting outside the city. In fact, they surrendered the provincial capital without even trying to cling to the neighborhoods. Over the past 24 hours, the Syrian information disgrace organs (they cannot be called otherwise) have been calling not to believe the militants’ information, to trust only official sources, and not to succumb to propaganda. All this time, the information resources of the militants simply flooded the information field with various fake and not very videos and resonant statements. Ultimately, the phase - we control everything, don’t believe the lies - moved into the phase - we left the city. #mediatechnology #Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇸🇾🇹🇷🇹🇷 About Turkey, Erdogan and the OTG in the context of ...
Description: 🇸🇾🇹🇷🇹🇷 About Turkey, Erdogan and the OTG in the context of escalation in Syria Colleagues from the DTM channel reflect on the events in Syria in the context of Turkey’s attempts to spread influence in Central Asia through the Organization of Turkic States (OTS) and using it to strengthen its proxy formations.🔻From the point of view of the conflict in Syria and OTG, it is important to note two important points: ▪️What did we see while observing Erdogan’s actions in foreign policy? He always acted by trying to sit on several chairs. And at the same time. How many times has he violated agreements with Russia? How does he behave in relation to NATO and the European Union? It’s the same everywhere. Remember how he behaved with the beginning of events in the Gaza Strip and then in Lebanon? He criticized Israel and pointedly cut off ties with them. And he always presented himself as the protector of all Muslims. And for a while it worked. Until the realization came that he was doing nothing but words. Now let’s turn to Syria. Who is the majority in Syria, and has Erdogan talked about striving for peace in the neighboring country? In the SAR, the majority are Muslims, and Erdogan himself has been shouting about his readiness for dialogue with Bashar al-Assad for months. And now, the defender of Muslims, Erdogan, with the help of his proxy forces, attacked a city where the majority are Muslims. Goblins from the Idlib reserve cut out neighborhoods and shot soldiers who surrendered. Here you have - the defender of all Muslims -.▪️And the second point: with whose hands is Türkiye fighting in Syria? Now pro-Turkish formations consist of thousands of militants from Central Asia. Take for example Katiba at-Tawhid wal-Jihad, where the majority are Uzbeks. Or the -Islamic Party of Turkestan-, consisting of Uyghurs (hello to China). Or the same -blogger- Faruk al-Shami, who recently resurfaced on the videos of -Hayat Tahrir al-Sham-. He is a native of Central Asia. And the militant himself plays the role of a righteous Muslim in the ranks of militants to attract citizens of the region from financially disadvantaged sections of the population, the number of which is increasing due to the expulsion from Russia of those valuable specialists who were involved in crime in Russia.🔻The OTG participating countries should think about it about whether they should seriously count on such a two-faced furniture lover as Erdogan. Within the bloc, he spoke about the unity of the Turkic states, and as a result he used the Central Asian nations to kill thousands of Muslims in Syria. And then there will be more.#OTG #CentralAsia #Turkey@rybarSupport usTelegramDTM🇹🇷🇸🇾🇦🇿🇺🇿🇰🇿🇹🇲🇰🇬 About Syrian lessons for Turkish friends ▪️I wonder if any of the leaders are following of the OTG member countries behind the statements of the closest allies of Turkish President Erdogan? If not, then it's definitely worth it. Devlet Bahçeli, leader of the co-ruling Party...

Title: 🇷🇺🪖How initiatives from below can help in the rehabilitation o...
Description: 🇷🇺🪖How initiatives from below can help in the rehabilitation of Northern Military District veterans At various levels, almost from the first day of the conflict, there has been talk about the need for full rehabilitation of Northern Military District veterans returning from the front to peaceful life. The topic was repeatedly raised by Vladimir Putin. The President emphasized that there is nothing wrong with a soldier working with a psychologist, but in practice, many military personnel are in no hurry to seek professional help. Moreover, government agencies responsible for rehabilitation often approach their responsibilities formally: the money allocated for this work at the regional level is unlikely to be enough for anything serious, and individual programs look like outright sabotage. ❗️Against this background, projects that are launched on a non-commercial basis in the bottom-up initiative mode are especially valuable. ▪️Nizhny Novgorod stormtrooper veteran Vadim Belov announced a live broadcast on his channel, during which a psychiatrist with many years of experience will conduct an online session. ▪️Vadim hopes to show his comrades by his own example that there is nothing shameful in contacting a specialized specialist. Thus, the veteran segment of Telegram can become a kind of assembly point for those who are already officially called the country’s new elite. 📌Experts note: despite the psychological boom that Russia is experiencing today, society will soon face an acute shortage of truly qualified specialists who should help not only veterans rehabilitate themselves and return to a full life. An equally important task faces society: often, people who have gone through the hell of war are healthier and more adequate than those who sat in the rear, pretending that what was happening did not concern them.🔻What else is important for us personally. Vadim Belov is a student of the online department of the Rybar Media School. And it was during the learning process that the idea of ​​his project was born, which we unconditionally support. We profess a project approach: our students do not just gain abstract knowledge, but apply it in practice, developing their own resources in the new media segment, creating and launching socially significant (on a national scale) projects, and becoming full-fledged opinion leaders. If you are passionate about an idea, the implementation of which is needed and useful to society right now, join us - write to @school_rybar_bot#mediaschool #education #Russia @rybarSupport usTelegramStormtrooper Diary | about SVO📣😊😊😊😊😊😊 😊😊😊😊There is an opinion that all participants in combat operations are PSYCHES, completely suffering from PTSD. Is this true? I decided to test it on myself. To do this, I underwent an experimental psychological study, the results of which I will discuss LIVE with the hero...

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🖍 Happy Volunteer Day! Today's holiday is relatively youn...
Description: 🇷🇺🖍 Happy Volunteer Day! Today’s holiday is relatively young: the decree on this memorable day appeared only in 2017, although the history of domestic public mutual assistance began in the times of Russia. The events of a special military operation clearly demonstrated the role of volunteers in modern Russia. Almost hundreds of thousands of people went to the front at the call of their hearts, began to purchase and produce drones, weave camouflage networks and help staff in hospitals. It is these people who, without any pathos or big words, help their neighbors in a variety of ways, are that very civil society , which ensures the development of the country and its sustainability in difficult times. Title: 🔁 🇵🇱🇺🇦 What a fuss there was over the introduction of a bill...
Description: Forwarded From Warsaw Mermaid🇵🇱🇺🇦 What a fuss arose because of the introduction of a bill to the Polish parliament on punishment for -propaganda of the OUN and UPA-. Immediately, statements began to pour in that, they say, the Poles realized who the louse was and showed Kiev a bite and a bite. It’s not that simple, guys. Of course, the Poles want to once again show the Ukrainians their place with this news, but this is not the key point. Let's figure it out.🔻To begin with, it is worth noting that this is not the first time such initiatives have been submitted for consideration by the lower house of parliament. Attempts to somehow legislate the ban on Bandera propaganda have been made for a long time - mainly, of course, by the right. Mostly, of course, unsuccessfully. One way or another, projects were sent for revision, then they did not reach final approval - these are still bureaucratic adventures. Therefore, in fact, nothing new or surprising happened.🔻Moreover, if we delve deeper into the internal political discourse of Poland before the elections. The document was submitted for consideration by the current opposition and the former ruling party Law and Justice (PiS). The main direction of today's rhetoric of the political group is moderate nationalism, focusing on national problems and theses, and their candidate is the head of the Institute of National Remembrance of Poland (IPN). Therefore, it is logical that politicians quite strongly seized on the opportunity to return to power and lead the fight for, so to speak, national identity. I’m more than sure that if PiS manages to push the bill through to President Andrzej Duda, then, for old times’ sake, he won’t refuse and won’t veto this time and will sign the piece of paper with a grin.🔻Well, I’ll add that the document proposes to equate the propaganda of these movements of Ukrainian nationalists with the propaganda of Nazism, communism, fascism or other totalitarian mode. This is punishable by imprisonment for up to three years. The bill also proposes to clarify the list of crimes investigated by IPN and to identify specific organizations behind the Volyn massacre.  📌You shouldn’t succumb to the general hysteria that the Poles have somehow realized something: now the discourse on nationalism is the most popular topic and at the top of the political pyramid there will be someone who will be able to accumulate an electorate around him in time and retain him.#Poland #Ukraine@pl_syrenka - Poland is not a foreign countryTelegramSprats in exile I Latvian News🇵🇱🇺🇦A bill banning the propaganda of Banderaism was submitted to the Sejm of Poland - Banderaism was an ideology that justified the Volyn genocide, that is, the genocide committed against the Poles Ukrainian nationalists during World War II...

Title: 🔁 ❗️SITUATION IN THE SOUTH DONETSK DIRECTION❗️ Let’s move straig...
Description: Forwarded From Warrior DV❗️SITUATION IN THE SOUTH DONETSK DIRECTION❗️Let's go straight to the hottest part. The enemy launched a counterattack in Novy Komar yesterday, but more of an informational one. I posted a video of a flag in a village, but for some reason it was filmed not from a copter, but from the ground, in some ruins. It is difficult to determine the geoposition, but even if this is the northern part of New Komar (at least, it was on it that the assault groups of the Vostok group of troops latched onto it a few days ago), then the question arises - if the enemy was able to completely dislodge our units from the village, then why the flag is it filmed so covertly and not from a copter that the position of the flag can be determined? More like an enemy information anti-crisis. The notorious Yura Sumsky plays into their hands, in his report he managed to bury the Marines of the 40th Guards Brigade, who were the first to drop into the village. The northern part of Novy Komar is still under the control of our units, the groups are in touch, no one surrendered the village, fighting continues . Initially, the position of the assault groups was not the most favorable, since the jump from Razdolny was too long, and the supply line was stretched. Now other units have been able to clear the forest belts east of Novy Komar and we hope that this will simplify further work to liberate the village. In addition, an information counterattack is being launched in the direction of Razdolny itself. Yesterday, a number of resources of the Ukrainian Armed Forces published footage of the enemy’s presence in the center of the village and the capture of several servicemen of the 37th Guards Brigade. However, the events in the video are at least a week ago - when the assault on the village was just beginning. At the same time, together with the video cans, the enemy is making real attempts at counterattacks, trying to cling to Razdolnoye again. The enemy is pulling more and more reserves here, the missile defense ends here and now our attack aircraft are opposed by personnel units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. To the east, the enemy is gradually being forced out of the city. n. Sukhie Yaly, within 24 hours the assault units of the Vostok group of forces managed to further advance to the north. The situation in the Constantinople/Ostrovsky area is even sadder for the enemy. Here, sources from the field note that, in general, the enemy is gradually losing the will to resist, increasingly giving up positions or surrendering himself. The advance of the assault groups of the Vostok group of troops is moving a little more slowly to the east. The enemy is stubborn here, and if earlier many oporniki were engaged here practically without a fight, now the VSUshnik has become more stubborn in battles for each OP. However, our assault groups have already come close to Merry Guy. The only remaining road from the Elizavetovsky forest is under tight fire control. The forest itself is gradually being cleared. @voin_dv

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of December 5, 2024 ▪️ At least 9 air...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Report for the morning of December 5, 2024▪️ At least 9 enemy UAVs were shot down over the Bryansk region at night.▪️ Enemy resources reported at night attacks on Shostki in the Sumy region, Mirgorod in the Poltava region, Krasnograd in the Kharkov region, Pokrov in the Dnepropetrovsk region, a number of populated areas points of the Cherkasy region, Zhytomyr and Odessa region. UAVs -Geranium- and FAB with UMPC were working. In the morning, reports of explosions in Kiev began to arrive.▪️ From the Kursk region, the North group of troops writes about repelling two enemy counterattacks at Novoivanovka and Daryino. The enemy throws personnel into oncoming battles with the support of Western armored vehicles (the tank -Leopard- and the infantry fighting vehicle -Bradley- were destroyed)▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces liberated the village. Yellow, they are advancing towards the settlement. Dachenskoe, south of the settlement. Shevchenko, Russian troops continue attacks along the railway. There is information that Ukrposhta is being evacuated from Pokrovsk and will stop working next week.▪️ In the Kurakhovsky direction they are reporting the successes of our troops near Romanovka. In Kurakhovo itself, the zone of control of Russian units is expanding, and the Russian Armed Forces are attacking the village from the south. Dry Yaly, having already occupied part of the settlement. The enemy's position in a number of villages is actually an operational encirclement; his withdrawal is unlikely, especially since the command of the Armed Forces of Ukraine prohibits its units from leaving positions, despite the obvious pointlessness of resistance.▪️ In the Vremevsky direction in the settlement. Blagodatnoe units of the Vostok group of troops planted the Russian flag. There are oncoming battles in the area of ​​New Komar and Velikaya (Bolshaya) Novoselka. ▪️ In the Belgorod region, Shebekino, the village of Gruzskoye and the village of Politotdelsky were attacked by drones of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Several fires broke out. During the day, Shebekino also came under artillery shelling and UAV strikes, three civilians were wounded.▪️ In the DPR in Gorlovka, a civilian was wounded as a result of a 155-mm artillery strike from the enemy. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo majorsVremevskoe directionSturmoviks of the 37th Guards Motorized Rifle Brigade planted a flag on the remains of the roof of the state farm -October-, reports @burpobeda@voin_dv writes that currently northeast of Blagodatnoye they continue to move forward and clear forest belts...

Title: 🔁🖼 🇵🇱🔥Another port was burning in Poland. On December 4, the...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors🇵🇱🔥Another port was burning in Poland. On December 4, a fire occurred on a conveyor belt above a warehouse in the port of Gdynia on the territory of the HES Gdynia Bulk Terminal. This port is known for its use for the delivery of weapons to Ukraine: in 2022, cargo from Spain passed through it, and in February 2023, port employees were poisoned by unknown substances after unloading containers with army markings from a ship. Previously, on July 14-15 of this year , a fire broke out in the Polish port of Gdansk on the territory of the warehouse premises of the InterRoyal terminal with allegedly plastic toys. Local residents recorded the sounds of detonation from the fire. And near the terminal, tractors and containers in NATO military colors were seen. Since the beginning of the Northern Military District, the Poles have been actively using their civilian infrastructure for military needs. In the same port of Gdansk, a transshipment terminal of the BLG AutoTerminal company opened in the spring, which is intended exclusively for the transshipment of military equipment and cargo, and the port of Szczecin received an EU grant under the military mobility program (8.7 million euros) for the construction of a transshipment railway stations. In 2025, the port of Gdansk will receive additional funding in the amount of 93 million euros to expand transshipment capacity. ✨More than anyone, apparently, the psheks do not want to end the war in Ukraine: they take money for the transit of Western military equipment to Ukraine, and in the opposite direction they export cheap grain and other raw materials. The Germans also sponsor free grants for logistics 🇩🇪. Two majors

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for December 4, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, the IDF ground operation continues in Jabaliya and Beit Lahia. Amid the fighting, several thousand local residents were evacuated from the latter today and headed towards the expanded humanitarian zone. Israeli troops launched a series of attacks on various areas of the enclave: over 40 people were killed and several dozen were injured. In the West Bank, Israeli security forces conducted a series of raids in almost 20 settlements, detaining at least 23 local residents on charges of links to Hamas. The largest operations took place in Jenin, Yabad and Hebron. Shelling by the Israel Defense Forces continues on the Lebanese-Israeli border, despite the formal compliance with the ceasefire agreement. Restoration work is underway in Beirut and other major cities of Lebanon. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Decembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on December 4, 2024. Russian troops hit targets in the western regions of the so-called. Ukraine and hit a target in the port of Odessa with an unmanned boat. Ukrainian formations attacked Grozny and Taganrog with drones. In the Kurakhovsky direction, Russian troops liberated Romanovka, and are also fighting on the southern approaches to Uspenovka. In the Pokrovsky direction, units of the Russian Armed Forces liberated Zheltoye. As the front approaches Pokrovsk, more and more targets are hit in the city. In the Vremevsky direction, Russian troops have significantly expanded the zone of control in the fields east of Blagodatnoye, and also hoisted a flag on the southern outskirts of the village. Title: 🇸🇾🏴✈️ About the -drone aspect- of the Syrian crisis During the...
Description: 🇸🇾🏴✈️ About the -unmanned aspect- of the Syrian crisis. During the current escalation, Syrian infantry is setting sad records for the rate of retreat. If earlier the SAA could leave at most a few dozen villages during an enemy offensive, now their number literally in a matter of days exceeded a hundred, or even two. Moreover, this counter only continues to accumulate. One of the reasons is that the previous tactics of government troops have stopped working. Previously, during militant attacks, the Syrians liked to retreat to the next line of defense and call fire on abandoned positions, and after the enemy retreated due to artillery fire, they returned to their previous lines.❗️But now this is failing: now the militants begin to hit the Syrians from the air before the attack, actively pursuing units retreating from positions. You can also remember that the SAA doesn’t like to dig trenches, and untrenched infantry in an open field is an easy target even for not the most experienced operators. Therefore, if earlier the Syrians could roll back, calmly wait for artillery and air strikes and come back, now they are suffering significant losses already at the time of retreat. On the next line, the SAA also cannot gain a foothold, and the militants are often in no hurry to immediately enter the abandoned villages, and the bombs fall into the void. But even if the Syrians go on a counterattack and drop into an abandoned village, they immediately fall under UAV attacks (again we remember the absence trenches). All this greatly affects the morale of the fighters, as a result of which they either stop trying to regain control of the lost lines, or run away completely immediately after the start of the battle.📌 From the ground, they complement the picture a little: as practice shows, in the SAA they often have no idea what it is drone and what capabilities it has. Therefore, when a drone drops an FOG in the deep rear, the Syrians think that the enemy has already approached the AGS firing range, so they abandon positions even far from the LBS. In this way, chaos and huge holes in the defense are created, into which the enemy can immediately -fly- in pickup trucks, and with the involvement of much less forces than was previously required. #UAV #Syria #terrorism@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇨🇳🇵🇭 The situation in the South China Sea has become tense ag...
Description: 🇨🇳🇵🇭 The situation in the South China Sea has again become tense - near one of the reefs there was again a skirmish between ships of the Philippine and Chinese coast guards. Versions of what happened, as always, differ. The Chinese side claims that the Philippines attempted to penetrate the territorial waters of Scarborough Reef, so the Chinese coast guard took appropriate measures. The Philippines says its coast guard was patrolling the waters near the reef to protect fishermen there. However, they encountered aggressive actions from the Chinese, who used water cannons against them. The skirmish that occurred may be a continuation of the Sino-Philippine conflict on a different plane. In November, Manila passed laws defining Philippine territories in the South China Sea. China responded by issuing a map showing the boundaries of territorial waters near Scarborough Reef. In addition, the Chinese side has stepped up patrols near the disputed reef, which the Philippine Coast Guard seems to have stumbled upon. 📌 In general, nothing extraordinary happened in the water area, since the Chinese coast guard quite often uses water cannons and expels Philippine ships from the water area. However, the event is a reminder that the situation in the South China Sea is still quite unstable, even despite an agreement concluded in the summer that resolved the issue of delivering cargo to the Philippine outpost in the waters. #China #Philippines @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usTelegramWaking dragon 🐲🇨🇳🇵🇭 Another skirmish in the South China Sea. Again water cannons were used against the Filipinos, and again the parties performed dangerous maneuvers near the disputed Scarborough Reef. In general, everything is classic. By the way, clashes between the coast guard departments of China and the Philippines...

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Hama province): militant advances, c...
Description: ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Hama province): advances of militants, clashes in the Al-Gabob Valley Situation as of 20.00 December 3, 2024 The situation in Hama province is getting worse by leaps and bounds. Militant activity is increasing in the Al-Ghab Valley area, where they have launched attacks in the vicinity of Jurin, Al-Karim and Al-Hura. Pro-Turkish groups also control Qalaat al-Madyk, where one of the local propagandists recently arrived.▪️The militants continue to launch UAVs at Syrian military bases, and for the first time since the beginning of the current escalation they tried to attack Khmeimim from one of the cities previously lost to the SAA. The drone was shot down over the village of Qardaha.▪️The situation north of the regional capital, the city of Hama, is significantly deteriorating. Currently, Al-Jalama, Al-Latamna, as well as Suran and Mrewad have been captured by militants. Russian and Syrian aviation are targeting targets inside populated areas, but government sources continue to talk about allegedly repelling all attacks.▪️In the vicinity of Maar al-Shukhur, fighting continues, militants claim the capture of several SAA fighters and strikes from anti-tank systems on the heights of Zein al-Shukhur. Abidin. The latter remains under the control of the Syrians, and, perhaps, only this prevents anti-government groups from breaking into the northern outskirts of Hama.▪️In addition, the militants captured the Al-Mujanzirat base: yesterday the Syrians retreated from there under drone attacks, later launched a successful counterattack, but were unable to gain a foothold and rolled away. As a result, many pieces of equipment became trophies of anti-government groups, including the third T-90 and the low-altitude radar - Podlet-K1 - in good condition.▪️To the east, according to statements by Syrian pro-government sources, the SAA was able to regain control over the village of At-Tuba. There have been no personnel from there yet, while reports continue to appear on the Internet about the seizure of populated areas by illegal armed groups to the east in the direction of the desert. And several militant drones were shot down over Al-Saan and Ittria.🔻Judging by the fact that militants are already conducting reconnaissance and carrying out strikes in these areas, it is possible that fighting will begin here in the near future. As we wrote earlier, this poses a very big threat to Syria. High resolution mapEnglish version ⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #map #Syria #Hama@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇦🇲 About Pashinyan’s next statements regarding the CSTO Prime M...
Description: 🇦🇲 About Pashinyan’s next statements regarding the CSTO Prime Minister of Armenia Nikol Pashinyan again spoke about relations with the CSTO, announcing that the republic’s return to the organization is almost impossible. During the government hour in parliament, Pashinyan was asked to comment on Vladimir Putin’s words that Armenia could return to full-time work in the CSTO in the future. The Armenian prime minister stated that Yerevan does not participate in discussions and decision-making, and also does not use a veto, since it already thinks of itself outside the CSTO. 🔻We constantly hear such statements addressed to the CSTO from the Armenian authorities - they once again reflect the inconsistency of Pashinyan’s team, who is not responsible for his words. In reality, Armenia is not leaving the CSTO, because in reality no one can offer any other security system. Moreover, the past CSTO summit in Astana attracted attention to Armenia not so much by the refusal of its leadership to participate in the event, but by the lack of objections from Yerevan to the participants’ decision. Then the information background softened somewhat and now Pashinyan has to make new attacks against the CSTO so as not to disappoint his sponsors. #Armenia #CSTO #Russia@rybarSupport usSputnik ArmeniaPashinyan called it almost impossible for Armenia to return to the CSTOArmenia already considers itself outside the CSTO and therefore does not participate in decision-making within the organization, the head of government noted.

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Deir ez-Zor province): relative calm...
Description: ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Deir ez-Zor province): relative calm along the Euphrates situation as of 18.00 December 4, 2024 After yesterday’s unsuccessful attempt by the Arab forces - the Syrian Democratic Forces - (SDF) to capture government-controlled settlements in Damascus, on the left bank of the Euphrates River came a cautious lull.▪️Firefights periodically break out between government troops and pro-Kurdish militias near Husseiniya and Al-Tabiya Jazira, but there have been no significant changes.▪️Despite the apparent failure of yesterday's attack by the Deir ez-Zor Military Council forces, Kurdish media say that managed to occupy several settlements. However, there is no evidence of this.▪️American artillery stationed at a base near the Conoco gas field worked on targets of the Syrian Armed Forces and Shiite militias in the vicinity of the city of Deir ez-Zor. The US Army Central Command reported that during yesterday’s clashes three homemade MLRS were destroyed , -T-64 tank, armored personnel carrier and several mortar crews of the Syrian army.🔻Despite the problems in the province of Hama and the fierce attacks of terrorists north of the city of the same name, the Syrian military leadership, relying on loyal Arab tribes, is still able to hold positions near the Euphrates. Well, yesterday’s failure of the SDF does not mean that the pro-American formations are abandoning the idea of ​​a second attack to territories controlled by Syrian troops in the province of Deir ez-Zor. High resolution mapEnglish version⭐️ Online maps available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #DeirEzZor #map #Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁🖼 🇰🇵🇷🇺🇺🇦 New British fakes about North Korea Since the a...
Description: Forwarded From Awakening Dragon 🐲🇰🇵🇷🇺🇺🇦 New British fakes about North Korea Since the first news about North Korean soldiers at the front appeared, fakes about them began to spread literally every week. For example, the first photo shows Wei and Lin - two girls whom Kim Jong-un himself personally sent to Russia as cannon fodder. At least that's what the Daily Mail writes. The article claims that they have been serving with the Russian military for two weeks, 62 kilometers from the front in the Kursk region. The servicemen even gave them other names - Vera and Lida. At the same time, the authors of the article write directly in the text that they do not understand why the Russians did this. However, the credibility of the obviously made-up story is poor. The second photo is a screenshot from a video from 2023, which shows twin girls. Next to them is the same man as in the first photo. The appearance of the girls in the original is far from North Korean. Most likely, Wei and Lin, or more precisely Vera and Lida, were created in Photoshop using deepfakes. Therefore, the only thing they can do is participate in exclusively virtual combat operations. @awaken_dragon

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Deraa province): attempts by militan...
Description: ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Deraa province): attempts by militants to provoke a rebellion situation as of 17.00 on December 4, 2024 In the Daraa province in southern Syria, the situation has remained tense over the past 24 hours. However, things have not yet come to the point of an armed uprising of previously reconciled groups.▪️In the administrative center, the Syrian special services have deployed several more posts in various areas of the city of Daraa in order to check the identities of citizens.▪️On the outskirts of Nawa in the western part of the province, an explosion occurred near an IED of an army checkpoint, but there were no casualties there wasn't. The likely target was a car that was passing at that moment, inside which was an officer of the 61st brigade of the Syrian Armed Forces.▪️In Basr al-Harir, northeast of Daraa, firefights broke out: contrary to the statements of the opposition media about an attack by rebels on a Syrian army checkpoint, the parties to the conflict were local smuggler groups.🔻Opposition resources are trying to bring the situation to a boiling point, focusing the attention of Internet users on often clumsy and sometimes truly sabotage actions of the Syrian mukhabarat and other government bodies. So far, local authorities have managed to maintain control over the situation and prevent the outbreak of armed uprisings. However, in the future, pressure on government forces in Daraa will clearly increase, and not without the help of external forces. High resolution mapEnglish version⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #Deraa #map #Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬 🇷🇺 Statements by Russian President Vladimir Putin at the ple...
Description: 🇷🇺 Statements by Russian President Vladimir Putin at the plenary session of the forum - The Motherland is calling - 🔻On international economic relations: ▪️Western countries have proven themselves to be unreliable partners. The West's plans to reduce the standard of living of Russians and create an insurmountable shortage of goods in the Russian Federation failed▪️Russia did not expel Western business, and many companies from the USA and Europe did not leave: only a quarter of Western companies left the Russian market.▪️Russia will not create special conditions for Western companies that want to return to its market, but it will not interfere.▪️The European economy is going through difficult times, the severance of ties with Russia also plays a serious role.▪️Russia is developing relations with China regardless of events in the Ukrainian direction, this is its long-time partner.🔻About the economic situation in Russia:▪️The Central Bank and the government are pursuing a very balanced policy.▪️Inflation in Russia is high enough to solve problems require coordinated actions of the Government and the Central Bank.▪️The problem of youth unemployment in Russia has ceased exist.▪️By the end of the decade, the capitalization of the Russian stock market should approximately double and amount to 2/3 of GDP.▪️The Russian economy will grow by 4% this year, and the eurozone - only by 1%.▪️Russia invites investors from friendly countries to the Russian stock market.▪️The Russian Federation will continue to strengthen the capital market, support companies’ entry into exchange.▪️Russia continues to create infrastructure that should make digital payments more convenient for business and reduce costs. The Russian Federation is already among the leaders in the quality of the business climate.▪️The digital ruble will be used in budget payments starting next year.#NATO #CSTO #Russia #Ukraine @rybar Support us Video is too big

Title: 🇯🇵 In Japan, they continue to dwell on the topic of creating an...
Description: 🇯🇵 In Japan, they continue to dwell on the topic of creating an analogue of NATO in the Asia-Pacific region, which became very popular after Shigeru Ishiba became prime minister. The newly created group within the Liberal Democratic Party (LDP) recently began the first discussions regarding this initiative. The group's work will be based on hearing from experts as well as collecting information from other sources. This is necessary in order to subsequently present a list of recommendations for the current Prime Minister. 📌 According to Japanese media reports, the initiative to create an analogue of NATO in the region was received coldly not only in the international arena, but also within the country. Critics point out that such a project could provoke China, and for its full implementation it is necessary to amend the Japanese constitution. Therefore, the recently created group within the LDP discussed the situation in the field of regional security as a whole, and not any specific project. There is also an argument that creating a military bloc in the Asia-Pacific region will require a lot of time and effort, which is why Japan does not want to rush into it. So, although local authorities do not hope for the speedy implementation of the initiative, no one plans to completely abandon the idea. Therefore, in the long term, an analogue of NATO may still appear in the Asia-Pacific region. However, against the background of its criticism both abroad and within Japan, a military bloc may be created in a softer form. #Japan@rybarSupport usjapannews.yomiuri.co.jpLDP Committee Starts Discussions on Ishiba’s Vision of an Asian NATO; Some Party Members Reluctant to Support Measure<p>A Liberal Democratic Party committee has started discussions on security issues including the formation of an Asian version of the North Atlantic Treaty Organization, but many members of the party are reluctant to get behind a concept they consider a pet...

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Aleppo province): Kurdish ambushes o...
Description: ❗️🇸🇾🏴 Crisis in Syria (Aleppo province): Kurdish ambushes on pro-Turkish militantssituation as of 16.00 December 4, 2024Despite the evacuation of most of the Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF) units to Menbij and the province of Raqqa, there are still Kurdish militias remain, committing sorties. During one of these, they eliminated about 20 militants of the pro-Turkish groups - Faylaq al-Majd - and - Firqat al-Sultan Murad - at the entrance to Deir Hafir.▪️In the SDF-controlled area of ​​Al-Sheikh Maqsoud in the northern part of Aleppo, the situation is relatively stable. Against the backdrop of ongoing skirmishes with anti-government factions, the Kurds have deployed snipers in the vicinity, who shoot unwary militants.▪️In other quarters of the city, the Syrian National Army (SNA) is robbing and kidnapping residents. It is noteworthy that the local population sometimes even turns to terrorists Hayat Tahrir al-Sham (HTS) for help, seeing in it protection from looting and banditry by Turkish proxies. There is nothing surprising in this: even last year after the murder pro-Turkish militants - Ahrar al-Sharqiya - civilians of Jenderis, Kurdish activists met with the leader of HTS Abu Muhammad al-Julani, asking him to take Afrin under the control of his group.▪️To the southeast of Aleppo, fierce fighting is taking place near the strategically important city of Khanasser, recently liberated by government troops. The militants are trying to recapture the settlement, while HTS media resources deny its loss. Meanwhile, Turkish-backed gangs continue preparations for an attack on Menbij: Turkish artillery is actively operating in the area, and reinforcements are being delivered to the front line. Negotiations are underway between the SDF and the SNA on the surrender of the city. And in the countryside, militants are testing the defenses of the SDF, who claim to have repelled attacks by pro-Turkish groups: for example, at night the Kurds stopped an incursion in the vicinity of Al-Sayada and Ad-Dandaniyah, northwest of Menbij .High resolution map⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#Aleppo #digest #map #Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇺🇸🇨🇦 About changes in relations between the United States and...
Description: 🇺🇸🇨🇦 About changes in relations between the United States and Canada under the Trump administration The newly elected American president has not yet had time to go through the inauguration procedure, and has already begun to put pressure on Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau. Politicians held talks yesterday, during which Trump warned his colleague that Canada could receive a 25% tariff on its goods if the authorities in Ottawa fail to solve the problem of illegal migration and drug smuggling. Trudeau's excuses that this could destroy the Canadian economy, Trump did not accept - in response, he only stated that, in this case, the country would become the 51st state of the United States.🔻So what can Donald Trump really do?▪️In the future, the future American administration may renegotiate the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), as well as impose higher tariffs on Canadian steel and aluminum.▪️In addition, Trump supports the development of large oil pipeline projects such as Keystone XL - they are aimed at increasing Canadian oil exports to the United States, but with minimal benefits for Canada itself. At the same time, the implementation of projects beneficial to Ottawa under the Trump administration may be delayed or completely blocked. Thus, Trump set the tone for US-Canadian relations for the four years ahead - they will develop in conditions of economic tension, but, most likely, will maintain basic security stability and partnerships.#USA@rybar together with @usaperiodicalSupport usTelegramAmerican number🇺🇸🇨🇦 Donald Trump held negotiations with Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau. During the meeting, the US President-elect warned that Canada could become the 51st US state if Ottawa fails to solve the problem of illegal migration and drug smuggling.…

Title: 🇹🇯 What risks does preparation for elections in Tajikistan prom...
Description: 🇹🇯 What risks does preparation for elections in Tajikistan promise? Today, the President of Tajikistan Emomali Rahmon signed a decree calling elections. Local elections and elections for the lower house of parliament will be held on March 2, 2025, elections for the upper house will be held on March 28, 2025. The elite of Tajikistan have been actively preparing for the upcoming elections all year. In June, MP and former chairman of the Democratic Party Saijafar Usmonzoda was arrested. In November, a closed trial began against representatives of part of the elite who are accused of attempting a coup. In addition to Usmonzoda, in the dock were: Akbarsho Iskandarov, former chairman of the Supreme Council of Tajikistan; Akhmadshoh Komilzoda, journalist and deputy chairman of the Democratic Party; Khamrokhon Zarifi, former Minister of Foreign Affairs of Tajikistan; Shokirjon Khakimov, first deputy chairman of the Social Democratic Party; ➖Abdulfayz Atoi, former press secretary of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Tajikistan. Arrests and trials are currently ongoing. Thus, Khakimov’s niece was also accused of treason last week. The active purge before the election campaign has a destabilizing effect on the entire political landscape. Considering the peculiarities of the structure of Tajikistan, the configuration of the new political system looks very uncertain, due to the dissatisfaction of the clans with the current situation and potential attempts to change it in radical ways during the preparation and holding of elections. Whether this will result in real incidents is unknown, but we would not rule out another escalation. #elections #CentralAsia #Tajikistan @rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇹🇯 Arrests and resignations in Tajikistan: is the transition of power coming soon? Over the past three months, the mountainous Central Asian republic has been openly shaking. During this time, the leadership of three out of seven political parties has changed. At the same time, the top officials of the Economic Party...

Title: 🔁🖼 Extremely disturbing news is coming from the north-west of H...
Description: Forwarded From FISHERIES in the northwestern province of Hama, extremely disturbing news is coming. According to Syrian government sources, HTS militants attacked in the direction of Dzhurin. However, it is not yet clear whether they tried to break through from the north or from the eastern part of the Al-Ghab valley. Previously, such an option would have been impossible, but now, judging by incoming information, the militants are quite capable of venturing into such events. In addition, Syrian troops reported attacks by militants in the direction of the settlements of Al-Hurra and Al-Karim. At the same time, according to official data, the Syrians managed to repel these attacks, however, taking into account, let’s say, the bias of the Syrian weather in terms of covering the fighting, It is not yet clear who actually controls these villages now. However, the militants have not yet announced the capture either. But it was not in vain that we started talking about disturbing news. Militants from Habit launched a drone that flew in the direction of Khmeimim. The drone was shot down in the Kardahi area. Once again, the militants demonstrate that they have drones that can fly over 40 kilometers. And judging by the fact that they were aiming at Khmeimim, the goal was to disrupt the work of Russian aviation. We do not exclude that the soul will soon test the SAA positions somewhere in northern Latakia in the vicinity of the M4 highway. The detailed situation will be based on a little later.⭐️ Online -maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru

Title: 🇰🇷 The situation in South Korea after yesterday's coup attempt ...
Description: 🇰🇷 The situation in South Korea has more or less stabilized after yesterday's coup attempt. Under pressure from political forces represented by the ruling and opposition parties, President Yoon Seok-yeol lifted the martial law regime. Now it is time to investigate what happened. There is a series of protests and rallies in the country for the South Korean leader to resign or be impeached. Some are demanding a trial of what happened. Opposition parties have already begun the procedure for impeachment of the president - their representatives have submitted a corresponding project to the National Assembly. A vote on this matter is scheduled to take place on December 6 or 7. In addition, many politicians who worked with the current president have already resigned. We are talking, for example, about the head of the administration, the head of the national security department, as well as the country's minister of defense. 📌 Given the ongoing pressure from the public and political parties opposed to the current leader, impeachment appears to be inevitable. However, to implement it, it is necessary to obtain 200 votes in parliament, where the opposition lacks eight seats. However, the current rhetoric of the ruling party and its participation in the last lifting of martial law so far indicate that the problem with the lack of votes will most likely be resolved not in Yun’s favor . This means that the South Korean president will soon be impeached. #SouthKorea@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar❗️🇰🇷 Attempted coup in South Koreasituation as of 21:00 December 3, 2024 Today, immediately after the declaration of martial law by President Yun Seok Yeol, the army of the Republic of Korea began to converge on the capital of the country. Eyewitnesses began to notice...

Title: 🇲🇩 About the political background of the energy crisis in Moldo...
Description: 🇲🇩 About the political background of the energy crisis in Moldova and the connection with the past elections Public hearings were held in the Parliament of Moldova on the issue of increasing gas tariffs. The opposition, represented by deputies of the Bloc of Communists and Socialists (BCS), accused the government of failing energy policy and is initiating a vote of no confidence in the authorities. ▪️Starting December 1, gas tariffs in Moldova immediately increased by 28% (to $0.85), and then prices for heat and electricity will soar. Trade unions are already sounding the alarm that the already low salaries and pensions of citizens will not be enough to pay for housing and communal services.▪️In power circles they knew about the increase in tariffs back in the summer, but did not take any action. They were left unchanged due to the presidential elections and the referendum on European integration. ▪️At a hearing in parliament, Energy Minister Viktor Parlikov blamed the responsibility on Prime Minister Dorin Recan. As it turned out, in the summer he negotiated with the Romanian authorities on the purchase of gas at preferential prices. ▪️Apparently, it has not yet been possible to agree on a cheap contract from the main ally of Maia Sandu’s office. And Romania during the cold period is the most expensive energy market in the EU. But Parlikov still claims that a long-term contract with the same Gazprom does not always provide the best price.▪️Another reason for the increase in gas prices in Moldova is the high cost of its transportation within the country. Gas transmission networks, like other strategic assets of the republic, were recently transferred to Romania. And here, the -ally- didn’t help much either. Sandu’s recent re-election as President of Moldova raised many questions, since she won only due to the votes of the diaspora, having lost within the country. Now a new fraud is being revealed with the complete inaction of the authorities in the energy sector due to false election promises not to raise tariffs. 📌 And the reluctance to conduct constructive negotiations with the Russian Federation is also exclusively political in nature. After all, Western curators allocate money for the so-called. -energy security-, which actually means a bribe and a demand to break off relations with the Russian Federation. It turns out that the residents of Moldova made the right choice by not supporting Sanda in the second round of the presidential elections: ordinary citizens will again have to bear another heavy burden for the decisions of her team.# Moldova #Russia #Romania @rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇲🇩 About the impending energy disaster in Moldova After the presidential elections and the referendum on European integration, Moldova suddenly remembered its pressing problems and started talking about the fact that the republic would face difficult times and an energy crisis. It's getting closer...

Title: 🇺🇸🇺🇦 From time to time, materials appear in the press where a...
Description: 🇺🇸🇺🇦 From time to time, materials appear in the press where the authors try to assess the long-term prospects of the so-called. Ukraine as a state entity. In our opinion, the best answer to the question is two recent news: ▪️The Commissioner for Human Rights of the Kyiv regime stated that by 2051 the population of the so-called. Ukraine will be reduced to 25.2 million people. According to him, at the moment it is 35.8 million, although back in 2022, 42 million people allegedly lived there.▪️Representatives of the American administration and military circles demand that the Ukrainian authorities lower the conscription age to 18 years and express dissatisfaction with the current pace of mobilization, secretly blackmailing their possibility of reducing military support. That is, the sponsors of the Kyiv regime almost directly say that it must fight until the last Ukrainian. At the same time, they don’t offer him anything other than weapons for this - they are well aware that with such a demographic of the future, the so-called. There is no Ukraine anyway.📌 This, of course, is a new level of Western proxy wars - to acquire not even a group, but an entire consumable country in the form of a monkey with a grenade, in order to weaken Russia and not incur any direct military costs.#Ukraine@rybarSupport usReutersUS urges Ukraine to lower fighting age to 18 to bolster ranks against RussiaUkraine should consider lowering the age of military service for its soldiers to 18 from 25, a senior U.S. administration official said on Wednesday, putting pressure on Kyiv to bolster its fighting forces in the country's war with Russia.

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🖇️ Head of the @rybar analytical center Mikhail Zvinchuk ...
Description: 🇷🇺🖇️ Head of the analytical center @rybar Mikhail Zvinchuk spoke at a seminar-meeting for leaders and curators of International Friendship Clubs at the site of the management workshop -Senezh-. They talked a lot about soft power, opportunities for implementing projects in the post-Soviet space and in countries whose populations are drawn to Russia. International friendship clubs appeared this year: these are youth organizations in every subject of the Russian Federation, whose tasks will include building relationships with individual countries of the world at the level of students and young professionals. During the seminar, the guys prepared projects and defended their concepts: from traditional festivals to reality shows, platforms with digital avatars, programs for exchanging experiences in families and adaptation of students who have just arrived in Russia. The demand for such projects is enormous: objectively, those tools The soft power that Russia has now is not enough. We need new approaches and new practices.#speech #mediatechnology #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇴🗳 About the parliamentary elections in Romania In Romania...
Description: 🇷🇴🗳 About the parliamentary elections in RomaniaRomania has completed the counting of votes in the parliamentary elections that took place on Sunday. Parliament is elected for four years, the electoral threshold for parties is 5%. ▪️After preliminary processing of 100% of the ballots, the pro-Western ruling Social Democratic Party (PSD) of Prime Minister Marcel Ciolaku is in the lead with 22.30%. ▪️Next comes the nationalist Alliance for the Unification of Romanians (AUR) with 18.30%. Previously, this party belonged to presidential candidate Calin Georgescu, who won the first round. ▪️In third place is the ally of the Social Democrats in the ruling coalition, the center-right National Liberal Party (PNL) (14.28%). ▪️The fourth place is occupied by the centrist pro-Western party - Union for the Salvation of Romania - (USR) (12.26%), from which the second presidential candidate Elena Lasconi ran. Apparently, the pro-Western coalition led by the Social Democrats and Prime Minister Colacu will remain in the Romanian government. At the same time, conditionally right-wing parties in total gain about 30%, which causes alarm in the circles of European bureaucrats. 🔻Preparation for the second round of presidential elections The parliamentary elections took place against the backdrop of a scandal with the refusal of the Constitutional Court to immediately recognize the results of the first round of presidential elections. The Constitutional Court decided to recount the ballots, but literally after the parliamentary elections, when it became clear that the Social Democratic coalition would be preserved, the results of the first round of presidential elections were nevertheless approved. The second round of presidential elections between Georgescu and Lasconi will take place on December 8. 🔻Since Romania has a presidential-parliamentary form of government, the parliament has great power and forms the government. It is already clear that in this regard nothing will change significantly and the ruling coalition of Social Democrats and National Liberals will remain. However, the presidential election remains intriguing, as both candidates are not associated with the ruling coalition and could potentially come into conflict with the future government. At the same time, in foreign policy, Lasconi expresses sympathy for NATO and the United States, unlike Georgescu, so the victory of the former is clearly more preferable for pro-Western forces. High resolution infographicsEnglish version#elections #Romania@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of December 4, 2024 ▪️ At night they ...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of December 4, 2024▪️ At night they reported on the work of air defense in Novorossiysk, Krasnodar Territory. At least three drones were shot down over the Bryansk region. In the Rostov region, air defense forces have been repelling an enemy attack since early morning. In the Taganrog area, 12 UAVs were destroyed and suppressed by electronic warfare. ▪️ In the Kursk region, the North group of troops reports fierce fighting in the north of the Sudzhansky district. Assault groups of the Russian Armed Forces advanced into forest areas near the settlement. Malaya Loknya and are conducting a clean-up operation, reports our group of troops. In the Nikolaevo-Daryino region, Warriors of the North, an enemy counterattack group with a Leopard tank was destroyed. At the same time, there is no need to talk about any significant change in the LBS. The enemy continues to constantly transfer reserves from the Sumy region, which the Russian Armed Forces are trying to destroy on the march.▪️ In the Kupyansky direction there are heavy battles for the creation by our troops of stable bridgeheads on the enemy bank of the river. Oskol. The enemy is counterattacking.▪️ From Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk) they report fighting in the Zabalka microdistrict for control of the mine waste heaps. ▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces continue to create front ledges: data is received about attacks by our troops in the direction of the settlement. Dachenskoe. Previously, breakthroughs were made to the south: to the settlement. Yellow and side n.p. Pushkino. In the future, this will make it possible to close the next defense pockets of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, destroying or forcing the enemy to move west under the fire of our guns and drones.▪️ News came from the Kurakhovsky direction at night that the Russian Armed Forces had taken the village as a result of the fighting. Starye Terny and the adjacent company stronghold on the western shore of the Kurakhovskoye Reservoir. ▪️ Group of troops - Vostok - note the increase in the ferocity of enemy resistance at Velikaya (Bolshaya) Novoselka, forestalling early victorious reports in the media. Heavy fighting is also taking place in the area of ​​New Komar; the enemy continues to bring reinforcements to the village, slowing down the pace of advance of our units. North of Maksimovka, the Russian Armed Forces approached the village. Sukhie Yala village. The fighting continues. ▪️ On the Zaporozhye front north of Nesteryanka (Orekhovsky direction), the Ukrainian Armed Forces are preparing for defense, strengthening positions and gathering personnel. Despite the far from complete degree of readiness of the enemy network of strong points, the Ukrainian Armed Forces dug serious systems of trenches.▪️ In the Belgorod region, in the village of Politotdelsky, a civilian was wounded as a result of an Ukrainian Armed Forces UAV strike on an apartment building. In the city of Shebekino, one of the enterprises was repeatedly attacked by drones. It was reported that last night in the village of Ustinka, Belgorod region, a drone attacked a private house; a man with burns went to the hospital. ▪️In the DPR, as a result of the detonation of an explosive object on the Donetsk-Mariupol highway near the Yelenovsky Bridge, an employee of a road construction company died while performing work. The Ukrainian Armed Forces are remotely mined with POM-2 anti-personnel mines. Komsomolets Nikitovsky district of Gorlovka: a woman was fatally wounded. Also in Gorlovka, a previously unexploded cluster submunition detonated, a woman born in 1986 was wounded. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo majorsVelikaya Novoselka. Reported by @voin_dv Almost a week has passed since the liberation of Shakhtyorsky and statements in the spirit of -Velikaya Novoselka has only a few days left-, but today the battle for a large logistics hub of the Armed Forces of Ukraine is just beginning. Assault units...

Title: 🇻🇪🇲🇳🇷🇺 About the good events organized by the team of GIPU ...
Description: 🇻🇪🇲🇳🇷🇺 About the good events organized by the team of GIPU named after. V.G. Korolenko, this is heard not only from the countries of South America. At the end of November, for example, the Russian Philological School 2024 opened in Ulaanbaatar. At this site, students and teachers from Mongolia and Russia discuss a new Russian language textbook for local schools. Teachers from 22 aimags came to participate in the event, whose experience - of course - differs from the capital’s and allows us to generalize the real experience of teaching the Russian language in the country. Quite it is possible that already in the next academic year Mongolian children will be able to receive new textbooks in the Russian language. Do we need to explain for the hundredth time why this is so important in these turbulent times? By the way, just for these purposes, in September we presented a graphic novel about Khalkhin Gol, which we are happy to hand over to interested organizations for publication.#Venezuela #Mongolia# Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramSex, cartels, Frida Kahlo🇻🇪🇷🇺It turns out that with From November 8 to November 14, the Festival of Russian Language and Culture Terra Rusistica was held in Caracas. The event was organized by our old friends from GIPU named after. V.G. Korolenko and the Foundation for the Support of Humanities - My Story - with the assistance of local authorities.…
